BioGTK  4.9.0
A .NET library & program for annotating, editing various microscopy imaging formats using Bioformats supported images. Including whole slide, pyramidal, and series.

32namespace BioGTK

34 /* A class declaration. */
35 public static class Images
36 {
37 public static List<BioImage> images = new List<BioImage>();
40 public static BioImage GetImage(string ids)
41 {
42 for (int i = 0; i < images.Count; i++)
43 {
44 if (images[i].ID == ids || images[i].file == ids)
45 return images[i];
46 }
47 return null;
48 }
52 public static void AddImage(BioImage im, bool newtab)
53 {
54 if (images.Contains(im)) return;
55 im.Filename = GetImageName(im.ID);
56 int c = GetImageCountByName(im.ID);
57 if(c > 1)
58 im.ID = im.Filename + "-" + c;
59 else
60 im.ID = im.Filename;
61 images.Add(im);
62 if (App.tabsView != null)
63 {
64 System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Run(() =>
65 {
66 // update ui on main UI thread
67 Application.Invoke(delegate
68 {
69 App.nodeView.UpdateItems();
70 if (newtab)
71 App.tabsView.AddTab(im);
72 else
73 {
74 if(App.viewer!=null)
75 App.viewer.AddImage(im);
76 else
77 App.tabsView.AddTab(im);
78 }
79 Console.WriteLine("Added image " + im.Filename + " to Images Table.");
80 });
81 });
82 }
83 else
84 {
85 Console.WriteLine("App.tabsView is null.");
86 }
87 }
94 public static int GetImageCountByName(string s)
95 {
96 string name = Path.GetFileName(s);
97 string ext = Path.GetExtension(s);
98 if(name.Split('-').Length > 2)
99 name = name.Remove(name.LastIndexOf('-'),name.Length - name.LastIndexOf('-'));
100 int i = 0;
101 for (int im = 0; im < images.Count; im++)
102 {
103 if (images[im].ID.Contains(name) && images[im].ID.EndsWith(ext))
104 i++;
105 }
106 return i;
107 }
113 public static string GetImageName(string s)
114 {
115 //Here we create a unique ID for an image.
116 int i = Images.GetImageCountByName(s);
117 if (i == 0)
118 return Path.GetFileName(s);
119 string name = Path.GetFileNameWithoutExtension(s);
120 if (Path.GetFileNameWithoutExtension(name)!=name)
121 name = Path.GetFileNameWithoutExtension(name);
122 string ext = s.Substring(s.IndexOf('.'),s.Length-s.IndexOf('.'));
123 if(name.Split('-').Length > 2)
124 {
125 string sts = name.Remove(name.LastIndexOf('-'),name.Length-name.LastIndexOf('-'));
126 return sts + "-" + i + ext;
127 }
128 else
129 return name + "-" + i + ext;
130 }
134 public static void RemoveImage(BioImage im)
135 {
136 RemoveImage(im.ID);
137 }
143 public static void RemoveImage(string id)
144 {
145 BioImage im = GetImage(id);
146 if (im == null)
147 return;
148 images.Remove(im);
149 System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Run(() =>
150 {
151 // update ui on main UI thread
152 Application.Invoke(delegate
153 {
154 App.nodeView.UpdateItems();
155 App.tabsView.RemoveTab(im.Filename);
156 });
157 });
158 im.Dispose();
159 Recorder.AddLine("BioGTK.Images.RemoveImage(" + '"' + id + '"' + ");");
160 }
166 public static void UpdateImage(BioImage im)
167 {
168 for (int i = 0; i < images.Count; i++)
169 {
170 if (images[i].ID == im.ID)
171 {
172 images[i] = im;
173 return;
174 }
175 }
176 }
177 }
178 /* A struct that is used to store the resolution of an image. */
179 /* A struct that is used to store the resolution of an image. */
180 public struct Resolution
181 {
182 int x;
183 int y;
184 PixelFormat format;
185 double px, py, pz, sx, sy, sz;
186 public int SizeX
187 {
188 get { return x; }
189 set { x = value; }
190 }
191 public int SizeY
192 {
193 get { return y; }
194 set { y = value; }
195 }
196 public double PhysicalSizeX
197 {
198 get { return px; }
199 set { px = value; }
200 }
201 public double PhysicalSizeY
202 {
203 get { return py; }
204 set { py = value; }
205 }
206 public double PhysicalSizeZ
207 {
208 get { return pz; }
209 set { pz = value; }
210 }
211 public double StageSizeX
212 {
213 get { return sx; }
214 set { sx = value; }
215 }
216 public double StageSizeY
217 {
218 get { return sy; }
219 set { sy = value; }
220 }
221 public double StageSizeZ
222 {
223 get { return sz; }
224 set { sz = value; }
225 }
226 public double VolumeWidth
227 {
228 get
229 {
230 return PhysicalSizeX * SizeX;
231 }
232 }
233 public double VolumeHeight
234 {
235 get
236 {
237 return PhysicalSizeY * SizeY;
238 }
239 }
240 public PixelFormat PixelFormat
241 {
242 get { return format; }
243 set { format = value; }
244 }
245 public int RGBChannelsCount
246 {
247 get
248 {
249 if (PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format8bppIndexed || PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format16bppGrayScale)
250 return 1;
251 else if (PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb || PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format48bppRgb)
252 return 3;
253 else
254 return 4;
255 }
256 }
257 public long SizeInBytes
258 {
259 get
260 {
261 if (format == PixelFormat.Format8bppIndexed)
262 return (long)y * (long)x;
263 else if (format == PixelFormat.Format16bppGrayScale)
264 return (long)y * (long)x * 2;
265 else if (format == PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb)
266 return (long)y * (long)x * 3;
267 else if (format == PixelFormat.Format32bppRgb || format == PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb)
268 return (long)y * (long)x * 4;
269 else if (format == PixelFormat.Format48bppRgb || format == PixelFormat.Format48bppRgb)
270 return (long)y * (long)x * 6;
271 throw new NotSupportedException(format + " is not supported.");
272 }
273 }
274 public Resolution(int w, int h, int omePx, int bitsPerPixel, double physX, double physY, double physZ, double stageX, double stageY, double stageZ)
275 {
276 x = w;
277 y = h;
278 sx = stageX;
279 sy = stageY;
280 sz = stageZ;
281 format = BioImage.GetPixelFormat(omePx, bitsPerPixel);
282 px = physX;
283 py = physY;
284 pz = physZ;
285 }
286 public Resolution(int w, int h, PixelFormat f, double physX, double physY, double physZ, double stageX, double stageY, double stageZ)
287 {
288 x = w;
289 y = h;
290 format = f;
291 sx = stageX;
292 sy = stageY;
293 sz = stageZ;
294 px = physX;
295 py = physY;
296 pz = physZ;
297 }
298 public Resolution Copy()
299 {
300 return new Resolution(x, y, format, px, py, pz, sx, sy, sz);
301 }
302 public override string ToString()
303 {
304 return "(" + x + ", " + y + ") " + format.ToString() + " " + (SizeInBytes / 1000) + " KB";
305 }
306 }
307 /* Declaring a struct named RectangleD. */
308 public struct RectangleD
309 {
310 private double x;
311 private double y;
312 private double w;
313 private double h;
314 public double X { get { return x; } set { x = value; } }
315 public double Y { get { return y; } set { y = value; } }
316 public double W { get { return w; } set { w = value; } }
317 public double H { get { return h; } set { h = value; } }
318
319 public RectangleD(double X, double Y, double W, double H)
320 {
321 x = X;
322 y = Y;
323 w = W;
324 h = H;
325 }
326 public Rectangle ToRectangleInt()
327 {
328 return new Rectangle((int)X, (int)Y, (int)W, (int)H);
329 }
336 public bool IntersectsWith(RectangleD rect1)
337 {
338 if (rect1.X + rect1.W < X || X + W < rect1.X ||
339 rect1.Y + rect1.H < Y || Y + H < rect1.Y)
340 {
341 return false;
342 }
343 return true;
344 }
350 public bool IntersectsWith(PointD p)
351 {
352 return IntersectsWith(p.X, p.Y);
353 }
360 public bool IntersectsWith(double x, double y)
361 {
362 if (X <= x && (X + W) >= x && Y <= y && (Y + H) >= y)
363 return true;
364 else
365 return false;
366 }
370 public RectangleF ToRectangleF()
371 {
372 return new RectangleF((float)X, (float)Y, (float)W, (float)H);
373 }
378 public override string ToString()
379 {
380 double w = Math.Round(W, 2, MidpointRounding.ToZero);
381 double h = Math.Round(H, 2, MidpointRounding.ToZero);
382 double x = Math.Round(X, 2, MidpointRounding.ToZero);
383 double y = Math.Round(Y, 2, MidpointRounding.ToZero);
384 return x + ", " + y + ", " + w + ", " + h;
385 }
386
387 }
388
389 /* The ROI class is a class that contains a list of points, a bounding box, and a type */
390 public class ROI : IDisposable
391 {
392 /* Defining an enum. */
393 public enum Type
394 {
395 Rectangle,
396 Point,
397 Line,
398 Polygon,
399 Polyline,
400 Freeform,
401 Ellipse,
402 Label,
403 Mask
404 }
405 /* A property of a class. */
406 public PointD Point
407 {
408 get
409 {
410 return Points[0];
411 }
412 set
413 {
414 UpdatePoint(value, 0);
415 UpdateBoundingBox();
416 }
417 }
418 public RectangleD Rect
419 {
420 get
421 {
422 if (Points.Count == 0)
423 return new RectangleD(0, 0, 0, 0);
424 if (type == Type.Line || type == Type.Polyline || type == Type.Polygon || type == Type.Freeform || type == Type.Label)
425 return BoundingBox;
426 if (type == Type.Rectangle || type == Type.Ellipse)
427 return new RectangleD(Points[0].X, Points[0].Y, Points[1].X - Points[0].X, Points[2].Y - Points[0].Y);
428 else
429 return new RectangleD(Points[0].X, Points[0].Y, 1, 1);
430 }
431 set
432 {
433 if (type == Type.Line || type == Type.Polyline || type == Type.Polygon || type == Type.Freeform)
434 {
435 BoundingBox = value;
436 }
437 else
438 if (Points.Count < 4 && (type == Type.Rectangle || type == Type.Ellipse))
439 {
440 AddPoint(new PointD(value.X, value.Y));
441 AddPoint(new PointD(value.X + value.W, value.Y));
442 AddPoint(new PointD(value.X, value.Y + value.H));
443 AddPoint(new PointD(value.X + value.W, value.Y + value.H));
444 }
445 else
446 if (type == Type.Rectangle || type == Type.Ellipse)
447 {
448 Points[0] = new PointD(value.X, value.Y);
449 Points[1] = new PointD(value.X + value.W, value.Y);
450 Points[2] = new PointD(value.X, value.Y + value.H);
451 Points[3] = new PointD(value.X + value.W, value.Y + value.H);
452 }
453 UpdateBoundingBox();
454 }
455 }
456 public double X
457 {
458 get
459 {
460 return Point.X;
461 }
462 set
463 {
464 Rect = new RectangleD(value, Y, W, H);
465 Recorder.AddLine("App.AddROI(" + BioImage.ROIToString(this) + ");");
466 }
467 }
468 public double Y
469 {
470 get
471 {
472 return Point.Y;
473 }
474 set
475 {
476 Rect = new RectangleD(X, value, W, H);
477 Recorder.AddLine("App.AddROI(" + BioImage.ROIToString(this) + ");");
478 }
479 }
480 public double W
481 {
482 get
483 {
484 if (type == Type.Point)
485 return strokeWidth;
486 else
487 return BoundingBox.W;
488 }
489 set
490 {
491 Rect = new RectangleD(X, Y, value, H);
492 Recorder.AddLine("App.AddROI(" + BioImage.ROIToString(this) + ");");
493 }
494 }
495 public double H
496 {
497 get
498 {
499 if (type == Type.Point)
500 return strokeWidth;
501 else
502 return BoundingBox.H;
503 }
504 set
505 {
506 Rect = new RectangleD(X, Y, W, value);
507 Recorder.AddLine("App.AddROI(" + BioImage.ROIToString(this) + ");");
508 }
509 }
510 public int Resolution
511 {
512 get { return resolution; }
513 set { resolution = value; }
514 }
515 public enum CoordinateSystem
516 {
517 pixel,
518 micron
519 }
520 public Type type;
521 public static float selectBoxSize = 8f;
522 private List<PointD> Points = new List<PointD>();
523 public List<PointD> PointsD
524 {
525 get
526 {
527 return Points;
528 }
529 }
530 public PointD[] PointsImage
531 {
532 get
533 {
534 return ImageView.SelectedImage.ToImageSpace(PointsD);
535 }
536 }
537 private List<RectangleD> selectBoxs = new List<RectangleD>();
538 public List<int> selectedPoints = new List<int>();
539 public RectangleD BoundingBox;
540 public float fontSize = 12;
541 public Cairo.FontSlant slant;
542 public Cairo.FontWeight weight;
543 public string family = "Times New Roman";
544 public ZCT coord;
545 public Color strokeColor;
546 public Color fillColor;
547 public bool isFilled = false;
548 public string id = "";
549 public string roiID = "";
550 public string roiName = "";
551 public string properties = "";
552 public int serie = 0;
553 private string text = "";
554 private int resolution = 0;
555 public double strokeWidth = 1;
556 public int shapeIndex = 0;
557 public bool closed = false;
558 bool selected = false;
559 public bool Selected
560 {
561 get { return selected; }
562 set
563 {
564 if (roiMask != null)
565 roiMask.Selected = value;
566 selected = value;
567 }
568 }
569 public bool subPixel = false;
570 public Mask roiMask { get; set; }
574 public class Mask : IDisposable
575 {
576 public float min = 0;
577 float[] mask;
578 int width;
579 int height;
580 public int Width { get { return width; } set { width = value; } }
581 public int Height { get { return height; } set { height = value; } }
582 public double PhysicalSizeX { get; set; }
583 public double PhysicalSizeY { get; set; }
584 bool updatePixbuf = true;
585 bool updateColored = true;
586 Gdk.Pixbuf pixbuf;
587 Gdk.Pixbuf colored;
588 bool selected = false;
589 internal bool Selected
590 {
591 get { return selected; }
592 set
593 {
594 selected = value;
595 if (selected)
596 UpdateColored(Color.Blue);
597 else
598 updateColored = true;
599 }
600 }
601 public bool IsSelected(int x, int y)
602 {
603 int ind = y * width + x;
604 if (ind > mask.Length)
605 throw new ArgumentException("Point " + x + "," + y + " is outside the mask.");
606 if (mask[ind]>min)
607 {
608 return true;
609 }
610 return false;
611 }
612 public float GetValue(int x, int y)
613 {
614 int ind = y * width + x;
615 if (ind > mask.Length)
616 throw new ArgumentException("Point " + x + "," + y + " is outside the mask.");
617 return mask[ind];
618 }
619 public void SetValue(int x, int y, float val)
620 {
621 int ind = y * width + x;
622 if (ind > mask.Length)
623 throw new ArgumentException("Point " + x + "," + y + " is outside the mask.");
624 mask[ind] = val;
625 updatePixbuf = true;
626 updateColored = true;
627 }
628 public Mask(float[] fts, int width, int height, double physX, double physY)
629 {
630 this.width = width;
631 this.height = height;
632 PhysicalSizeX = physX;
633 PhysicalSizeY = physY;
634 mask = fts;
635 }
636 public Mask(byte[] bts, int width, int height, double physX, double physY)
637 {
638 this.width = width;
639 this.height = height;
640 PhysicalSizeX = physX;
641 PhysicalSizeY = physY;
642 mask = new float[bts.Length];
643 for (int y = 0; y < height; y++)
644 {
645 for (int x = 0; x < width; x++)
646 {
647 int ind = y * width + x;
648 mask[ind] = (float)BitConverter.ToSingle(bts, ind * 4);
649 }
650 }
651 }
652 public Gdk.Pixbuf Pixbuf
653 {
654 get
655 {
656 if (updatePixbuf)
657 {
658 if (pixbuf != null)
659 pixbuf.Dispose();
660 byte[] pixelData = new byte[width * height * 4];
661 for (int y = 0; y < height; y++)
662 {
663 for (int x = 0; x < width; x++)
664 {
665 int ind = y * width + x;
666 if (mask[ind] > 0)
667 {
668 pixelData[4 * ind] = (byte)(mask[ind] / 255);// Blue
669 pixelData[4 * ind + 1] = (byte)(mask[ind] / 255);// Green
670 pixelData[4 * ind + 2] = (byte)(mask[ind] / 255);// Red
671 pixelData[4 * ind + 3] = 125;// Alpha
672 }
673 else
674 pixelData[4 * ind + 3] = 0;
675 }
676 }
677 pixbuf = new Gdk.Pixbuf(pixelData, true, 8, width, height, width * 4);
678 updatePixbuf = false;
679 return pixbuf;
680 }
681 else
682 return pixbuf;
683 }
684 }
685 void UpdateColored(AForge.Color col)
686 {
687 byte[] pixelData = new byte[width * height * 4];
688 for (int y = 0; y < height; y++)
689 {
690 for (int x = 0; x < width; x++)
691 {
692 int ind = y * width + x;
693 if (mask[ind] > 0)
694 {
695 pixelData[4 * ind] = col.R;
696 pixelData[4 * ind + 1] = col.G;
697 pixelData[4 * ind + 2] = col.B;
698 pixelData[4 * ind + 3] = 125;
699 }
700 else
701 pixelData[4 * ind + 3] = 0;
702 }
703 }
704 colored = new Gdk.Pixbuf(pixelData, true, 8, width, height, width * 4);
705 updateColored = false;
706 }
707 public Gdk.Pixbuf GetColored(AForge.Color col, bool forceUpdate = false)
708 {
709 if (updateColored || forceUpdate)
710 {
711 UpdateColored(col);
712 return colored;
713 }
714 else
715 return colored;
716 }
717 public byte[] GetBytes()
718 {
719 byte[] pixelData = new byte[width * height * 4];
720 for (int y = 0; y < height; y++)
721 {
722 for (int x = 0; x < width; x++)
723 {
724 int ind = y * width + x;
725 byte[] bt = BitConverter.GetBytes(mask[ind]);
726 pixelData[4 * ind] = bt[0];
727 pixelData[4 * ind + 1] = bt[1];
728 pixelData[4 * ind + 2] = bt[2];
729 pixelData[4 * ind + 3] = bt[3];
730 }
731 }
732 return pixelData;
733 }
734 public void Dispose()
735 {
736 if(pixbuf!=null)
737 pixbuf.Dispose();
738 if(colored!=null)
739 colored.Dispose();
740 mask = null;
741 }
742 }
743 /*
744 public Size TextSize
745 {
746 get
747 {
748 return TextRenderer.MeasureText(text, font);
749 }
750 }
751 */
752 public ROI Copy()
753 {
754 ROI copy = new ROI();
755 copy.id = id;
756 copy.roiID = roiID;
757 copy.roiName = roiName;
758 copy.text = text;
759 copy.strokeWidth = strokeWidth;
760 copy.strokeColor = strokeColor;
761 copy.fillColor = fillColor;
762 copy.Points = Points;
763 copy.Selected = Selected;
764 copy.shapeIndex = shapeIndex;
765 copy.closed = closed;
766 copy.family = family;
767 copy.fontSize = fontSize;
768 copy.slant = slant;
769 copy.selectBoxs = selectBoxs;
770 copy.BoundingBox = BoundingBox;
771 copy.isFilled = isFilled;
772 copy.coord = coord;
773 copy.selectedPoints = selectedPoints;
774
775 return copy;
776 }
777 public ROI Copy(ZCT cord)
778 {
779 ROI copy = new ROI();
780 copy.type = type;
781 copy.id = id;
782 copy.roiID = roiID;
783 copy.roiName = roiName;
784 copy.text = text;
785 copy.strokeWidth = strokeWidth;
786 copy.strokeColor = strokeColor;
787 copy.fillColor = fillColor;
788 copy.Points.AddRange(Points);
789 copy.Selected = Selected;
790 copy.shapeIndex = shapeIndex;
791 copy.closed = closed;
792 copy.family = family;
793 copy.fontSize = fontSize;
794 copy.slant = slant;
795 copy.selectBoxs.AddRange(selectBoxs);
796 copy.BoundingBox = BoundingBox;
797 copy.isFilled = isFilled;
798 copy.coord = cord;
799 copy.selectedPoints = selectedPoints;
800 return copy;
801 }
802 public string Text
803 {
804 get
805 {
806 return text;
807 }
808 set
809 {
810 text = value;
811 if (type == Type.Label)
812 {
813 UpdateBoundingBox();
814 }
815 }
816 }
823 public RectangleD GetSelectBound(double scaleX,double scaleY)
824 {
825 if (type == Type.Mask)
826 return BoundingBox;
827 double fx = scaleX / 2;
828 double fy = scaleY / 2;
829 return new RectangleD(BoundingBox.X - fx, BoundingBox.Y - fy, BoundingBox.W + scaleX, BoundingBox.H + scaleY);
830 }
831 /* Creating a new ROI object. */
832 public ROI()
833 {
834 coord = new ZCT(0, 0, 0);
835 strokeColor = Color.Yellow;
836 BoundingBox = new RectangleD(0, 0, 1, 1);
837 }
838
845 public RectangleD[] GetSelectBoxes(double s)
846 {
847 double f = s / 2;
848 selectBoxs.Clear();
849 for (int i = 0; i < Points.Count; i++)
850 {
851 selectBoxs.Add(new RectangleD((float)(Points[i].X - f), (float)(Points[i].Y - f), (float)s, (float)s));
852 }
853 return selectBoxs.ToArray();
854 }
862 public static ROI CreatePoint(ZCT coord, double x, double y)
863 {
864 ROI an = new ROI();
865 an.coord = coord;
866 an.AddPoint(new PointD(x, y));
867 an.type = Type.Point;
868 Recorder.AddLine("ROI.CreatePoint(new ZCT(" + coord.Z + "," + coord.C + "," + coord.T + "), " + x + "," + y + ");");
869 return an;
870 }
878
879 public static ROI CreateLine(ZCT coord, PointD x1, PointD x2)
880 {
881 ROI an = new ROI();
882 an.coord = coord;
883 an.type = Type.Line;
884 an.AddPoint(x1);
885 an.AddPoint(x2);
886 Recorder.AddLine("ROI.CreateLine(new ZCT(" + coord.Z + "," + coord.C + "," + coord.T + "), new PointD(" + x1.X + "," + x1.Y + "), new PointD(" + x2.X + "," + x2.Y + "));");
887 return an;
888 }
898 public static ROI CreateRectangle(ZCT coord, double x, double y, double w, double h)
899 {
900 ROI an = new ROI();
901 an.coord = coord;
902 an.type = Type.Rectangle;
903 an.Rect = new RectangleD(x, y, w, h);
904 Recorder.AddLine("ROI.CreateRectangle(new ZCT(" + coord.Z + "," + coord.C + "," + coord.T + "), new RectangleD(" + x + "," + y + "," + w + "," + h + ");");
905 return an;
906 }
916 public static ROI CreateEllipse(ZCT coord, double x, double y, double w, double h)
917 {
918 ROI an = new ROI();
919 an.coord = coord;
920 an.type = Type.Ellipse;
921 an.Rect = new RectangleD(x, y, w, h);
922 Recorder.AddLine("ROI.CreateEllipse(new ZCT(" + coord.Z + "," + coord.C + "," + coord.T + "), new RectangleD(" + x + "," + y + "," + w + "," + h + ");");
923 return an;
924 }
931 public static ROI CreatePolygon(ZCT coord, PointD[] pts)
932 {
933 ROI an = new ROI();
934 an.coord = coord;
935 an.type = Type.Polygon;
936 an.AddPoints(pts);
937 an.closed = true;
938 return an;
939 }
946 public static ROI CreateFreeform(ZCT coord, PointD[] pts)
947 {
948 ROI an = new ROI();
949 an.coord = coord;
950 an.type = Type.Freeform;
951 an.AddPoints(pts);
952 an.closed = true;
953 return an;
954 }
955 public static ROI CreateMask(ZCT coord, float[] mask,int width,int height,PointD loc, double physicalX, double physicalY)
956 {
957 ROI an = new ROI();
958 an.coord = coord;
959 an.type = Type.Mask;
960 an.roiMask = new Mask(mask, width, height,physicalX,physicalY);
961 an.AddPoint(loc);
962 return an;
963 }
964 public static ROI CreateMask(ZCT coord, byte[] mask,int width,int height,PointD loc,double physicalX,double physicalY)
965 {
966 ROI an = new ROI();
967 an.coord = coord;
968 an.type = Type.Mask;
969 an.roiMask = new Mask(mask, width, height, physicalX, physicalY);
970 an.AddPoint(loc);
971 return an;
972 }
977 public void UpdatePoint(PointD p, int i)
978 {
979 if (i < Points.Count)
980 {
981 Points[i] = p;
982 }
983 UpdateBoundingBox();
984 }
990 public PointD GetPoint(int i)
991 {
992 return Points[i];
993 }
997 public PointD[] GetPoints()
998 {
999 return Points.ToArray();
1000 }
1004 public PointF[] GetPointsF()
1005 {
1006 PointF[] pfs = new PointF[Points.Count];
1007 for (int i = 0; i < Points.Count; i++)
1008 {
1009 pfs[i].X = (float)Points[i].X;
1010 pfs[i].Y = (float)Points[i].Y;
1011 }
1012 return pfs;
1013 }
1017 public void AddPoint(PointD p)
1018 {
1019 Points.Add(p);
1020 UpdateBoundingBox();
1021 }
1025 public void AddPoints(PointD[] p)
1026 {
1027 Points.AddRange(p);
1028 UpdateBoundingBox();
1029 }
1033 public void AddPoints(int[] xp, int[] yp)
1034 {
1035 for (int i = 0; i < xp.Length; i++)
1036 {
1037 Points.Add(new PointD(xp[i], yp[i]));
1038 }
1039 UpdateBoundingBox();
1040 }
1044 public void AddPoints(float[] xp, float[] yp)
1045 {
1046 for (int i = 0; i < xp.Length; i++)
1047 {
1048 Points.Add(new PointD(xp[i], yp[i]));
1049 }
1050 UpdateBoundingBox();
1051 }
1055 public void RemovePoints(int[] indexs)
1056 {
1057 List<PointD> inds = new List<PointD>();
1058 for (int i = 0; i < Points.Count; i++)
1059 {
1060 bool found = false;
1061 for (int ind = 0; ind < indexs.Length; ind++)
1062 {
1063 if (indexs[ind] == i)
1064 found = true;
1065 }
1066 if (!found)
1067 inds.Add(Points[i]);
1068 }
1069 Points = inds;
1070 UpdateBoundingBox();
1071 }
1072 public void ClearPoints()
1073 {
1074 Points.Clear();
1075 }
1079 public int GetPointCount()
1080 {
1081 return Points.Count;
1082 }
1088 public PointD[] stringToPoints(string s)
1089 {
1090 List<PointD> pts = new List<PointD>();
1091 string[] ints = s.Split(' ');
1092 for (int i = 0; i < ints.Length; i++)
1093 {
1094 string[] sints;
1095 if (s.Contains("\t"))
1096 sints = ints[i].Split('\t');
1097 else
1098 sints = ints[i].Split(',');
1099 double x = double.Parse(sints[0], CultureInfo.InvariantCulture);
1100 double y = double.Parse(sints[1], CultureInfo.InvariantCulture);
1101 pts.Add(new PointD(x, y));
1102 }
1103 return pts.ToArray();
1104 }
1110 public string PointsToString(BioImage b)
1111 {
1112 string pts = "";
1113 PointD[] ps = b.ToImageSpace(Points);
1114 for (int j = 0; j < ps.Length; j++)
1115 {
1116 if (j == ps.Length - 1)
1117 pts += ps[j].X.ToString(CultureInfo.InvariantCulture) + "," + ps[j].Y.ToString(CultureInfo.InvariantCulture);
1118 else
1119 pts += ps[j].X.ToString(CultureInfo.InvariantCulture) + "," + ps[j].Y.ToString(CultureInfo.InvariantCulture) + " ";
1120 }
1121 return pts;
1122 }
1125 public void UpdateBoundingBox()
1126 {
1127 if(type == Type.Mask)
1128 {
1129 double minx = double.MaxValue;
1130 double miny = double.MaxValue;
1131 double maxx = double.MinValue;
1132 double maxy = double.MinValue;
1133 for (int y = 0; y < roiMask.Height; y++)
1134 {
1135 for (int x = 0; x < roiMask.Width; x++)
1136 {
1137 if (roiMask.IsSelected(x, y))
1138 {
1139 if (minx > x)
1140 minx = x;
1141 if (miny > y)
1142 miny = y;
1143 if (maxx < x)
1144 maxx = x;
1145 if (maxy < y)
1146 maxy = y;
1147 }
1148 }
1149 }
1150 BoundingBox = new RectangleD(PointsD[0].X + (minx * roiMask.PhysicalSizeX), PointsD[0].Y + (miny * roiMask.PhysicalSizeY),
1151 (maxx - minx) * roiMask.PhysicalSizeX, (maxy - miny) * roiMask.PhysicalSizeY);
1152 return;
1153 }
1154 PointD min = new PointD(double.MaxValue, double.MaxValue);
1155 PointD max = new PointD(double.MinValue, double.MinValue);
1156 foreach (PointD p in Points)
1157 {
1158 if (min.X > p.X)
1159 min.X = p.X;
1160 if (min.Y > p.Y)
1161 min.Y = p.Y;
1162
1163 if (max.X < p.X)
1164 max.X = p.X;
1165 if (max.Y < p.Y)
1166 max.Y = p.Y;
1167 }
1168 RectangleD r = new RectangleD();
1169 r.X = min.X;
1170 r.Y = min.Y;
1171 r.W = max.X - min.X;
1172 r.H = max.Y - min.Y;
1173 if (r.W == 0)
1174 r.W = 1;
1175 if (r.H == 0)
1176 r.H = 1;
1177 BoundingBox = r;
1178 }
1179 public void Dispose()
1180 {
1181 if(roiMask!=null)
1182 {
1183 roiMask.Dispose();
1184 }
1185 }
1186 public override string ToString()
1187 {
1188 double w = Math.Round(W, 2, MidpointRounding.ToZero);
1189 double h = Math.Round(H, 2, MidpointRounding.ToZero);
1190 double x = Math.Round(Point.X, 2, MidpointRounding.ToZero);
1191 double y = Math.Round(Point.Y, 2, MidpointRounding.ToZero);
1192 return type.ToString() + ", " + Text + " (" + w + ", " + h + ") " + " (" + x + ", " + y + ") " + coord.ToString();
1193 }
1194 }
1195 /* It's a class that holds a string, an IFilter, and a Type */
1196 public class Filt
1197 {
1198 /* Defining an enum. */
1199 public enum Type
1200 {
1201 Base = 0,
1202 Base2 = 1,
1203 InPlace = 2,
1204 InPlace2 = 3,
1205 InPlacePartial = 4,
1206 Resize = 5,
1207 Rotate = 6,
1208 Transformation = 7,
1209 Copy = 8
1210 }
1211 public string name;
1212 public IFilter filt;
1213 public Type type;
1214 public Filt(string s, IFilter f, Type t)
1215 {
1216 name = s;
1217 filt = f;
1218 type = t;
1219 }
1220 }
1221 public static class Filters
1222 {
1223 public static int[,] indexs;
1229 public static Filt GetFilter(string name)
1230 {
1231 foreach (Filt item in filters)
1232 {
1233 if (item.name == name)
1234 return item;
1235 }
1236 return null;
1237 }
1245 public static Filt GetFilter(int type, int index)
1246 {
1247 return filters[indexs[type, index]];
1248 }
1249 public static List<Filt> filters = new List<Filt>();
1258 public static BioImage Base(string id, string name, bool inPlace)
1259 {
1260 BioImage img = Images.GetImage(id);
1261 if (!inPlace)
1262 img = BioImage.Copy(img);
1263 try
1264 {
1265 Filt f = GetFilter(name);
1266 BaseFilter fi = (BaseFilter)f.filt;
1267 for (int i = 0; i < img.Buffers.Count; i++)
1268 {
1269 Bitmap bm = fi.Apply(img.Buffers[i]);
1270 img.Buffers[i] = bm;
1271 }
1272 if (!inPlace)
1273 {
1274 Images.AddImage(img, true);
1275 }
1276 Recorder.AddLine("Filters.Base(" + '"' + id +
1277 '"' + "," + '"' + name + '"' + "," + inPlace.ToString().ToLower() + ");");
1278 }
1279 catch (Exception e)
1280 {
1281 MessageDialog dialog = new MessageDialog(null, DialogFlags.Modal, MessageType.Info, ButtonsType.Ok, e.Message);
1282 dialog.Show();
1283 }
1284 return img;
1285 }
1296 public static BioImage Base2(string id, string id2, string name, bool inPlace)
1297 {
1298 BioImage c2 = Images.GetImage(id);
1299 BioImage img = Images.GetImage(id2);
1300 if (!inPlace)
1301 img = BioImage.Copy(img);
1302 try
1303 {
1304 Filt f = GetFilter(name);
1305 BaseFilter2 fi = (BaseFilter2)f.filt;
1306 for (int i = 0; i < img.Buffers.Count; i++)
1307 {
1308 fi.OverlayImage = c2.Buffers[i];
1309 img.Buffers[i] = fi.Apply(img.Buffers[i]);
1310 }
1311 if (!inPlace)
1312 {
1313 Images.AddImage(img, true);
1314 }
1315 Recorder.AddLine("Filters.Base2(" + '"' + id + '"' + "," +
1316 '"' + id2 + '"' + "," + '"' + name + '"' + "," + inPlace.ToString().ToLower() + ");");
1317 return img;
1318 }
1319 catch (Exception e)
1320 {
1321 MessageDialog dialog = new MessageDialog(null, DialogFlags.Modal, MessageType.Info, ButtonsType.Ok, e.Message);
1322 dialog.Show();
1323 }
1324 return img;
1325 }
1334 public static BioImage InPlace(string id, string name, bool inPlace)
1335 {
1336 BioImage img = Images.GetImage(id);
1337 if (!inPlace)
1338 img = BioImage.Copy(img);
1339 try
1340 {
1341 Filt f = GetFilter(name);
1342 BaseInPlaceFilter fi = (BaseInPlaceFilter)f.filt;
1343 for (int i = 0; i < img.Buffers.Count; i++)
1344 {
1345 img.Buffers[i] = fi.Apply((Bitmap)img.Buffers[i]);
1346 }
1347 if (!inPlace)
1348 {
1349 Images.AddImage(img, true);
1350 }
1351 Recorder.AddLine("Filters.InPlace(" + '"' + id +
1352 '"' + "," + '"' + name + '"' + "," + inPlace.ToString().ToLower() + ");");
1353 return img;
1354 }
1355 catch (Exception e)
1356 {
1357 MessageDialog dialog = new MessageDialog(null, DialogFlags.Modal, MessageType.Info, ButtonsType.Ok, e.Message);
1358 dialog.Show();
1359 }
1360 return img;
1361 }
1370 public static BioImage InPlace2(string id, string id2, string name, bool inPlace)
1371 {
1372 BioImage c2 = Images.GetImage(id);
1373 BioImage img = Images.GetImage(id2);
1374 if (!inPlace)
1375 img = BioImage.Copy(img);
1376 try
1377 {
1378 Filt f = GetFilter(name);
1379 BaseInPlaceFilter2 fi = (BaseInPlaceFilter2)f.filt;
1380 for (int i = 0; i < img.Buffers.Count; i++)
1381 {
1382 fi.OverlayImage = c2.Buffers[i];
1383 img.Buffers[i] = fi.Apply(img.Buffers[i]);
1384 }
1385 if (!inPlace)
1386 {
1387 Images.AddImage(img, true);
1388 }
1389 Recorder.AddLine("Filters.InPlace2(" + '"' + id + '"' + "," +
1390 '"' + id2 + '"' + "," + '"' + name + '"' + "," + inPlace.ToString().ToLower() + ");");
1391 return img;
1392 }
1393 catch (Exception e)
1394 {
1395 MessageDialog dialog = new MessageDialog(null, DialogFlags.Modal, MessageType.Info, ButtonsType.Ok, e.Message);
1396 dialog.Show();
1397 }
1398 return img;
1399 }
1408 public static BioImage InPlacePartial(string id, string name, bool inPlace)
1409 {
1410 BioImage img = Images.GetImage(id);
1411 if (!inPlace)
1412 img = BioImage.Copy(img);
1413 try
1414 {
1415 Filt f = GetFilter(name);
1416 BaseInPlacePartialFilter fi = (BaseInPlacePartialFilter)f.filt;
1417 for (int i = 0; i < img.Buffers.Count; i++)
1418 {
1419 img.Buffers[i] = fi.Apply(img.Buffers[i]);
1420 }
1421 if (!inPlace)
1422 {
1423 Images.AddImage(img, true);
1424 }
1425 Recorder.AddLine("Filters.InPlacePartial(" + '"' + id +
1426 '"' + "," + '"' + name + '"' + "," + inPlace.ToString().ToLower() + ");");
1427 return img;
1428 }
1429 catch (Exception e)
1430 {
1431 MessageDialog dialog = new MessageDialog(null, DialogFlags.Modal, MessageType.Info, ButtonsType.Ok, e.Message);
1432 dialog.Show();
1433 }
1434 return img;
1435 }
1446 public static BioImage Resize(string id, string name, bool inPlace, int w, int h)
1447 {
1448 BioImage img = Images.GetImage(id);
1449 if (!inPlace)
1450 img = BioImage.Copy(img);
1451 try
1452 {
1453 Filt f = GetFilter(name);
1454 BaseResizeFilter fi = (BaseResizeFilter)f.filt;
1455 fi.NewHeight = h;
1456 fi.NewWidth = w;
1457 for (int i = 0; i < img.Buffers.Count; i++)
1458 {
1459 img.Buffers[i] = fi.Apply(img.Buffers[i]);
1460 }
1461 if (!inPlace)
1462 {
1463 Images.AddImage(img, true);
1464 }
1465 Recorder.AddLine("Filters.Resize(" + '"' + id +
1466 '"' + "," + '"' + name + '"' + "," + inPlace.ToString().ToLower() + "," + w + "," + h + ");");
1467 }
1468 catch (Exception e)
1469 {
1470 MessageDialog dialog = new MessageDialog(null, DialogFlags.Modal, MessageType.Info, ButtonsType.Ok, e.Message);
1471 dialog.Show();
1472 }
1473 return img;
1474 }
1487 public static BioImage Rotate(string id, string name, bool inPlace, float angle, int a, int r, int g, int b)
1488 {
1489 BioImage img = Images.GetImage(id);
1490 if (!inPlace)
1491 img = BioImage.Copy(Images.GetImage(id));
1492 try
1493 {
1494 Filt f = GetFilter(name);
1495 BaseRotateFilter fi = (BaseRotateFilter)f.filt;
1496 fi.Angle = angle;
1497 fi.FillColor = Color.FromArgb(a, r, g, b);
1498 for (int i = 0; i < img.Buffers.Count; i++)
1499 {
1500 img.Buffers[i] = fi.Apply(img.Buffers[i]);
1501 }
1502 if (!inPlace)
1503 {
1504 Images.AddImage(img, true);
1505 }
1506 Recorder.AddLine("Filters.Rotate(" + '"' + id +
1507 '"' + "," + '"' + name + '"' + "," + inPlace.ToString().ToLower() + "," + angle.ToString() + "," +
1508 a + "," + r + "," + g + "," + b + ");");
1509 }
1510 catch (Exception e)
1511 {
1512 MessageDialog dialog = new MessageDialog(null, DialogFlags.Modal, MessageType.Info, ButtonsType.Ok, e.Message);
1513 dialog.Show();
1514 }
1515 return img;
1516
1517 }
1528 public static BioImage Transformation(string id, string name, bool inPlace, float angle)
1529 {
1530 BioImage img = Images.GetImage(id);
1531 if (!inPlace)
1532 img = BioImage.Copy(img);
1533 try
1534 {
1535 Filt f = GetFilter(name);
1536 BaseTransformationFilter fi = (BaseTransformationFilter)f.filt;
1537 for (int i = 0; i < img.Buffers.Count; i++)
1538 {
1539 img.Buffers[i] = fi.Apply(img.Buffers[i]);
1540 }
1541 if (!inPlace)
1542 {
1543 Images.AddImage(img, true);
1544 }
1545 Recorder.AddLine("Filters.Transformation(" + '"' + id +
1546 '"' + "," + '"' + name + '"' + "," + inPlace.ToString().ToLower() + "," + angle + ");");
1547 }
1548 catch (Exception e)
1549 {
1550 MessageDialog dialog = new MessageDialog(null, DialogFlags.Modal, MessageType.Info, ButtonsType.Ok, e.Message);
1551 dialog.Show();
1552 }
1553 return img;
1554 }
1563 public static BioImage Copy(string id, string name, bool inPlace)
1564 {
1565 BioImage img = Images.GetImage(id);
1566 if (!inPlace)
1567 img = BioImage.Copy(img);
1568 try
1569 {
1570 Filt f = GetFilter(name);
1571 BaseUsingCopyPartialFilter fi = (BaseUsingCopyPartialFilter)f.filt;
1572 for (int i = 0; i < img.Buffers.Count; i++)
1573 {
1574 img.Buffers[i] = fi.Apply((Bitmap)img.Buffers[i]);
1575 }
1576 if (!inPlace)
1577 {
1578 Images.AddImage(img, true);
1579 }
1580 Recorder.AddLine("Filters.Copy(" + '"' + id +
1581 '"' + "," + '"' + name + '"' + "," + inPlace.ToString().ToLower() + ");");
1582 }
1583 catch (Exception e)
1584 {
1585 MessageDialog dialog = new MessageDialog(null, DialogFlags.Modal, MessageType.Info, ButtonsType.Ok, e.Message);
1586 dialog.Show();
1587 }
1588 return img;
1589 }
1599 public static BioImage Crop(string id, double x, double y, double w, double h)
1600 {
1601 BioImage c = Images.GetImage(id);
1602 RectangleF r = c.ToImageSpace(new RectangleD(x, y, w, h));
1603 Rectangle rec = new Rectangle((int)r.X, (int)r.Y, (int)Math.Abs(r.Width), (int)Math.Abs(r.Height));
1604 BioImage img = BioImage.Copy(c, false);
1605 for (int i = 0; i < img.Buffers.Count; i++)
1606 {
1607 img.Buffers[i].Crop(rec);
1608 }
1609 BioImage.AutoThreshold(img, true);
1610 if (img.bitsPerPixel > 8)
1611 img.StackThreshold(true);
1612 else
1613 img.StackThreshold(false);
1614 Recorder.AddLine("Filters.Crop(" + '"' + id + '"' + "," + x + "," + y + "," + w + "," + h + ");");
1615 //App.tabsView.AddTab(img);
1616 return img;
1617 }
1624 public static BioImage Crop(string id, RectangleD r)
1625 {
1626 return Crop(id, r.X, r.Y, r.W, r.H);
1627 }
1628
1630 public static void Init()
1631 {
1632 //Base Filters
1633 indexs = new int[9, 32];
1634 indexs[0, 0] = filters.Count;
1635 Filt f = new Filt("AdaptiveSmoothing", new AdaptiveSmoothing(), Filt.Type.Base);
1636 filters.Add(f);
1637 indexs[0, 1] = filters.Count;
1638 f = new Filt("BayerFilter", new BayerFilter(), Filt.Type.Base);
1639 filters.Add(f);
1640 indexs[0, 2] = filters.Count;
1641 f = new Filt("BayerFilterOptimized", new BayerFilterOptimized(), Filt.Type.Base);
1642 filters.Add(f);
1643 indexs[0, 3] = filters.Count;
1644 f = new Filt("BayerDithering", new BayerDithering(), Filt.Type.Base);
1645 filters.Add(f);
1646 indexs[0, 4] = filters.Count;
1647 f = new Filt("ConnectedComponentsLabeling", new ConnectedComponentsLabeling(), Filt.Type.Base);
1648 filters.Add(f);
1649 indexs[0, 5] = filters.Count;
1650 f = new Filt("ExtractChannel", new ExtractChannel(), Filt.Type.Base);
1651 filters.Add(f);
1652 indexs[0, 6] = filters.Count;
1653 f = new Filt("ExtractNormalizedRGBChannel", new ExtractNormalizedRGBChannel(), Filt.Type.Base);
1654 filters.Add(f);
1655 indexs[0, 7] = filters.Count;
1656 f = new Filt("Grayscale", new Grayscale(0.2125, 0.7154, 0.0721), Filt.Type.Base);
1657 filters.Add(f);
1658 //f = new Filt("TexturedFilter", new TexturedFilter());
1659 //filters.Add(f);
1660 indexs[0, 8] = filters.Count;
1661 f = new Filt("WaterWave", new WaterWave(), Filt.Type.Base);
1662 filters.Add(f);
1663 indexs[0, 9] = filters.Count;
1664 f = new Filt("YCbCrExtractChannel", new YCbCrExtractChannel(), Filt.Type.Base);
1665 filters.Add(f);
1666 indexs[0, 10] = filters.Count;
1667 //BaseFilter2
1668
1669 f = new Filt("ThresholdedDifference", new ThresholdedDifference(), Filt.Type.Base2);
1670 filters.Add(f);
1671 indexs[1, 0] = filters.Count;
1672 f = new Filt("ThresholdedEuclideanDifference", new ThresholdedEuclideanDifference(), Filt.Type.Base2);
1673 filters.Add(f);
1674 indexs[1, 1] = filters.Count;
1675
1676 //BaseInPlaceFilter
1677 indexs[2, 0] = filters.Count;
1678 f = new Filt("BackwardQuadrilateralTransformation", new BackwardQuadrilateralTransformation(), Filt.Type.InPlace);
1679 filters.Add(f);
1680 indexs[2, 1] = filters.Count;
1681 f = new Filt("BlobsFiltering", new BlobsFiltering(), Filt.Type.InPlace);
1682 filters.Add(f);
1683 indexs[2, 2] = filters.Count;
1684 f = new Filt("BottomHat", new BottomHat(), Filt.Type.InPlace);
1685 filters.Add(f);
1686 indexs[2, 3] = filters.Count;
1687 f = new Filt("BradleyLocalThresholding", new BradleyLocalThresholding(), Filt.Type.InPlace);
1688 filters.Add(f);
1689 indexs[2, 4] = filters.Count;
1690 f = new Filt("CanvasCrop", new CanvasCrop(new Rectangle(0, 0, 0, 0)), Filt.Type.InPlace);
1691 filters.Add(f);
1692 indexs[2, 5] = filters.Count;
1693 f = new Filt("CanvasFill", new CanvasFill(new Rectangle(0, 0, 0, 0)), Filt.Type.InPlace);
1694 filters.Add(f);
1695 indexs[2, 6] = filters.Count;
1696 f = new Filt("CanvasMove", new CanvasMove(new IntPoint()), Filt.Type.InPlace);
1697 filters.Add(f);
1698 indexs[2, 7] = filters.Count;
1699 f = new Filt("FillHoles", new FillHoles(), Filt.Type.InPlace);
1700 filters.Add(f);
1701 indexs[2, 8] = filters.Count;
1702 f = new Filt("FlatFieldCorrection", new FlatFieldCorrection(), Filt.Type.InPlace);
1703 filters.Add(f);
1704 indexs[2, 9] = filters.Count;
1705 f = new Filt("TopHat", new TopHat(), Filt.Type.InPlace);
1706 filters.Add(f);
1707
1708 //BaseInPlaceFilter2
1709 indexs[3, 0] = filters.Count;
1710 f = new Filt("Add", new Add(), Filt.Type.InPlace2);
1711 filters.Add(f);
1712 indexs[3, 1] = filters.Count;
1713 f = new Filt("Difference", new Difference(), Filt.Type.InPlace2);
1714 filters.Add(f);
1715 indexs[3, 2] = filters.Count;
1716 f = new Filt("Intersect", new Intersect(), Filt.Type.InPlace2);
1717 filters.Add(f);
1718 indexs[3, 3] = filters.Count;
1719 f = new Filt("Merge", new Merge(), Filt.Type.InPlace2);
1720 filters.Add(f);
1721 indexs[3, 4] = filters.Count;
1722 f = new Filt("Morph", new Morph(), Filt.Type.InPlace2);
1723 filters.Add(f);
1724 indexs[3, 5] = filters.Count;
1725 f = new Filt("MoveTowards", new MoveTowards(), Filt.Type.InPlace2);
1726 filters.Add(f);
1727 indexs[3, 6] = filters.Count;
1728 f = new Filt("StereoAnaglyph", new StereoAnaglyph(), Filt.Type.InPlace2);
1729 filters.Add(f);
1730 indexs[3, 7] = filters.Count;
1731 f = new Filt("Subtract", new Subtract(), Filt.Type.InPlace2);
1732 filters.Add(f);
1733 //f = new Filt("Add", new TexturedMerge(), Filt.Type.InPlace2);
1734 //filters.Add(f);
1735
1736 //BaseInPlacePartialFilter
1737 indexs[4, 0] = filters.Count;

1739 filters.Add(f);
1740 //f = new Filt("ApplyMask", new ApplyMask(), Filt.Type.InPlacePartial2);
1741 //filters.Add(f);

1899 filters.Add(f);
1900 indexs[8, 1] = filters.Count;

1902 filters.Add(f);
1903 indexs[8, 2] = filters.Count;
1904 f = new Filt("BinaryErosion3x3 ", new BinaryErosion3x3(), Filt.Type.Copy);
1905 filters.Add(f);
1906
1907 }
1908 }
1909 public class ImageInfo
1910 {
1911 bool HasPhysicalXY = false;
1912 bool HasPhysicalXYZ = false;
1913 private double physicalSizeX = -1;
1914 private double physicalSizeY = -1;
1915 private double physicalSizeZ = -1;
1916 public double PhysicalSizeX
1917 {
1918 get { return physicalSizeX; }
1919 set
1920 {
1921 physicalSizeX = value;
1922 HasPhysicalXY = true;
1923 }
1924 }
1925 public double PhysicalSizeY
1926 {
1927 get { return physicalSizeY; }
1928 set
1929 {
1930 physicalSizeY = value;
1931 HasPhysicalXY = true;
1932 }
1933 }
1934 public double PhysicalSizeZ
1935 {
1936 get { return physicalSizeZ; }
1937 set
1938 {
1939 physicalSizeZ = value;
1940 HasPhysicalXYZ = true;
1941 }
1942 }
1943
1944 bool HasStageXY = false;
1945 bool HasStageXYZ = false;
1946 public double stageSizeX = -1;
1947 public double stageSizeY = -1;
1948 public double stageSizeZ = -1;
1949 public double StageSizeX
1950 {
1951 get { return stageSizeX; }
1952 set
1953 {
1954 stageSizeX = value;
1955 HasStageXY = true;
1956 }
1957 }
1958 public double StageSizeY
1959 {
1960 get { return stageSizeY; }
1961 set
1962 {
1963 stageSizeY = value;
1964 HasStageXY = true;
1965 }
1966 }
1967 public double StageSizeZ
1968 {
1969 get { return stageSizeZ; }
1970 set
1971 {
1972 stageSizeZ = value;
1973 HasStageXYZ = true;
1974 }
1975 }
1976
1977 private int series = 0;
1978 public int Series
1979 {
1980 get { return series; }
1981 set { series = value; }
1982 }
1983
1987 public ImageInfo Copy()
1988 {
1989 ImageInfo inf = new ImageInfo();
1990 inf.PhysicalSizeX = PhysicalSizeX;
1991 inf.PhysicalSizeY = PhysicalSizeY;
1992 inf.PhysicalSizeZ = PhysicalSizeZ;
1993 inf.StageSizeX = StageSizeX;
1994 inf.StageSizeY = StageSizeY;
1995 inf.StageSizeZ = StageSizeZ;
1996 inf.HasPhysicalXY = HasPhysicalXY;
1997 inf.HasPhysicalXYZ = HasPhysicalXYZ;
1998 inf.StageSizeX = StageSizeX;
1999 inf.StageSizeY = StageSizeY;
2000 inf.StageSizeZ = StageSizeZ;
2001 inf.HasStageXY = HasStageXY;
2002 inf.HasStageXYZ = HasStageXYZ;
2003 return inf;
2004 }
2005
2006 }
2007 public class BioImage : IDisposable
2008 {
2009 public class WellPlate
2010 {
2011 public class Well
2012 {
2013 public string ID { get; set; }
2014 public int Index { get; set; }
2015 public int Column { get; set; }
2016 public int Row { get; set; }
2017 public System.Drawing.Color Color { get; set; }
2018 public List<Sample> Samples = new List<Sample>();
2019 public class Sample
2020 {
2021 public string ID { get; set; }
2022 public int Index { get; set; }
2023 public PointD Position { get; set; }
2024 public Timestamp Time { get; set; }
2025 }
2026 }
2027 public List<Well> Wells = new List<Well>();
2028
2029 public PointD Origin;
2030 public string ID;
2031 public string Name;
2032 public WellPlate(BioImage b)
2033 {
2034 ID = b.meta.getPlateID(b.series);
2035 Name = b.meta.getPlateName(b.series);
2036 double x, y;
2037 if (b.meta.getPlateWellOriginX(b.series) != null)
2038 x = b.meta.getPlateWellOriginX(b.series).value().doubleValue();
2039 else
2040 x = 0;
2041 if (b.meta.getPlateWellOriginY(b.series) != null)
2042 y = b.meta.getPlateWellOriginY(b.series).value().doubleValue();
2043 else
2044 y = 0;
2045 Origin = new PointD(x, y);
2046 int ws = b.meta.getWellCount(b.series);
2047 for (int i = 0; i < ws; i++)
2048 {
2049 Well w = new Well();
2050 w.ID = b.meta.getWellID(b.series, i);
2051 w.Column = b.meta.getWellColumn(b.series, i).getNumberValue().intValue();
2052 w.Row = b.meta.getWellRow(b.series, i).getNumberValue().intValue();
2053 int wsc = b.meta.getWellSampleCount(b.series, i);
2054 for (int s = 0; s < wsc; s++)
2055 {
2056 Well.Sample sa = new Well.Sample();
2057 sa.Time = b.meta.getWellSampleTimepoint(b.series, i, s);
2058 sa.Index = b.meta.getWellSampleIndex(b.series, i, s).getNumberValue().intValue();
2059 double sx, sy;
2060 if (b.meta.getWellSamplePositionX(b.series, i, s) != null)
2061 sx = b.meta.getWellSamplePositionX(b.series, i, s).value().doubleValue();
2062 else sx = 0;
2063 if (b.meta.getWellSamplePositionY(b.series, i, s) != null)
2064 sy = b.meta.getWellSamplePositionY(b.series, i, s).value().doubleValue();
2065 else sy = 0;
2066 sa.Position = new PointD(sx, sy);
2067 sa.ID = b.meta.getWellSampleID(b.series, i, s);
2068 w.Samples.Add(sa);
2069 }
2070 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color c = b.meta.getWellColor(b.series, i);
2071 if (c != null)
2072 w.Color = System.Drawing.Color.FromArgb(c.getAlpha(), c.getRed(), c.getGreen(), c.getBlue());
2073 Wells.Add(w);
2074 }
2075
2076 }
2077 }
2078 public WellPlate Plate = null;
2079 public int[,,] Coords;
2080 private ZCT coordinate;
2081 public ZCT Coordinate
2082 {
2083 get
2084 {
2085 return coordinate;
2086 }
2087 set
2088 {
2089 coordinate = value;
2090 }
2091 }
2092 public enum ImageType
2093 {
2094 stack,
2095 pyramidal,
2096 well,
2097 }
2098 private string id;
2099 public ImageType Type { get; set; }
2100 public List<Channel> Channels = new List<Channel>();
2101 public List<Resolution> Resolutions = new List<Resolution>();
2102 public List<AForge.Bitmap> Buffers = new List<AForge.Bitmap>();
2103 public List<NetVips.Image> vipPages = new List<NetVips.Image>();
2104 int level = 0;
2105 public int Level
2106 {
2107 get
2108 {
2109 if (openslideBase != null)
2110 return OpenSlideGTK.TileUtil.GetLevel(openslideBase.Schema.Resolutions, Resolution);
2111 else
2112 if (slideBase != null)
2113 return LevelFromResolution(Resolution);
2114 return level;
2115 }
2116 set
2117 {
2118 if(Type == ImageType.well)
2119 {
2120 level = value;
2121 reader.setId(file);
2122 reader.setSeries(value);
2123 // read the image data bytes
2124 int pages = reader.getImageCount();
2125 bool inter = reader.isInterleaved();
2126 PixelFormat pf = Buffers[0].PixelFormat;
2127 int w = Buffers[0].SizeX; int h = Buffers[0].SizeY;
2128 Buffers.Clear();
2129 for (int p = 0; p < pages; p++)
2130 {
2131 Bitmap bf;
2132 byte[] bytes = reader.openBytes(p);
2133 bf = new Bitmap(file, w, h, pf, bytes, new ZCT(), p, null, littleEndian, inter);
2134 Buffers.Add(bf);
2135 }
2136 }
2137 }
2138 }
2139 public VolumeD Volume;
2140 public List<ROI> Annotations = new List<ROI>();
2141 public string filename = "";
2142 public string script = "";
2143 public string Filename
2144 {
2145 get
2146 {
2147 return filename;
2148 }
2149 set
2150 {
2151 filename = value;
2152 }
2153 }
2154 public int[] rgbChannels = new int[3];
2155 public int RGBChannelCount
2156 {
2157 get
2158 {
2159 return Buffers[0].RGBChannelsCount;
2160 }
2161 }
2162 public int bitsPerPixel;
2163 public int imagesPerSeries = 0;
2164 public int seriesCount = 1;
2165 public double frameInterval = 0;
2166 public bool littleEndian = false;
2167 public bool isGroup = false;
2168 public long loadTimeMS = 0;
2169 public long loadTimeTicks = 0;
2170 public bool selected = false;
2171 public Statistics Statistics
2172 {
2173 get
2174 {
2175 return statistics;
2176 }
2177 set
2178 {
2179 statistics = value;
2180 }
2181 }
2182 private int sizeZ, sizeC, sizeT;
2183 private Statistics statistics;
2184 private double resolution = 1;
2185 public double Resolution
2186 {
2187 get { return resolution; }
2188 set
2189 {
2190 if (value < 0)
2191 return;
2192 resolution = value;
2193 }
2194 }
2195
2196 ImageInfo imageInfo = new ImageInfo();
2201 public static BioImage Copy(BioImage b, bool rois)
2202 {
2203 BioImage bi = new BioImage(b.ID);
2204 if (rois)
2205 foreach (ROI an in b.Annotations)
2206 {
2207 bi.Annotations.Add(an);
2208 }
2209 foreach (Bitmap bf in b.Buffers)
2210 {
2211 bi.Buffers.Add(bf.Copy());
2212 }
2213 foreach (Channel c in b.Channels)
2214 {
2215 bi.Channels.Add(c);
2216 }
2217 bi.Volume = b.Volume;
2218 bi.Coords = b.Coords;
2219 bi.sizeZ = b.sizeZ;
2220 bi.sizeC = b.sizeC;
2221 bi.sizeT = b.sizeT;
2222 bi.series = b.series;
2223 bi.seriesCount = b.seriesCount;
2224 bi.frameInterval = b.frameInterval;
2225 bi.littleEndian = b.littleEndian;
2226 bi.isGroup = b.isGroup;
2227 bi.imageInfo = b.imageInfo;
2228 bi.bitsPerPixel = b.bitsPerPixel;
2229 bi.file = b.file;
2230 bi.filename = b.filename;
2231 bi.Resolutions = b.Resolutions;
2232 bi.statistics = b.statistics;
2233 bi.openSlideImage = b.openSlideImage;
2234 return bi;
2235 }
2241 public static BioImage Copy(BioImage b)
2242 {
2243 return Copy(b, true);
2244 }
2250 public BioImage Copy(bool rois)
2251 {
2252 return BioImage.Copy(this, rois);
2253 }
2257 public BioImage Copy()
2258 {
2259 return BioImage.Copy(this, true);
2260 }
2268 public static BioImage CopyInfo(BioImage b, bool copyAnnotations, bool copyChannels)
2269 {
2270 BioImage bi = new BioImage(b.ID);
2271 if (copyAnnotations)
2272 foreach (ROI an in b.Annotations)
2273 {
2274 bi.Annotations.Add(an);
2275 }
2276 if (copyChannels)
2277 foreach (Channel c in b.Channels)
2278 {
2279 bi.Channels.Add(c.Copy());
2280 }
2281
2282 bi.Coords = b.Coords;
2283 bi.Volume = b.Volume;
2284 bi.sizeZ = b.sizeZ;
2285 bi.sizeC = b.sizeC;
2286 bi.sizeT = b.sizeT;
2287 bi.series = b.series;
2288 bi.seriesCount = b.seriesCount;
2289 bi.frameInterval = b.frameInterval;
2290 bi.littleEndian = b.littleEndian;
2291 bi.isGroup = b.isGroup;
2292 bi.imageInfo = b.imageInfo;
2293 bi.bitsPerPixel = b.bitsPerPixel;
2294 bi.Resolutions = b.Resolutions;
2295 bi.Coordinate = b.Coordinate;
2296 bi.file = b.file;
2297 bi.Filename = b.Filename;
2298 bi.ID = Images.GetImageName(b.file);
2299 bi.statistics = b.statistics;
2300 return bi;
2301 }
2310 public double GetLevelDownsample(int level)
2311 {
2312 int originalWidth = Resolutions[0].SizeX; // Width of the original level
2313 int nextLevelWidth = Resolutions[level].SizeX; // Width of the next level (downsampled)
2314 return (double)originalWidth / (double)nextLevelWidth;
2315 }
2316 public double[] GetLevelDownsamples()
2317 {
2318 double[] ds = new double[Resolutions.Count];
2319 for (int i = 0; i < Resolutions.Count; i++)
2320 {
2321 ds[i] = Resolutions[0].PhysicalSizeX * GetLevelDownsample(i);
2322 }
2323 return ds;
2324 }
2330 public int LevelFromResolution(double Resolution)
2331 {
2332 double[] ds = GetLevelDownsamples();
2333 for (int i = 0; i < ds.Length; i++)
2334 {
2335 if (ds[i] > Resolution)
2336 return i - 1;
2337 }
2338 return Resolutions.Count-1;
2339 }
2345 public double GetUnitPerPixel(int level)
2346 {
2347 return Resolutions[0].PhysicalSizeX * GetLevelDownsample(level);
2348 }
2349 public string ID
2350 {
2351 get { return id; }
2352 set { id = value; }
2353 }
2354 public int ImageCount
2355 {
2356 get
2357 {
2358 return Buffers.Count;
2359 }
2360 }
2361 public double PhysicalSizeX
2362 {
2363 get { return Resolutions[Level].PhysicalSizeX; }
2364 }
2365 public double PhysicalSizeY
2366 {
2367 get { return Resolutions[Level].PhysicalSizeY; }
2368 }
2369 public double PhysicalSizeZ
2370 {
2371 get { return Resolutions[Level].PhysicalSizeZ; }
2372 }
2373 public double StageSizeX
2374 {
2375 get
2376 {
2377 return Resolutions[Level].StageSizeX;
2378 }
2379 set { imageInfo.StageSizeX = value; }
2380 }
2381 public double StageSizeY
2382 {
2383 get { return Resolutions[Level].StageSizeY; }
2384 set { imageInfo.StageSizeY = value; }
2385 }
2386 public double StageSizeZ
2387 {
2388 get { return Resolutions[Level].StageSizeZ; }
2389 set { imageInfo.StageSizeZ = value; }
2390 }
2391 Size s = new Size(1920, 1080);
2392 public Size PyramidalSize { get { return s; } set { s = value; } }
2393 PointD pyramidalOrigin = new PointD(0, 0);
2394 public PointD PyramidalOrigin
2395 {
2396 get { return pyramidalOrigin; }
2397 set
2398 {
2399 pyramidalOrigin = value;
2400 }
2401 }
2402 public int series
2403 {
2404 get
2405 {
2406 return imageInfo.Series;
2407 }
2408 set
2409 {
2410 imageInfo.Series = value;
2411 }
2412 }
2413
2414 static bool initialized = false;
2415 OpenSlideBase openslideBase;
2416 public OpenSlideBase OpenSlideBase { get { return openslideBase; } }
2417 SlideBase slideBase;
2418 public SlideBase SlideBase { get { return slideBase; } }
2419 public Channel RChannel
2420 {
2421 get
2422 {
2423 if (Channels[0].range.Length == 1)
2424 return Channels[rgbChannels[0]];
2425 else
2426 return Channels[0];
2427 }
2428 }
2429 public Channel GChannel
2430 {
2431 get
2432 {
2433 if (Channels[0].range.Length == 1)
2434 return Channels[rgbChannels[1]];
2435 else
2436 return Channels[0];
2437 }
2438 }
2439 public Channel BChannel
2440 {
2441 get
2442 {
2443 if (Channels[0].range.Length == 1)
2444 return Channels[rgbChannels[2]];
2445 else
2446 return Channels[0];
2447 }
2448 }
2449 private List<ROI> annotationsR = new List<ROI>();
2450 public List<ROI> AnnotationsR
2451 {
2452 get
2453 {
2454 return GetAnnotations(Coordinate.Z, RChannel.Index, Coordinate.T);
2455 }
2456 }
2457 private List<ROI> annotationsG = new List<ROI>();
2458 public List<ROI> AnnotationsG
2459 {
2460 get
2461 {
2462 return GetAnnotations(Coordinate.Z, GChannel.Index, Coordinate.T);
2463 }
2464 }
2465 private List<ROI> annotationsB = new List<ROI>();
2466 public List<ROI> AnnotationsB
2467 {
2468 get
2469 {
2470 return GetAnnotations(Coordinate.Z, BChannel.Index, Coordinate.T);
2471 }
2472 }
2473 public List<ROI> AnnotationsRGB
2474 {
2475 get
2476 {
2477 if (SelectedImage == null)
2478 return null;
2479 List<ROI> ans = new List<ROI>();
2480 if (App.viewer.Mode == ViewMode.RGBImage)
2481 {
2482 if (App.viewer.showRROIs)
2483 ans.AddRange(AnnotationsR);
2484 if (App.viewer.showGROIs)
2485 ans.AddRange(AnnotationsG);
2486 if (App.viewer.showBROIs)
2487 ans.AddRange(AnnotationsB);
2488 }
2489 else
2490 {
2491 ans.AddRange(GetAnnotations(Coordinate));
2492 }
2493 return ans;
2494 }
2495 }
2496 public class ImageJDesc
2497 {
2498 public string ImageJ;
2499 public int images = 0;
2500 public int channels = 0;
2501 public int slices = 0;
2502 public int frames = 0;
2503 public bool hyperstack;
2504 public string mode;
2505 public string unit;
2506 public double finterval = 0;
2507 public double spacing = 0;
2508 public bool loop;
2509 public double min = 0;
2510 public double max = 0;
2511 public int count;
2512 public bool bit8color = false;
2513
2522 public ImageJDesc FromImage(BioImage b)
2523 {
2524 ImageJ = "";
2525 images = b.ImageCount;
2526 channels = b.SizeC;
2527 slices = b.SizeZ;
2528 frames = b.SizeT;
2529 hyperstack = true;
2530 mode = "grayscale";
2531 unit = "micron";
2532 finterval = b.frameInterval;
2533 spacing = b.PhysicalSizeZ;
2534 loop = false;
2535 /*
2536 double dmax = double.MinValue;
2537 double dmin = double.MaxValue;
2538 foreach (Channel c in b.Channels)
2539 {
2540 if(dmax < c.Max)
2541 dmax = c.Max;
2542 if(dmin > c.Min)
2543 dmin = c.Min;
2544 }
2545 min = dmin;
2546 max = dmax;
2547 */
2548 min = b.Channels[0].RangeR.Min;
2549 max = b.Channels[0].RangeR.Max;
2550 return this;
2551 }
2555 public string GetString()
2556 {
2557 string s = "";
2558 s += "ImageJ=" + ImageJ + "\n";
2559 s += "images=" + images + "\n";
2560 s += "channels=" + channels.ToString() + "\n";
2561 s += "slices=" + slices.ToString() + "\n";
2562 s += "frames=" + frames.ToString() + "\n";
2563 s += "hyperstack=" + hyperstack.ToString() + "\n";
2564 s += "mode=" + mode.ToString() + "\n";
2565 s += "unit=" + unit.ToString() + "\n";
2566 s += "finterval=" + finterval.ToString() + "\n";
2567 s += "spacing=" + spacing.ToString() + "\n";
2568 s += "loop=" + loop.ToString() + "\n";
2569 s += "min=" + min.ToString() + "\n";
2570 s += "max=" + max.ToString() + "\n";
2571 return s;
2572 }
2576 public void SetString(string desc)
2577 {
2578 string[] lines = desc.Split(new string[] { "\r\n", "\r", "\n" }, StringSplitOptions.None);
2579 int maxlen = 20;
2580 for (int i = 0; i < lines.Length; i++)
2581 {
2582 if (i < maxlen)
2583 {
2584 string[] sp = lines[i].Split('=');
2585 if (sp[0] == "ImageJ")
2586 ImageJ = sp[1];
2587 if (sp[0] == "images")
2588 images = int.Parse(sp[1], CultureInfo.InvariantCulture);
2589 if (sp[0] == "channels")
2590 channels = int.Parse(sp[1], CultureInfo.InvariantCulture);
2591 if (sp[0] == "slices")
2592 slices = int.Parse(sp[1], CultureInfo.InvariantCulture);
2593 if (sp[0] == "frames")
2594 frames = int.Parse(sp[1], CultureInfo.InvariantCulture);
2595 if (sp[0] == "hyperstack")
2596 hyperstack = bool.Parse(sp[1]);
2597 if (sp[0] == "mode")
2598 mode = sp[1];
2599 if (sp[0] == "unit")
2600 unit = sp[1];
2601 if (sp[0] == "finterval")
2602 finterval = double.Parse(sp[1], CultureInfo.InvariantCulture);
2603 if (sp[0] == "spacing")
2604 spacing = double.Parse(sp[1], CultureInfo.InvariantCulture);
2605 if (sp[0] == "loop")
2606 loop = bool.Parse(sp[1]);
2607 if (sp[0] == "min")
2608 min = double.Parse(sp[1], CultureInfo.InvariantCulture);
2609 if (sp[0] == "max")
2610 max = double.Parse(sp[1], CultureInfo.InvariantCulture);
2611 if (sp[0] == "8bitcolor")
2612 bit8color = bool.Parse(sp[1]);
2613 }
2614 else
2615 return;
2616 }
2617
2618 }
2619 }
2620 public int SizeX
2621 {
2622 get
2623 {
2624 if (Buffers.Count > 0)
2625 return Buffers[0].SizeX;
2626 else return 0;
2627 }
2628 }
2629 public int SizeY
2630 {
2631 get
2632 {
2633 if (Buffers.Count > 0)
2634 return Buffers[0].SizeY;
2635 else return 0;
2636 }
2637 }
2638 public int SizeZ
2639 {
2640 get { return sizeZ; }
2641 }
2642 public int SizeC
2643 {
2644 get { return sizeC; }
2645 }
2646 public int SizeT
2647 {
2648 get { return sizeT; }
2649 }
2650 public static bool Planes = false;
2651 public object Tag { get;set; }
2652 public IntRange RRange
2653 {
2654 get
2655 {
2656 return RChannel.RangeR;
2657 }
2658 }
2659 public IntRange GRange
2660 {
2661 get
2662 {
2663 return GChannel.RangeG;
2664 }
2665 }
2666 public IntRange BRange
2667 {
2668 get
2669 {
2670 return BChannel.RangeB;
2671 }
2672 }
2673 public Bitmap SelectedBuffer
2674 {
2675 get
2676 {
2677 return Buffers[Coords[Coordinate.Z, Coordinate.C, Coordinate.T]];
2678 }
2679 }
2680 public Stopwatch watch = new Stopwatch();
2681 public bool isRGB
2682 {
2683 get
2684 {
2685 if (RGBChannelCount == 3 || RGBChannelCount == 4)
2686 return true;
2687 else
2688 return false;
2689 }
2690 }
2691 public bool isTime
2692 {
2693 get
2694 {
2695 if (SizeT > 1)
2696 return true;
2697 else
2698 return false;
2699 }
2700 }
2701 public bool isSeries
2702 {
2703 get
2704 {
2705 if (seriesCount > 1)
2706 return true;
2707 else
2708 return false;
2709 }
2710 }
2711 public bool isPyramidal
2712 {
2713 get
2714 {
2715 if (Type == ImageType.pyramidal)
2716 return true;
2717 else
2718 return false;
2719 }
2720 }
2721 public string file;
2722 public static double progressValue
2723 {
2724 get
2725 {
2726 if (App.progress != null)
2727 return App.progress.ProgressValue;
2728 else
2729 return 0;
2730 }
2731 set
2732 {
2733 if (App.progress != null)
2734 {
2735 // update ui on main UI thread
2736 Application.Invoke(delegate
2737 {
2738 App.progress.ProgressValue = value;
2739 });
2740 }
2741 }
2742 }
2743 public static string status;
2744 public static string progFile;
2745 public static bool Initialized
2746 {
2747 get
2748 {
2749 return initialized;
2750 }
2751 }
2753 public void To8Bit()
2754 {
2755 if (Buffers[0].RGBChannelsCount == 4)
2756 To24Bit();
2757 PixelFormat px = Buffers[0].PixelFormat;
2758 if (px == PixelFormat.Format8bppIndexed)
2759 return;
2760 if (px == PixelFormat.Format48bppRgb)
2761 {
2762 To24Bit();
2763 List<AForge.Bitmap> bfs = new List<AForge.Bitmap>();
2764 int index = 0;
2765 for (int i = 0; i < Buffers.Count; i++)
2766 {
2767 Bitmap[] bs = Bitmap.RGB24To8(Buffers[i]);
2768 Bitmap br = new Bitmap(ID, bs[2], new ZCT(Buffers[i].Coordinate.Z, 0, Buffers[i].Coordinate.T), index, Buffers[i].Plane);
2769 Bitmap bg = new Bitmap(ID, bs[1], new ZCT(Buffers[i].Coordinate.Z, 1, Buffers[i].Coordinate.T), index + 1, Buffers[i].Plane);
2770 Bitmap bb = new Bitmap(ID, bs[0], new ZCT(Buffers[i].Coordinate.Z, 2, Buffers[i].Coordinate.T), index + 2, Buffers[i].Plane);
2771 for (int b = 0; b < 3; b++)
2772 {
2773 bs[b].Dispose();
2774 }
2775 bs = null;
2776 GC.Collect();
2777 Statistics.CalcStatistics(br);
2778 Statistics.CalcStatistics(bg);
2779 Statistics.CalcStatistics(bb);
2780 bfs.Add(br);
2781 bfs.Add(bg);
2782 bfs.Add(bb);
2783 index += 3;
2784 }
2785 Buffers = bfs;
2786 UpdateCoords(SizeZ, 3, SizeT);
2787 }
2788 else if (px == PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb)
2789 {
2790 List<Bitmap> bfs = new List<Bitmap>();
2791 int index = 0;
2792 for (int i = 0; i < Buffers.Count; i++)
2793 {
2794 Bitmap[] bs = Bitmap.RGB24To8(Buffers[i]);
2795 Bitmap br = new Bitmap(ID, bs[2], new ZCT(Buffers[i].Coordinate.Z, 0, Buffers[i].Coordinate.T), index, Buffers[i].Plane);
2796 Bitmap bg = new Bitmap(ID, bs[1], new ZCT(Buffers[i].Coordinate.Z, 1, Buffers[i].Coordinate.T), index + 1, Buffers[i].Plane);
2797 Bitmap bb = new Bitmap(ID, bs[0], new ZCT(Buffers[i].Coordinate.Z, 2, Buffers[i].Coordinate.T), index + 2, Buffers[i].Plane);
2798 for (int b = 0; b < 3; b++)
2799 {
2800 bs[b].Dispose();
2801 bs[b] = null;
2802 }
2803 bs = null;
2804 GC.Collect();
2805 Statistics.CalcStatistics(br);
2806 Statistics.CalcStatistics(bg);
2807 Statistics.CalcStatistics(bb);
2808 bfs.Add(br);
2809 bfs.Add(bg);
2810 bfs.Add(bb);
2811 index += 3;
2812 }
2813 Buffers = bfs;
2814 UpdateCoords(SizeZ, 3, SizeT);
2815 }
2816 else
2817 {
2818 for (int i = 0; i < Buffers.Count; i++)
2819 {
2820 Bitmap b = AForge.Imaging.Image.Convert16bppTo8bpp(Buffers[i]);
2821 Buffers[i] = b;
2822 Statistics.CalcStatistics(Buffers[i]);
2823 }
2824 for (int c = 0; c < Channels.Count; c++)
2825 {
2826 Channels[c].BitsPerPixel = 8;
2827 for (int i = 0; i < Channels[c].range.Length; i++)
2828 {
2829 Channels[c].range[i].Min = (int)(((float)Channels[c].range[i].Min / (float)ushort.MaxValue) * byte.MaxValue);
2830 Channels[c].range[i].Max = (int)(((float)Channels[c].range[i].Max / (float)ushort.MaxValue) * byte.MaxValue);
2831 }
2832 }
2833
2834 }
2835 //We wait for threshold image statistics calculation
2836 do
2837 {
2838 Thread.Sleep(100);
2839 } while (Buffers[Buffers.Count - 1].Stats == null);
2840 Statistics.ClearCalcBuffer();
2841 AutoThreshold(this, false);
2842 bitsPerPixel = 8;
2843 App.viewer.UpdateGUI();
2844 App.viewer.UpdateImages();
2845 App.viewer.UpdateView();
2846 Recorder.AddLine("BioGTK.Table.GetImage(" + '"' + ID + '"' + ")" + "." + "To8Bit();");
2847 }
2849 public void To16Bit()
2850 {
2851 if (Buffers[0].RGBChannelsCount == 4)
2852 To24Bit();
2853 if (Buffers[0].PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format16bppGrayScale)
2854 return;
2855 bitsPerPixel = 16;
2856 if (Buffers[0].PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format48bppRgb)
2857 {
2858 List<Bitmap> bfs = new List<Bitmap>();
2859 int index = 0;
2860 for (int i = 0; i < Buffers.Count; i++)
2861 {
2862 Array.Reverse(Buffers[i].Bytes);
2863 Bitmap[] bs = Bitmap.RGB48To16(ID, SizeX, SizeY, Buffers[i].Stride, Buffers[i].Bytes, Buffers[i].Coordinate, index, Buffers[i].Plane);
2864 bfs.AddRange(bs);
2865 index += 3;
2866 }
2867 Buffers = bfs;
2868 UpdateCoords(SizeZ, SizeC * 3, SizeT);
2869 if (Channels[0].SamplesPerPixel == 3)
2870 {
2871 Channel c = Channels[0].Copy();
2872 c.SamplesPerPixel = 1;
2873 c.range = new IntRange[1];
2874 Channels.Clear();
2875 Channels.Add(c);
2876 Channels.Add(c.Copy());
2877 Channels.Add(c.Copy());
2878 Channels[1].Index = 1;
2879 Channels[2].Index = 2;
2880 }
2881 }
2882 else if (Buffers[0].PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format8bppIndexed)
2883 {
2884 for (int i = 0; i < Buffers.Count; i++)
2885 {
2886 Buffers[i].Image = AForge.Imaging.Image.Convert8bppTo16bpp(Buffers[i]);
2887 Statistics.CalcStatistics(Buffers[i]);
2888 }
2889 for (int c = 0; c < Channels.Count; c++)
2890 {
2891 for (int i = 0; i < Channels[c].range.Length; i++)
2892 {
2893 Channels[c].range[i].Min = (int)(((float)Channels[c].range[i].Min / (float)byte.MaxValue) * ushort.MaxValue);
2894 Channels[c].range[i].Max = (int)(((float)Channels[c].range[i].Max / (float)byte.MaxValue) * ushort.MaxValue);
2895 }
2896 Channels[c].BitsPerPixel = 16;
2897 }
2898 bitsPerPixel = 16;
2899 }
2900 else if (Buffers[0].PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb)
2901 {
2902 List<Bitmap> bfs = new List<Bitmap>();
2903 int index = 0;
2904 for (int i = 0; i < Buffers.Count; i++)
2905 {
2906 Bitmap[] bs = Bitmap.RGB24To8(Buffers[i]);
2907 Bitmap br = new Bitmap(ID, bs[2].Image, new ZCT(Buffers[i].Coordinate.Z, 0, Buffers[i].Coordinate.T), index, Buffers[i].Plane);
2908 Bitmap bg = new Bitmap(ID, bs[1].Image, new ZCT(Buffers[i].Coordinate.Z, 1, Buffers[i].Coordinate.T), index + 1, Buffers[i].Plane);
2909 Bitmap bb = new Bitmap(ID, bs[0].Image, new ZCT(Buffers[i].Coordinate.Z, 2, Buffers[i].Coordinate.T), index + 2, Buffers[i].Plane);
2910 for (int b = 0; b < 3; b++)
2911 {
2912 bs[b].Dispose();
2913 bs[b] = null;
2914 }
2915 bs = null;
2916 GC.Collect();
2917 br.To16Bit();
2918 bg.To16Bit();
2919 bb.To16Bit();
2920 Statistics.CalcStatistics(br);
2921 Statistics.CalcStatistics(bg);
2922 Statistics.CalcStatistics(bb);
2923 bfs.Add(br);
2924 bfs.Add(bg);
2925 bfs.Add(bb);
2926 index += 3;
2927 }
2928 Buffers = bfs;
2929 UpdateCoords(SizeZ, 3, SizeT);
2930 for (int c = 0; c < Channels.Count; c++)
2931 {
2932 for (int i = 0; i < Channels[c].range.Length; i++)
2933 {
2934 Channels[c].range[i].Min = (int)(((float)Channels[c].range[i].Min / (float)byte.MaxValue) * ushort.MaxValue);
2935 Channels[c].range[i].Max = (int)(((float)Channels[c].range[i].Max / (float)byte.MaxValue) * ushort.MaxValue);
2936 }
2937 Channels[c].BitsPerPixel = 16;
2938 }
2939 }
2940 //We wait for threshold image statistics calculation
2941 do
2942 {
2943 Thread.Sleep(100);
2944 } while (Buffers[Buffers.Count - 1].Stats == null);
2945 Statistics.ClearCalcBuffer();
2946 AutoThreshold(this, false);
2947 StackThreshold(true);
2948 App.viewer.UpdateGUI();
2949 App.viewer.UpdateImages();
2950 App.viewer.UpdateView();
2951 Recorder.AddLine("BioGTK.Images.GetImage(" + '"' + ID + '"' + ")" + "." + "To16Bit();");
2952 }
2954 public void To24Bit()
2955 {
2956 if (Buffers[0].PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb)
2957 return;
2958 bitsPerPixel = 8;
2959 if (Buffers[0].PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb || Buffers[0].PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format32bppRgb)
2960 {
2961 for (int i = 0; i < Buffers.Count; i++)
2962 {
2963 Buffers[i] = Bitmap.To24Bit(Buffers[i]);
2964 Buffers[i].SwitchRedBlue();
2965 }
2966 if (Channels.Count == 4)
2967 {
2968 Channels.RemoveAt(0);
2969 }
2970 else
2971 {
2972 Channels[0].SamplesPerPixel = 3;
2973 }
2974 }
2975 else
2976 if (Buffers[0].PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format48bppRgb)
2977 {
2978 //We run 8bit so we get 24 bit rgb.
2979 for (int i = 0; i < Buffers.Count; i++)
2980 {
2981 Buffers[i].Image = AForge.Imaging.Image.Convert16bppTo8bpp(Buffers[i]);
2982 Buffers[i].SwitchRedBlue();
2983 }
2984 }
2985 else
2986 if (Buffers[0].PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format16bppGrayScale || Buffers[0].PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format8bppIndexed)
2987 {
2988 if (Buffers[0].PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format16bppGrayScale)
2989 {
2990 for (int i = 0; i < Buffers.Count; i++)
2991 {
2992 Buffers[i].Image = AForge.Imaging.Image.Convert16bppTo8bpp(Buffers[i]);
2993 }
2994 for (int c = 0; c < Channels.Count; c++)
2995 {
2996 for (int i = 0; i < Channels[c].range.Length; i++)
2997 {
2998 Channels[c].range[i].Min = (int)(((float)Channels[c].range[i].Min / (float)ushort.MaxValue) * byte.MaxValue);
2999 Channels[c].range[i].Max = (int)(((float)Channels[c].range[i].Max / (float)ushort.MaxValue) * byte.MaxValue);
3000 }
3001 Channels[c].BitsPerPixel = 8;
3002 }
3003 }
3004 List<Bitmap> bfs = new List<Bitmap>();
3005 if (Buffers.Count % 3 != 0 && Buffers.Count % 2 != 0)
3006 for (int i = 0; i < Buffers.Count; i++)
3007 {
3008 Bitmap bs = new Bitmap(ID, SizeX, SizeY, Buffers[i].PixelFormat, Buffers[i].Bytes, new ZCT(Buffers[i].Coordinate.Z, 0, Buffers[i].Coordinate.T), i, Buffers[i].Plane);
3009 Bitmap bbs = Bitmap.RGB8To24(bs);
3010 bs.Dispose();
3011 bs = null;
3012 bfs.Add(bbs);
3013 }
3014 else
3015 for (int i = 0; i < Buffers.Count; i += Channels.Count)
3016 {
3017 Bitmap[] bs = new Bitmap[3];
3018 bs[2] = new Bitmap(ID, SizeX, SizeY, Buffers[i].PixelFormat, Buffers[i].Bytes, new ZCT(Buffers[i].Coordinate.Z, 0, Buffers[i].Coordinate.T), i, Buffers[i].Plane);
3019 bs[1] = new Bitmap(ID, SizeX, SizeY, Buffers[i + 1].PixelFormat, Buffers[i + 1].Bytes, new ZCT(Buffers[i + 1].Coordinate.Z, 0, Buffers[i + 1].Coordinate.T), i + 1, Buffers[i + 1].Plane);
3020 if (Channels.Count > 2)
3021 bs[0] = new Bitmap(ID, SizeX, SizeY, Buffers[i + 2].PixelFormat, Buffers[i + 2].Bytes, new ZCT(Buffers[i + 2].Coordinate.Z, 0, Buffers[i + 2].Coordinate.T), i + 2, Buffers[i + 2].Plane);
3022 Bitmap bbs = Bitmap.RGB8To24(bs);
3023 for (int b = 0; b < 3; b++)
3024 {
3025 if (bs[b] != null)
3026 bs[b].Dispose();
3027 bs[b] = null;
3028 }
3029 bfs.Add(bbs);
3030 }
3031 Buffers = bfs;
3032 UpdateCoords(SizeZ, 1, SizeT);
3033 }
3034 Recorder.AddLine("BioGTK.Images.GetImage(" + '"' + ID + '"' + ")" + ".To24Bit();");
3035 AutoThreshold(this, true);
3036 StackThreshold(false);
3037 App.viewer.UpdateGUI();
3038 App.viewer.UpdateImages();
3039 App.viewer.UpdateView();
3040 }
3042 public void To32Bit()
3043 {
3044 if (Buffers[0].PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb)
3045 return;
3046 if (Buffers[0].PixelFormat != PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb)
3047 {
3048 To24Bit();
3049 }
3050 for (int i = 0; i < Buffers.Count; i++)
3051 {
3052 UnmanagedImage b = Bitmap.To32Bit(Buffers[i]);
3053 Buffers[i].Image = b;
3054 }
3055 AutoThreshold(this, true);
3056 App.viewer.UpdateGUI();
3057 App.viewer.UpdateImages();
3058 App.viewer.UpdateView();
3059 Recorder.AddLine("BioGTK.Images.GetImage(" + '"' + ID + '"' + ")" + "." + "To32Bit();");
3060 }
3064 public void To48Bit()
3065 {
3066 if (Buffers[0].RGBChannelsCount == 4)
3067 To24Bit();
3068 if (Buffers[0].PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format48bppRgb)
3069 return;
3070 if (Buffers[0].PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format8bppIndexed || Buffers[0].PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format16bppGrayScale)
3071 {
3072 if (Buffers[0].PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format8bppIndexed)
3073 {
3074 for (int i = 0; i < Buffers.Count; i++)
3075 {
3076 Buffers[i].Image = AForge.Imaging.Image.Convert8bppTo16bpp(Buffers[i]);
3077 }
3078 }
3079 List<Bitmap> bfs = new List<Bitmap>();
3080 if (Buffers.Count % 3 != 0 && Buffers.Count % 2 != 0)
3081 for (int i = 0; i < Buffers.Count; i++)
3082 {
3083 Bitmap bs = new Bitmap(ID, SizeX, SizeY, Buffers[i].PixelFormat, Buffers[i].Bytes, new ZCT(Buffers[i].Coordinate.Z, 0, Buffers[i].Coordinate.T), i, Buffers[i].Plane);
3084 Bitmap bbs = Bitmap.RGB16To48(bs);
3085 Statistics.CalcStatistics(bbs);
3086 bs.Dispose();
3087 bs = null;
3088 bfs.Add(bbs);
3089 }
3090 else
3091 for (int i = 0; i < Buffers.Count; i += Channels.Count)
3092 {
3093 Bitmap[] bs = new Bitmap[3];
3094 bs[0] = new Bitmap(ID, SizeX, SizeY, Buffers[i].PixelFormat, Buffers[i].Bytes, new ZCT(Buffers[i].Coordinate.Z, 0, Buffers[i].Coordinate.T), i, Buffers[i].Plane);
3095 bs[1] = new Bitmap(ID, SizeX, SizeY, Buffers[i + 1].PixelFormat, Buffers[i + 1].Bytes, new ZCT(Buffers[i + 1].Coordinate.Z, 0, Buffers[i + 1].Coordinate.T), i + 1, Buffers[i + 1].Plane);
3096 if (Channels.Count > 2)
3097 bs[2] = new Bitmap(ID, SizeX, SizeY, Buffers[i+2].PixelFormat, Buffers[i+2].Bytes, new ZCT(Buffers[i].Coordinate.Z, 0, Buffers[i+2].Coordinate.T), i+2, Buffers[i].Plane);
3098 Bitmap bbs = Bitmap.RGB16To48(bs);
3099 for (int b = 0; b < 3; b++)
3100 {
3101 if (bs[b] != null)
3102 bs[b].Dispose();
3103 bs[b] = null;
3104 }
3105 Statistics.CalcStatistics(bbs);
3106 bfs.Add(bbs);
3107 }
3108 GC.Collect();
3109 Buffers = bfs;
3110 UpdateCoords(SizeZ, 1, SizeT);
3111 Channel c = Channels[0].Copy();
3112 c.SamplesPerPixel = 3;
3113 rgbChannels[0] = 0;
3114 rgbChannels[1] = 0;
3115 rgbChannels[2] = 0;
3116 Channels.Clear();
3117 Channels.Add(c);
3118 }
3119 else
3120 if (Buffers[0].PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb || Buffers[0].PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb)
3121 {
3122 for (int i = 0; i < Buffers.Count; i++)
3123 {
3124 Buffers[i].Image = AForge.Imaging.Image.Convert8bppTo16bpp(Buffers[i]);
3125 Buffers[i].SwitchRedBlue();
3126 Statistics.CalcStatistics(Buffers[i]);
3127 }
3128 for (int c = 0; c < Channels.Count; c++)
3129 {
3130 for (int i = 0; i < Channels[c].range.Length; i++)
3131 {
3132 Channels[c].range[i].Min = (int)(((float)Channels[c].range[i].Min / (float)byte.MaxValue) * ushort.MaxValue);
3133 Channels[c].range[i].Max = (int)(((float)Channels[c].range[i].Max / (float)byte.MaxValue) * ushort.MaxValue);
3134 }
3135 Channels[c].BitsPerPixel = 16;
3136 }
3137 }
3138 else
3139 {
3140 int index = 0;
3141 List<Bitmap> buffers = new List<Bitmap>();
3142 for (int i = 0; i < Buffers.Count; i += 3)
3143 {
3144 Bitmap[] bf = new Bitmap[3];
3145 bf[0] = Buffers[i];
3146 bf[1] = Buffers[i + 1];
3147 bf[2] = Buffers[i + 2];
3148 Bitmap inf = Bitmap.RGB16To48(bf);
3149 buffers.Add(inf);
3150 Statistics.CalcStatistics(inf);
3151 for (int b = 0; b < 3; b++)
3152 {
3153 bf[b].Dispose();
3154 }
3155 index++;
3156 }
3157 Buffers = buffers;
3158 UpdateCoords(SizeZ, 1, SizeT);
3159 }
3160 //We wait for threshold image statistics calculation
3161 do
3162 {
3163 Thread.Sleep(50);
3164 } while (Buffers[Buffers.Count - 1].Stats == null);
3165 Statistics.ClearCalcBuffer();
3166 bitsPerPixel = 16;
3167 AutoThreshold(this, false);
3168 StackThreshold(true);
3169 App.viewer.UpdateGUI();
3170 App.viewer.UpdateImages();
3171 App.viewer.UpdateView();
3172 Recorder.AddLine("BioGTK.Images.GetImage(" + '"' + ID + '"' + ")" + "." + "To48Bit();");
3173 }
3174 public int? MacroResolution { get;set; }
3175 public int? LabelResolution { get;set; }
3176 void SetLabelMacroResolutions()
3177 {
3178 int i = 0;
3179 AForge.Size s = new AForge.Size(int.MaxValue, int.MaxValue);
3180 bool noMacro = true;
3181 PixelFormat pf = Resolutions[0].PixelFormat;
3182 foreach (Resolution res in Resolutions)
3183 {
3184 if (res.SizeX < s.Width && res.SizeY < s.Height)
3185 {
3186 //If the pixel format changes it means this is the macro resolution.
3187 if (pf != res.PixelFormat)
3188 {
3189 noMacro = false;
3190 break;
3191 }
3192 pf = res.PixelFormat;
3193 s = new AForge.Size(res.SizeX, res.SizeY);
3194 }
3195 else
3196 {
3197 //If this level is bigger than the previous this is the macro resolution.
3198 noMacro = false;
3199 break;
3200 }
3201 i++;
3202 }
3203 if (!noMacro)
3204 {
3205 MacroResolution = i;
3206 LabelResolution = i + 1;
3207 }
3208 }
3209 public void RotateFlip(AForge.RotateFlipType rot)
3210 {
3211 for (int i = 0; i < Buffers.Count; i++)
3212 {
3213 Buffers[i].RotateFlip(rot);
3214 }
3215 Volume = new VolumeD(new Point3D(StageSizeX, StageSizeY, StageSizeZ), new Point3D(PhysicalSizeX * SizeX, PhysicalSizeY * SizeY, PhysicalSizeZ * SizeZ));
3216 }
3225 public void Bake(int rmin, int rmax, int gmin, int gmax, int bmin, int bmax)
3226 {
3227 Bake(new IntRange(rmin, rmax), new IntRange(gmin, gmax), new IntRange(bmin, bmax));
3228 }
3235 public void Bake(IntRange rf, IntRange gf, IntRange bf)
3236 {
3237 BioImage bm = new BioImage(Images.GetImageName(ID));
3238 bm = CopyInfo(this, true, true);
3239 for (int i = 0; i < Buffers.Count; i++)
3240 {
3241 ZCT co = Buffers[i].Coordinate;
3242 UnmanagedImage b = GetFiltered(i, rf, gf, bf);
3243 Bitmap inf = new Bitmap(bm.ID, b, co, i);
3244 Statistics.CalcStatistics(inf);
3245 bm.Coords[co.Z, co.C, co.T] = i;
3246 bm.Buffers.Add(inf);
3247 }
3248 foreach (Channel item in bm.Channels)
3249 {
3250 for (int i = 0; i < item.range.Length; i++)
3251 {
3252 item.range[i].Min = 0;
3253 if (bm.bitsPerPixel > 8)
3254 item.range[i].Max = ushort.MaxValue;
3255 else
3256 item.range[i].Max = 255;
3257 }
3258 }
3259 //We wait for threshold image statistics calculation
3260 do
3261 {
3262 Thread.Sleep(50);
3263 } while (Buffers[Buffers.Count - 1].Stats == null);
3264 AutoThreshold(bm, false);
3265 Statistics.ClearCalcBuffer();
3266 Images.AddImage(bm, true);
3267 App.tabsView.AddTab(bm);
3268 Recorder.AddLine("ImageView.SelectedImage.Bake(" + rf.Min + "," + rf.Max + "," + gf.Min + "," + gf.Max + "," + bf.Min + "," + bf.Max + ");");
3269 }
3271 public void UpdateCoords()
3272 {
3273 int z = 0;
3274 int c = 0;
3275 int t = 0;
3276 Coords = new int[SizeZ, SizeC, SizeT];
3277 for (int im = 0; im < Buffers.Count; im++)
3278 {
3279 ZCT co = new ZCT(z, c, t);
3280 Coords[co.Z, co.C, co.T] = im;
3281 Buffers[im].Coordinate = co;
3282 if (c < SizeC - 1)
3283 c++;
3284 else
3285 {
3286 c = 0;
3287 if (z < SizeZ - 1)
3288 z++;
3289 else
3290 {
3291 z = 0;
3292 if (t < SizeT - 1)
3293 t++;
3294 else
3295 t = 0;
3296 }
3297 }
3298 }
3299 }
3306 public void UpdateCoords(int sz, int sc, int st)
3307 {
3308 int z = 0;
3309 int c = 0;
3310 int t = 0;
3311 sizeZ = sz;
3312 sizeC = sc;
3313 sizeT = st;
3314 Coords = new int[sz, sc, st];
3315 for (int im = 0; im < Buffers.Count; im++)
3316 {
3317 ZCT co = new ZCT(z, c, t);
3318 Coords[co.Z, co.C, co.T] = im;
3319 Buffers[im].Coordinate = co;
3320 if (c < SizeC - 1)
3321 c++;
3322 else
3323 {
3324 c = 0;
3325 if (z < SizeZ - 1)
3326 z++;
3327 else
3328 {
3329 z = 0;
3330 if (t < SizeT - 1)
3331 t++;
3332 else
3333 t = 0;
3334 }
3335 }
3336 }
3337 }
3344 public void UpdateCoords(int sz, int sc, int st, string order)
3345 {
3346 int z = 0;
3347 int c = 0;
3348 int t = 0;
3349 sizeZ = sz;
3350 sizeC = sc;
3351 sizeT = st;
3352 Coords = new int[sz, sc, st];
3353 if (order == "XYCZT")
3354 {
3355 for (int im = 0; im < Buffers.Count; im++)
3356 {
3357 ZCT co = new ZCT(z, c, t);
3358 Coords[co.Z, co.C, co.T] = im;
3359 Buffers[im].Coordinate = co;
3360 if (c < SizeC - 1)
3361 c++;
3362 else
3363 {
3364 c = 0;
3365 if (z < SizeZ - 1)
3366 z++;
3367 else
3368 {
3369 z = 0;
3370 if (t < SizeT - 1)
3371 t++;
3372 else
3373 t = 0;
3374 }
3375 }
3376 }
3377 }
3378 else if (order == "XYZCT")
3379 {
3380 for (int im = 0; im < Buffers.Count; im++)
3381 {
3382 ZCT co = new ZCT(z, c, t);
3383 Coords[co.Z, co.C, co.T] = im;
3384 Buffers[im].Coordinate = co;
3385 if (z < SizeZ - 1)
3386 z++;
3387 else
3388 {
3389 z = 0;
3390 if (c < SizeC - 1)
3391 c++;
3392 else
3393 {
3394 c = 0;
3395 if (t < SizeT - 1)
3396 t++;
3397 else
3398 t = 0;
3399 }
3400 }
3401 }
3402 }
3403 }
3409 public double ToImageSizeX(double d)
3410 {
3411 return d / PhysicalSizeX;
3412 }
3419 public double ToImageSizeY(double d)
3420 {
3421 return d / PhysicalSizeY;
3422 }
3428 public double ToImageSpaceX(double x)
3429 {
3430 if (isPyramidal)
3431 return x;
3432 return (float)((x - StageSizeX) / PhysicalSizeX);
3433 }
3439 public double ToImageSpaceY(double y)
3440 {
3441 if (isPyramidal)
3442 return y;
3443 return (float)((y - StageSizeY) / PhysicalSizeY);
3444 }
3450 public PointD ToImageSpace(PointD p)
3451 {
3452 PointD pp = new PointD();
3453 pp.X = (float)((p.X - StageSizeX) / PhysicalSizeX);
3454 pp.Y = (float)((p.Y - StageSizeY) / PhysicalSizeY);
3455 return pp;
3456 }
3462 public PointD[] ToImageSpace(List<PointD> p)
3463 {
3464 PointD[] ps = new PointD[p.Count];
3465 for (int i = 0; i < p.Count; i++)
3466 {
3467 PointD pp = new PointD();
3468 pp.X = ((p[i].X - StageSizeX) / PhysicalSizeX);
3469 pp.Y = ((p[i].Y - StageSizeY) / PhysicalSizeY);
3470 ps[i] = pp;
3471 }
3472 return ps;
3473 }
3480 public PointF[] ToImageSpace(PointF[] p)
3481 {
3482 PointF[] ps = new PointF[p.Length];
3483 for (int i = 0; i < p.Length; i++)
3484 {
3485 PointF pp = new PointF();
3486 pp.X = (float)((p[i].X - StageSizeX) / PhysicalSizeX);
3487 pp.Y = (float)((p[i].Y - StageSizeY) / PhysicalSizeY);
3488 ps[i] = pp;
3489 }
3490 return ps;
3491 }
3497 public RectangleF ToImageSpace(RectangleD p)
3498 {
3499 RectangleF r = new RectangleF();
3500 Point pp = new Point();
3501 r.X = (int)((p.X - StageSizeX) / PhysicalSizeX);
3502 r.Y = (int)((p.Y - StageSizeY) / PhysicalSizeY);
3503 r.Width = (int)(p.W / PhysicalSizeX);
3504 r.Height = (int)(p.H / PhysicalSizeY);
3505 return r;
3506 }
3512 public PointD ToStageSpace(PointD p)
3513 {
3514 PointD pp = new PointD();
3515 if (isPyramidal)
3516 {
3517 pp.X = ((p.X * Resolutions[Level].PhysicalSizeX) + Volume.Location.X);
3518 pp.Y = ((p.Y * Resolutions[Level].PhysicalSizeY) + Volume.Location.Y);
3519 return pp;
3520 }
