3521 else
3522 {
3523 pp.X = ((p.X * PhysicalSizeX) + Volume.Location.X);
3524 pp.Y = ((p.Y * PhysicalSizeY) + Volume.Location.Y);
3525 return pp;
3526 }
3527 }
3534 public PointD ToStageSpace(PointD p, int resolution)
3535 {
3536 PointD pp = new PointD();
3537 pp.X = ((p.X * Resolutions[resolution].PhysicalSizeX) + Volume.Location.X);
3538 pp.Y = ((p.Y * Resolutions[resolution].PhysicalSizeY) + Volume.Location.Y);
3539 return pp;
3540 }
3551 public static PointD ToStageSpace(PointD p, double physicalSizeX, double physicalSizeY, double volumeX, double volumeY)
3552 {
3553 PointD pp = new PointD();
3554 pp.X = ((p.X * physicalSizeX) + volumeX);
3555 pp.Y = ((p.Y * physicalSizeY) + volumeY);
3556 return pp;
3557 }
3564 public RectangleD ToStageSpace(RectangleD p)
3565 {
3566 RectangleD r = new RectangleD();
3567 r.X = ((p.X * PhysicalSizeX) + Volume.Location.X);
3568 r.Y = ((p.Y * PhysicalSizeY) + Volume.Location.Y);
3569 r.W = (p.W * PhysicalSizeX);
3570 r.H = (p.H * PhysicalSizeY);
3571 return r;
3572 }
3583 public static RectangleD ToStageSpace(RectangleD p, double physicalSizeX, double physicalSizeY, double volumeX, double volumeY)
3584 {
3585 RectangleD r = new RectangleD();
3586 r.X = ((p.X * physicalSizeX) + volumeX);
3587 r.Y = ((p.Y * physicalSizeY) + volumeY);
3588 r.W = (p.W * physicalSizeX);
3589 r.H = (p.H * physicalSizeY);
3590 return r;
3591 }
3598 public PointD[] ToStageSpace(PointD[] p)
3599 {
3600 PointD[] ps = new PointD[p.Length];
3601 for (int i = 0; i < p.Length; i++)
3602 {
3603 PointD pp = new PointD();
3604 pp.X = ((p[i].X * PhysicalSizeX) + Volume.Location.X);
3605 pp.Y = ((p[i].Y * PhysicalSizeY) + Volume.Location.Y);
3606 ps[i] = pp;
3607 }
3608 return ps;
3609 }
3621 public static PointD[] ToStageSpace(PointD[] p, double physicalSizeX, double physicalSizeY, double volumeX, double volumeY)
3622 {
3623 PointD[] ps = new PointD[p.Length];
3624 for (int i = 0; i < p.Length; i++)
3625 {
3626 PointD pp = new PointD();
3627 pp.X = ((p[i].X * physicalSizeX) + volumeX);
3628 pp.Y = ((p[i].Y * physicalSizeY) + volumeY);
3629 ps[i] = pp;
3630 }
3631 return ps;
3632 }
3633 /* Creating a new BioImage object. */
3634 public BioImage(string file)
3635 {
3636 id = file;
3637 this.file = file;
3638 filename = Images.GetImageName(id);
3639 Coordinate = new ZCT();
3640 rgbChannels[0] = 0;
3641 rgbChannels[1] = 0;
3642 rgbChannels[2] = 0;
3643 }
3657 public static BioImage Substack(BioImage orig, int ser, int zs, int ze, int cs, int ce, int ts, int te)
3658 {
3659 BioImage b = CopyInfo(orig, false, false);
3660 b.ID = Images.GetImageName(orig.ID);
3661 int i = 0;
3662 b.Coords = new int[ze - zs, ce - cs, te - ts];
3663 b.sizeZ = ze - zs;
3664 b.sizeC = ce - cs;
3665 b.sizeT = te - ts;
3666 for (int ti = 0; ti < b.SizeT; ti++)
3667 {
3668 for (int zi = 0; zi < b.SizeZ; zi++)
3669 {
3670 for (int ci = 0; ci < b.SizeC; ci++)
3671 {
3672 int ind = orig.Coords[zs + zi, cs + ci, ts + ti];
3673 Bitmap bf = new Bitmap(Images.GetImageName(orig.id), orig.SizeX, orig.SizeY, orig.Buffers[0].PixelFormat, orig.Buffers[ind].Bytes, new ZCT(zi, ci, ti), i);
3674 Statistics.CalcStatistics(bf);
3675 b.Buffers.Add(bf);
3676 b.Coords[zi, ci, ti] = i;
3677 i++;
3678 }
3679 }
3680 }
3681 for (int ci = cs; ci < ce; ci++)
3682 {
3683 b.Channels.Add(orig.Channels[ci]);
3684 }
3685 //We wait for threshold image statistics calculation
3686 do
3687 {
3688 Thread.Sleep(100);
3689 } while (b.Buffers[b.Buffers.Count - 1].Stats == null);
3690 Statistics.ClearCalcBuffer();
3691 b.Resolutions.Add(new BioGTK.Resolution(b.Buffers[0].SizeX, b.Buffers[0].SizeY, b.Buffers[0].PixelFormat, b.PhysicalSizeX, b.PhysicalSizeY, b.PhysicalSizeZ, b.StageSizeX, b.StageSizeY, b.StageSizeZ));
3692 AutoThreshold(b, false);
3693 if (b.bitsPerPixel > 8)
3694 b.StackThreshold(true);
3695 else
3696 b.StackThreshold(false);
3697 Images.AddImage(b, true);
3698 Recorder.AddLine("BioGTK.BioImage.Substack(" + '"' + orig.Filename + '"' + "," + ser + "," + zs + "," + ze + "," + cs + "," + ce + "," + ts + "," + te + ");");
3699 return b;
3700 }
3707 public static BioImage MergeChannels(BioImage b2, BioImage b)
3708 {
3709 BioImage res = new BioImage(b2.ID);
3710 res.ID = Images.GetImageName(b2.ID);
3711 res.series = b2.series;
3712 res.sizeZ = b2.SizeZ;
3713 int cOrig = b2.SizeC;
3714 res.sizeC = b2.SizeC + b.SizeC;
3715 res.sizeT = b2.SizeT;
3716 res.bitsPerPixel = b2.bitsPerPixel;
3717 res.imageInfo = b2.imageInfo;
3718 res.littleEndian = b2.littleEndian;
3719 res.seriesCount = b2.seriesCount;
3720 res.imagesPerSeries = res.ImageCount / res.seriesCount;
3721 res.Coords = new int[res.SizeZ, res.SizeC, res.SizeT];
3722
3723 int i = 0;
3724 int cc = 0;
3725 for (int ti = 0; ti < res.SizeT; ti++)
3726 {
3727 for (int zi = 0; zi < res.SizeZ; zi++)
3728 {
3729 for (int ci = 0; ci < res.SizeC; ci++)
3730 {
3731 ZCT co = new ZCT(zi, ci, ti);
3732 if (ci < cOrig)
3733 {
3734 //If this channel is part of the image b1 we add planes from it.
3735 Bitmap copy = new Bitmap(b2.id, b2.SizeX, b2.SizeY, b2.Buffers[0].PixelFormat, b2.Buffers[i].Bytes, co, i);
3736 if (b2.littleEndian)
3737 copy.RotateFlip(AForge.RotateFlipType.Rotate180FlipNone);
3738 res.Coords[zi, ci, ti] = i;
3739 res.Buffers.Add(b2.Buffers[i]);
3740 res.Buffers.Add(copy);
3741 //Lets copy the ROI's from the original image.
3742 List<ROI> anns = b2.GetAnnotations(zi, ci, ti);
3743 if (anns.Count > 0)
3744 res.Annotations.AddRange(anns);
3745 }
3746 else
3747 {
3748 //This plane is not part of b1 so we add the planes from b2 channels.
3749 Bitmap copy = new Bitmap(b.id, b.SizeX, b.SizeY, b.Buffers[0].PixelFormat, b.Buffers[i].Bytes, co, i);
3750 if (b2.littleEndian)
3751 copy.RotateFlip(AForge.RotateFlipType.Rotate180FlipNone);
3752 res.Coords[zi, ci, ti] = i;
3753 res.Buffers.Add(b.Buffers[i]);
3754 res.Buffers.Add(copy);
3755
3756 //Lets copy the ROI's from the original image.
3757 List<ROI> anns = b.GetAnnotations(zi, cc, ti);
3758 if (anns.Count > 0)
3759 res.Annotations.AddRange(anns);
3760 }
3761 i++;
3762 }
3763 }
3764 }
3765 for (int ci = 0; ci < res.SizeC; ci++)
3766 {
3767 if (ci < cOrig)
3768 {
3769 res.Channels.Add(b2.Channels[ci].Copy());
3770 }
3771 else
3772 {
3773 res.Channels.Add(b.Channels[cc].Copy());
3774 res.Channels[cOrig + cc].Index = ci;
3775 cc++;
3776 }
3777 }
3778 Images.AddImage(res, true);
3779 //We wait for threshold image statistics calculation
3780 do
3781 {
3782 Thread.Sleep(100);
3783 } while (res.Buffers[res.Buffers.Count - 1].Stats == null);
3784 AutoThreshold(res, false);
3785 if (res.bitsPerPixel > 8)
3786 res.StackThreshold(true);
3787 else
3788 res.StackThreshold(false);
3789 Recorder.AddLine("BioGTK.BioImage.MergeChannels(" + '"' + b.ID + '"' + "," + '"' + b2.ID + '"' + ");");
3790 return res;
3791 }
3798 public static BioImage MergeChannels(string bname, string b2name)
3799 {
3800 BioImage b = Images.GetImage(bname);
3801 BioImage b2 = Images.GetImage(b2name);
3802 return MergeChannels(b, b2);
3803 }
3809 public static BioImage MergeZ(BioImage b)
3810 {
3811 BioImage bi = BioImage.CopyInfo(b, true, true);
3812 int ind = 0;
3813 for (int c = 0; c < b.SizeC; c++)
3814 {
3815 for (int t = 0; t < b.sizeT; t++)
3816 {
3817 Merge m = new Merge(b.Buffers[b.Coords[0, c, t]]);
3818 Bitmap bm = new Bitmap(b.SizeX, b.SizeY, b.Buffers[0].PixelFormat);
3819 for (int i = 1; i < b.sizeZ; i++)
3820 {
3821 m.OverlayImage = bm;
3822 bm = m.Apply(b.Buffers[b.Coords[i, c, t]]);
3823 }
3824 Bitmap bf = new Bitmap(b.file, bm, new ZCT(0, c, t), ind);
3825 bi.Buffers.Add(bf);
3826 Statistics.CalcStatistics(bf);
3827 ind++;
3828 }
3829 }
3830 Images.AddImage(bi, true);
3831 bi.UpdateCoords(1, b.SizeC, b.SizeT);
3832 bi.Coordinate = new ZCT(0, 0, 0);
3833 //We wait for threshold image statistics calculation
3834 do
3835 {
3836 Thread.Sleep(100);
3837 } while (bi.Buffers[bi.Buffers.Count - 1].Stats == null);
3838 Statistics.ClearCalcBuffer();
3839 bi.Resolutions.Add(new BioGTK.Resolution(b.Buffers[0].SizeX, b.Buffers[0].SizeY, b.Buffers[0].PixelFormat, b.PhysicalSizeX, b.PhysicalSizeY, b.PhysicalSizeZ, b.StageSizeX, b.StageSizeY, b.StageSizeZ));
3840
3841 AutoThreshold(bi, false);
3842 if (bi.bitsPerPixel > 8)
3843 bi.StackThreshold(true);
3844 else
3845 bi.StackThreshold(false);
3846 Recorder.AddLine("BioGTK.BioImage.MergeZ(" + '"' + b.ID + '"' + ");");
3847 return bi;
3848 }
3854 public static BioImage MergeT(BioImage b)
3855 {
3856 BioImage bi = BioImage.CopyInfo(b, true, true);
3857 int ind = 0;
3858 for (int c = 0; c < b.SizeC; c++)
3859 {
3860 for (int z = 0; z < b.sizeZ; z++)
3861 {
3862 Merge m = new Merge(b.Buffers[b.Coords[z, c, 0]]);
3863 Bitmap bm = new Bitmap(b.SizeX, b.SizeY, b.Buffers[0].PixelFormat);
3864 for (int i = 1; i < b.sizeT; i++)
3865 {
3866 m.OverlayImage = bm;
3867 bm = m.Apply(b.Buffers[b.Coords[z, c, i]]);
3868 }
3869 Bitmap bf = new Bitmap(b.file, bm, new ZCT(z, c, 0), ind);
3870 bi.Buffers.Add(bf);
3871 Statistics.CalcStatistics(bf);
3872 ind++;
3873 }
3874 }
3875 Images.AddImage(bi, true);
3876 bi.UpdateCoords(1, b.SizeC, b.SizeT);
3877 bi.Coordinate = new ZCT(0, 0, 0);
3878 //We wait for threshold image statistics calculation
3879 do
3880 {
3881 Thread.Sleep(100);
3882 } while (bi.Buffers[bi.Buffers.Count - 1].Stats == null);
3883 Statistics.ClearCalcBuffer();
3884 bi.Resolutions.Add(new BioGTK.Resolution(b.Buffers[0].SizeX, b.Buffers[0].SizeY, b.Buffers[0].PixelFormat, b.PhysicalSizeX, b.PhysicalSizeY, b.PhysicalSizeZ, b.StageSizeX, b.StageSizeY, b.StageSizeZ));
3885 AutoThreshold(bi, false);
3886 if (bi.bitsPerPixel > 8)
3887 bi.StackThreshold(true);
3888 else
3889 bi.StackThreshold(false);
3890 Recorder.AddLine("BioGTK.BioImage.MergeT(" + '"' + b.ID + '"' + ");");
3891 return bi;
3892 }
3896 public BioImage[] SplitChannels()
3897 {
3898 BioImage[] bms;
3899 if (isRGB)
3900 {
3901 bms = new BioImage[3];
3902 BioImage ri = new BioImage(Path.GetFileNameWithoutExtension(ID) + "-1" + Path.GetExtension(ID));
3903 BioImage gi = new BioImage(Path.GetFileNameWithoutExtension(ID) + "-2" + Path.GetExtension(ID));
3904 BioImage bi = new BioImage(Path.GetFileNameWithoutExtension(ID) + "-3" + Path.GetExtension(ID));
3905 ri.sizeC = 1;
3906 gi.sizeC = 1;
3907 bi.sizeC = 1;
3908 ri.sizeZ = SizeZ;
3909 gi.sizeZ = SizeZ;
3910 bi.sizeZ = SizeZ;
3911 ri.sizeT = SizeT;
3912 gi.sizeT = SizeT;
3913 bi.sizeT = SizeT;
3914
3915 ri.Coords = new int[SizeZ, 1, SizeT];
3916 gi.Coords = new int[SizeZ, 1, SizeT];
3917 bi.Coords = new int[SizeZ, 1, SizeT];
3918 int ind = 0;
3919 for (int i = 0; i < ImageCount; i++)
3920 {
3921 if (Buffers[i].PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format48bppRgb)
3922 {
3923 //For 48bit images we need to use our own function as AForge won't give us a proper image.
3924 Bitmap[] bfs = Bitmap.RGB48To16(ID, SizeX, SizeY, Buffers[i].Stride, Buffers[i].Bytes, Buffers[i].Coordinate, ind, Buffers[i].Plane);
3925 ind += 3;
3926 ri.Buffers.Add(bfs[0]);
3927 gi.Buffers.Add(bfs[1]);
3928 bi.Buffers.Add(bfs[2]);
3929 Statistics.CalcStatistics(bfs[0]);
3930 Statistics.CalcStatistics(bfs[1]);
3931 Statistics.CalcStatistics(bfs[2]);
3932 ri.Coords[Buffers[i].Coordinate.Z, Buffers[i].Coordinate.C, Buffers[i].Coordinate.T] = i;
3933 gi.Coords[Buffers[i].Coordinate.Z, Buffers[i].Coordinate.C, Buffers[i].Coordinate.T] = i;
3934 bi.Coords[Buffers[i].Coordinate.Z, Buffers[i].Coordinate.C, Buffers[i].Coordinate.T] = i;
3935 }
3936 else
3937 {
3938
3939 Bitmap rImage = extractR.Apply(Buffers[i]);
3940 Bitmap rbf = new Bitmap(ri.ID, rImage, Buffers[i].Coordinate, ind++);
3941 Statistics.CalcStatistics(rbf);
3942 ri.Buffers.Add(rbf);
3943 ri.Coords[Buffers[i].Coordinate.Z, Buffers[i].Coordinate.C, Buffers[i].Coordinate.T] = i;
3944
3945 Bitmap gImage = extractG.Apply(Buffers[i]);
3946 Bitmap gbf = new Bitmap(gi.ID, gImage, Buffers[i].Coordinate, ind++);
3947 Statistics.CalcStatistics(gbf);
3948 gi.Buffers.Add(gbf);
3949 gi.Coords[Buffers[i].Coordinate.Z, Buffers[i].Coordinate.C, Buffers[i].Coordinate.T] = i;
3950
3951 Bitmap bImage = extractB.Apply(Buffers[i]);
3952 //Clipboard.SetImage(bImage);
3953 Bitmap bbf = new Bitmap(bi.ID, bImage, Buffers[i].Coordinate, ind++);
3954 Statistics.CalcStatistics(bbf);
3955 bi.Buffers.Add(bbf);
3956 bi.Coords[Buffers[i].Coordinate.Z, Buffers[i].Coordinate.C, Buffers[i].Coordinate.T] = i;
3957
3958 }
3959 }
3960 //We wait for threshold image statistics calculation
3961 do
3962 {
3963 Thread.Sleep(100);
3964 } while (bi.Buffers[bi.Buffers.Count - 1].Stats == null);
3965 ri.Resolutions.Add(new BioGTK.Resolution(Buffers[0].SizeX, Buffers[0].SizeY, Buffers[0].PixelFormat, PhysicalSizeX, PhysicalSizeY, PhysicalSizeZ, StageSizeX, StageSizeY, StageSizeZ));
3966 gi.Resolutions.Add(new BioGTK.Resolution(Buffers[0].SizeX, Buffers[0].SizeY, Buffers[0].PixelFormat, PhysicalSizeX, PhysicalSizeY, PhysicalSizeZ, StageSizeX, StageSizeY, StageSizeZ));
3967 bi.Resolutions.Add(new BioGTK.Resolution(Buffers[0].SizeX, Buffers[0].SizeY, Buffers[0].PixelFormat, PhysicalSizeX, PhysicalSizeY, PhysicalSizeZ, StageSizeX, StageSizeY, StageSizeZ));
3968 ri.Channels.Add(Channels[0].Copy());
3969 gi.Channels.Add(Channels[0].Copy());
3970 bi.Channels.Add(Channels[0].Copy());
3971 AutoThreshold(ri, false);
3972 AutoThreshold(gi, false);
3973 AutoThreshold(bi, false);
3974 Images.AddImage(ri, true);
3975 Images.AddImage(gi, true);
3976 Images.AddImage(bi, true);
3977 Statistics.ClearCalcBuffer();
3978 bms[0] = ri;
3979 bms[1] = gi;
3980 bms[2] = bi;
3981 }
3982 else
3983 {
3984 bms = new BioImage[SizeC];
3985 for (int c = 0; c < SizeC; c++)
3986 {
3987 BioImage b = BioImage.Substack(this, 0, 0, SizeZ, c, c + 1, 0, SizeT);
3988 bms[c] = b;
3989 }
3990 }
3991
3992 Statistics.ClearCalcBuffer();
3993 Recorder.AddLine("BioGTK.BioImage.SplitChannels(" + '"' + Filename + '"' + ");");
3994 return bms;
3995 }
4001 public static BioImage[] SplitChannels(BioImage bb)
4002 {
4003 return bb.SplitChannels();
4004 }
4010 public static BioImage[] SplitChannels(string name)
4011 {
4012 return SplitChannels(Images.GetImage(name));
4013 }
4014
4015 /* Creating a new instance of the LevelsLinear class. */
4016 public static LevelsLinear filter8 = new LevelsLinear();
4017 public static LevelsLinear16bpp filter16 = new LevelsLinear16bpp();
4018 private static ExtractChannel extractR = new ExtractChannel(AForge.Imaging.RGB.R);
4019 private static ExtractChannel extractG = new ExtractChannel(AForge.Imaging.RGB.G);
4020 private static ExtractChannel extractB = new ExtractChannel(AForge.Imaging.RGB.B);
4021
4029 public Bitmap GetImageByCoord(int z, int c, int t)
4030 {
4031 return Buffers[Coords[z, c, t]];
4032 }
4042 public Bitmap GetBitmap(int z, int c, int t)
4043 {
4044 return Buffers[Coords[z, c, t]];
4045 }
4056 public int GetIndex(int ix, int iy)
4057 {
4058 if (ix > SizeX || iy > SizeY || ix < 0 || iy < 0)
4059 return 0;
4060 int stridex = SizeX;
4061 int x = ix;
4062 int y = iy;
4063 if (bitsPerPixel > 8)
4064 {
4065 return (y * stridex + x) * 2;
4066 }
4067 else
4068 {
4069 return (y * stridex + x);
4070 }
4071 }
4079 public int GetIndexRGB(int ix, int iy, int index)
4080 {
4081 int stridex = SizeX;
4082 //For 16bit (2*8bit) images we multiply buffer index by 2
4083 int x = ix;
4084 int y = iy;
4085 if (bitsPerPixel > 8)
4086 {
4087 return (y * stridex + x) * 2 * index;
4088 }
4089 else
4090 {
4091 return (y * stridex + x) * index;
4092 }
4093 }
4100 public ushort GetValue(ZCTXY coord)
4101 {
4102 if (coord.X < 0 || coord.Y < 0 || coord.X > SizeX || coord.Y > SizeY)
4103 {
4104 return 0;
4105 }
4106 if (isRGB)
4107 {
4108 if (coord.C == 0)
4109 return GetValueRGB(coord, 0);
4110 else if (coord.C == 1)
4111 return GetValueRGB(coord, 1);
4112 else if (coord.C == 2)
4113 return GetValueRGB(coord, 2);
4114 }
4115 else
4116 return GetValueRGB(coord, 0);
4117 return 0;
4118 }
4125 public ushort GetValueRGB(ZCTXY coord, int index)
4126 {
4127 int ind = 0;
4128 if (coord.C >= SizeC)
4129 {
4130 coord.C = 0;
4131 }
4132 ind = Coords[coord.Z, coord.C, coord.T];
4133 ColorS c = Buffers[ind].GetPixel(coord.X, coord.Y);
4134 if (index == 0)
4135 return c.R;
4136 else
4137 if (index == 1)
4138 return c.G;
4139 else
4140 if (index == 2)
4141 return c.B;
4142 throw new IndexOutOfRangeException();
4143 }
4151 public ushort GetValue(ZCT coord, int x, int y)
4152 {
4153 return GetValueRGB(new ZCTXY(coord.Z, coord.C, coord.T, x, y), 0);
4154 }
4164 public ushort GetValue(int z, int c, int t, int x, int y)
4165 {
4166 return GetValue(new ZCTXY(z, c, t, x, y));
4167 }
4176 public ushort GetValueRGB(ZCT coord, int x, int y, int RGBindex)
4177 {
4178 ZCTXY c = new ZCTXY(coord.Z, coord.C, coord.T, x, y);
4179 if (isRGB)
4180 {
4181 return GetValueRGB(c, RGBindex);
4182 }
4183 else
4184 return GetValue(coord, x, y);
4185 }
4197 public ushort GetValueRGB(int z, int c, int t, int x, int y, int RGBindex)
4198 {
4199 return GetValueRGB(new ZCT(z, c, t), x, y, RGBindex);
4200 }
4205 public void SetValue(ZCTXY coord, ushort value)
4206 {
4207 int i = Coords[coord.Z, coord.C, coord.T];
4208 Buffers[i].SetValue(coord.X, coord.Y, value);
4209 }
4216 public void SetValue(int x, int y, int ind, ushort value)
4217 {
4218 Buffers[ind].SetValue(x, y, value);
4219 }
4226 public void SetValue(int x, int y, ZCT coord, ushort value)
4227 {
4228 SetValue(x, y, Coords[coord.Z, coord.C, coord.T], value);
4229 }
4236 public void SetValueRGB(ZCTXY coord, int RGBindex, ushort value)
4237 {
4238 int ind = Coords[coord.Z, coord.C, coord.T];
4239 Buffers[ind].SetValueRGB(coord.X, coord.Y, RGBindex, value);
4240 }
4246 public Bitmap GetBitmap(ZCT coord)
4247 {
4248 return (Bitmap)GetImageByCoord(coord.Z, coord.C, coord.T);
4249 }
4258 public Bitmap GetFiltered(ZCT coord, IntRange r, IntRange g, IntRange b)
4259 {
4260 int index = Coords[coord.Z, coord.C, coord.T];
4261 return GetFiltered(index, r, g, b);
4262 }
4271 public Bitmap GetFiltered(int ind, IntRange r, IntRange g, IntRange b)
4272 {
4273 if (Buffers[ind].BitsPerPixel > 8)
4274 {
4275 BioImage.filter16.InRed = r;
4276 BioImage.filter16.InGreen = g;
4277 BioImage.filter16.InBlue = b;
4278 Bitmap bm = BioImage.filter16.Apply(Buffers[ind]);
4279 return bm;
4280 }
4281 else
4282 {
4283 // set ranges
4284 BioImage.filter8.InRed = r;
4285 BioImage.filter8.InGreen = g;
4286 BioImage.filter8.InBlue = b;
4287 return BioImage.filter8.Apply(Buffers[ind]);
4288 }
4289 }
4294 public UnmanagedImage GetChannelImage(int ind, short s)
4295 {
4296 Bitmap bf = Buffers[ind];
4297 if (bf.isRGB)
4298 {
4299 if (s == 0)
4300 return extractR.Apply(Buffers[ind].Image);
4301 else
4302 if (s == 1)
4303 return extractG.Apply(Buffers[ind].Image);
4304 else
4305 return extractB.Apply(Buffers[ind].Image);
4306 }
4307 else
4308 throw new InvalidOperationException();
4309 }
4319 public Bitmap GetEmission(ZCT coord, IntRange rf, IntRange gf, IntRange bf)
4320 {
4321 if (RGBChannelCount == 1)
4322 {
4323 Bitmap[] bs = new Bitmap[Channels.Count];
4324 for (int c = 0; c < Channels.Count; c++)
4325 {
4326 int index = Coords[coord.Z, c, coord.T];
4327 bs[c] = Buffers[index];
4328 }
4329 Bitmap bm = (Bitmap)Bitmap.GetEmissionBitmap(bs, Channels.ToArray());
4330 return bm;
4331 }
4332 else
4333 {
4334 int index = Coords[coord.Z, coord.C, coord.T];
4335 return Buffers[index];
4336 }
4337 }
4346 public Bitmap GetRGBBitmap(ZCT coord, IntRange rf, IntRange gf, IntRange bf)
4347 {
4348 int index = Coords[coord.Z, coord.C, coord.T];
4349 if (Buffers[0].RGBChannelsCount == 1)
4350 {
4351 if (Channels.Count >= 3)
4352 {
4353 Bitmap[] bs = new Bitmap[3];
4354 bs[2] = Buffers[index + RChannel.Index];
4355 bs[1] = Buffers[index + GChannel.Index];
4356 bs[0] = Buffers[index + BChannel.Index];
4357 return Bitmap.GetRGBBitmap(bs, rf, gf, bf);
4358 }
4359 else
4360 {
4361 Bitmap[] bs = new Bitmap[3];
4362 bs[2] = Buffers[index + RChannel.Index];
4363 bs[1] = Buffers[index + RChannel.Index + 1];
4364 bs[0] = Buffers[index + RChannel.Index + 2];
4365 return Bitmap.GetRGBBitmap(bs, rf, gf, bf);
4366 }
4367 }
4368 else
4369 return Buffers[index];
4370 }
4379 public static unsafe Bitmap GetBitmapRGB(int w, int h, PixelFormat px, byte[] bts)
4380 {
4381 if (px == PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb)
4382 {
4383 //opening a 8 bit per pixel jpg image
4384 Bitmap bmp = new Bitmap(w, h, PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb);
4385 //creating the bitmapdata and lock bits
4386 AForge.Rectangle rec = new AForge.Rectangle(0, 0, w, h);
4387 BitmapData bmd = bmp.LockBits(rec, ImageLockMode.ReadWrite, bmp.PixelFormat);
4388 //iterating through all the pixels in y direction
4389 for (int y = 0; y < h; y++)
4390 {
4391 //getting the pixels of current row
4392 byte* row = (byte*)bmd.Scan0 + (y * bmd.Stride);
4393 int rowRGB = y * w * 4;
4394 //iterating through all the pixels in x direction
4395 for (int x = 0; x < w; x++)
4396 {
4397 int indexRGB = x * 4;
4398 int indexRGBA = x * 4;
4399 row[indexRGBA + 3] = bts[rowRGB + indexRGB + 3];//byte A
4400 row[indexRGBA + 2] = bts[rowRGB + indexRGB + 2];//byte R
4401 row[indexRGBA + 1] = bts[rowRGB + indexRGB + 1];//byte G
4402 row[indexRGBA] = bts[rowRGB + indexRGB];//byte B
4403 }
4404 }
4405 //unlocking bits and disposing image
4406 bmp.UnlockBits(bmd);
4407 return bmp;
4408 }
4409 else if (px == PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb)
4410 {
4411 //opening a 8 bit per pixel jpg image
4412 Bitmap bmp = new Bitmap(w, h, PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb);
4413 //creating the bitmapdata and lock bits
4414 AForge.Rectangle rec = new AForge.Rectangle(0, 0, w, h);
4415 BitmapData bmd = bmp.LockBits(rec, ImageLockMode.ReadWrite, bmp.PixelFormat);
4416 //iterating through all the pixels in y direction
4417 for (int y = 0; y < h; y++)
4418 {
4419 //getting the pixels of current row
4420 byte* row = (byte*)bmd.Scan0 + (y * bmd.Stride);
4421 int rowRGB = y * w * 3;
4422 //iterating through all the pixels in x direction
4423 for (int x = 0; x < w; x++)
4424 {
4425 int indexRGB = x * 3;
4426 int indexRGBA = x * 4;
4427 row[indexRGBA + 3] = byte.MaxValue;//byte A
4428 row[indexRGBA + 2] = bts[rowRGB + indexRGB + 2];//byte R
4429 row[indexRGBA + 1] = bts[rowRGB + indexRGB + 1];//byte G
4430 row[indexRGBA] = bts[rowRGB + indexRGB];//byte B
4431 }
4432 }
4433 //unlocking bits and disposing image
4434 bmp.UnlockBits(bmd);
4435 return bmp;
4436 }
4437 else
4438 if (px == PixelFormat.Format48bppRgb)
4439 {
4440 //opening a 8 bit per pixel jpg image
4441 Bitmap bmp = new Bitmap(w, h, PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb);
4442 //creating the bitmapdata and lock bits
4443 AForge.Rectangle rec = new AForge.Rectangle(0, 0, w, h);
4444 BitmapData bmd = bmp.LockBits(rec, ImageLockMode.ReadWrite, bmp.PixelFormat);
4445 unsafe
4446 {
4447 //iterating through all the pixels in y direction
4448 for (int y = 0; y < h; y++)
4449 {
4450 //getting the pixels of current row
4451 byte* row = (byte*)bmd.Scan0 + (y * bmd.Stride);
4452 int rowRGB = y * w * 6;
4453 //iterating through all the pixels in x direction
4454 for (int x = 0; x < w; x++)
4455 {
4456 int indexRGB = x * 6;
4457 int indexRGBA = x * 4;
4458 int b = (int)((float)BitConverter.ToUInt16(bts, rowRGB + indexRGB) / 255);
4459 int g = (int)((float)BitConverter.ToUInt16(bts, rowRGB + indexRGB + 2) / 255);
4460 int r = (int)((float)BitConverter.ToUInt16(bts, rowRGB + indexRGB + 4) / 255);
4461 row[indexRGBA + 3] = 255;//byte A
4462 row[indexRGBA + 2] = (byte)(b);//byte R
4463 row[indexRGBA + 1] = (byte)(g);//byte G
4464 row[indexRGBA] = (byte)(r);//byte B
4465 }
4466 }
4467 }
4468 bmp.UnlockBits(bmd);
4469 return bmp;
4470 }
4471 else
4472 if (px == PixelFormat.Format8bppIndexed)
4473 {
4474 //opening a 8 bit per pixel jpg image
4475 Bitmap bmp = new Bitmap(w, h, PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb);
4476 //creating the bitmapdata and lock bits
4477 AForge.Rectangle rec = new AForge.Rectangle(0, 0, w, h);
4478 BitmapData bmd = bmp.LockBits(rec, ImageLockMode.ReadWrite, bmp.PixelFormat);
4479 unsafe
4480 {
4481 //iterating through all the pixels in y direction
4482 for (int y = 0; y < h; y++)
4483 {
4484 //getting the pixels of current row
4485 byte* row = (byte*)bmd.Scan0 + (y * bmd.Stride);
4486 int rowRGB = y * w;
4487 //iterating through all the pixels in x direction
4488 for (int x = 0; x < w; x++)
4489 {
4490 int indexRGB = x;
4491 int indexRGBA = x * 4;
4492 byte b = bts[rowRGB + indexRGB];
4493 row[indexRGBA + 3] = 255;//byte A
4494 row[indexRGBA + 2] = (byte)(b);//byte R
4495 row[indexRGBA + 1] = (byte)(b);//byte G
4496 row[indexRGBA] = (byte)(b);//byte B
4497 }
4498 }
4499 }
4500 bmp.UnlockBits(bmd);
4501 return bmp;
4502 }
4503 else
4504 if (px == PixelFormat.Format16bppGrayScale)
4505 {
4506 //opening a 8 bit per pixel jpg image
4507 Bitmap bmp = new Bitmap(w, h, PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb);
4508 //creating the bitmapdata and lock bits
4509 AForge.Rectangle rec = new AForge.Rectangle(0, 0, w, h);
4510 BitmapData bmd = bmp.LockBits(rec, ImageLockMode.ReadWrite, bmp.PixelFormat);
4511 unsafe
4512 {
4513 //iterating through all the pixels in y direction
4514 for (int y = 0; y < h; y++)
4515 {
4516 //getting the pixels of current row
4517 byte* row = (byte*)bmd.Scan0 + (y * bmd.Stride);
4518 int rowRGB = y * w * 2;
4519 //iterating through all the pixels in x direction
4520 for (int x = 0; x < w; x++)
4521 {
4522 int indexRGB = x * 2;
4523 int indexRGBA = x * 4;
4524 ushort b = (ushort)((float)BitConverter.ToUInt16(bts, rowRGB + indexRGB) / 255);
4525 row[indexRGBA + 3] = 255;//byte A
4526 row[indexRGBA + 2] = (byte)(b);//byte R
4527 row[indexRGBA + 1] = (byte)(b);//byte G
4528 row[indexRGBA] = (byte)(b);//byte B
4529 }
4530 }
4531 }
4532 bmp.UnlockBits(bmd);
4533 return bmp;
4534 }
4535
4536 throw new NotSupportedException("Pixelformat " + px + " is not supported.");
4537 }
4538 public static Stopwatch swatch = new Stopwatch();
4545 public List<ROI> GetAnnotations(ZCT coord)
4546 {
4547 List<ROI> annotations = new List<ROI>();
4548 foreach (ROI an in Annotations)
4549 {
4550 if (an == null)
4551 continue;
4552 if (an.coord == coord)
4553 annotations.Add(an);
4554 }
4555 return annotations;
4556 }
4565 public List<ROI> GetAnnotations(int Z, int C, int T)
4566 {
4567 List<ROI> annotations = new List<ROI>();
4568 foreach (ROI an in Annotations)
4569 {
4570 if (an.coord.Z == Z && an.coord.Z == Z && an.coord.C == C && an.coord.T == T)
4571 annotations.Add(an);
4572 }
4573 return annotations;
4574 }
4575 public bool Loading = false;
4578 public static void Initialize()
4579 {
4580 //We initialize OME on a seperate thread so the user doesn't have to wait for initialization to
4581 //view images.
4582 System.Threading.Thread t = new System.Threading.Thread(new System.Threading.ThreadStart(InitFactory));
4583 t.Start();
4584 System.Threading.Thread t3 = new System.Threading.Thread(new System.Threading.ThreadStart(InitReader));
4585 t3.Start();
4586 System.Threading.Thread t4 = new System.Threading.Thread(new System.Threading.ThreadStart(InitWriter));
4587 t4.Start();
4588 }
4589 static bool inf = false, inr = false, inw = false;
4591 private static void InitFactory()
4592 {
4593 factory = new ServiceFactory();
4594 service = (OMEXMLService)factory.getInstance(typeof(OMEXMLService));
4595 inf = true;
4596 if (inf && inr && inw)
4597 initialized = true;
4598 }
4600 private static void InitReader()
4601 {
4602 reader = new ImageReader();
4603 inr = true;
4604 if (inf && inr && inw)
4605 initialized = true;
4606 }
4608 private static void InitWriter()
4609 {
4610 writer = new ImageWriter();
4611 inw = true;
4612 if (inf && inr && inw)
4613 initialized = true;
4614 }
4615
4616 private static List<Resolution> GetResolutions()
4617 {
4618 List<Resolution> rss = new List<Resolution>();
4619 int seriesCount = reader.getSeriesCount();
4620 for (int s = 0; s < seriesCount; s++)
4621 {
4622 reader.setSeries(s);
4623 IMetadata meta = (IMetadata)reader.getMetadataStore();
4624 for (int r = 0; r < reader.getResolutionCount(); r++)
4625 {
4626 Resolution res = new Resolution();
4627 try
4628 {
4629 int rgbc = reader.getRGBChannelCount();
4630 int bps = reader.getBitsPerPixel();
4631 PixelFormat px;
4632 try
4633 {
4634 px = GetPixelFormat(rgbc, meta.getPixelsType(r));
4635 }
4636 catch (Exception)
4637 {
4638 px = GetPixelFormat(rgbc, bps);
4639 }
4640 res.PixelFormat = px;
4641 res.SizeX = reader.getSizeX();
4642 res.SizeY = reader.getSizeY();
4643 if (meta.getPixelsPhysicalSizeX(r) != null)
4644 {
4645 res.PhysicalSizeX = meta.getPixelsPhysicalSizeX(r).value().doubleValue();
4646 }
4647 else
4648 res.PhysicalSizeX = (96 / 2.54) / 1000;
4649 if (meta.getPixelsPhysicalSizeY(r) != null)
4650 {
4651 res.PhysicalSizeY = meta.getPixelsPhysicalSizeY(r).value().doubleValue();
4652 }
4653 else
4654 res.PhysicalSizeY = (96 / 2.54) / 1000;
4655
4656 if (meta.getStageLabelX(r) != null)
4657 res.StageSizeX = meta.getStageLabelX(r).value().doubleValue();
4658 if (meta.getStageLabelY(r) != null)
4659 res.StageSizeY = meta.getStageLabelY(r).value().doubleValue();
4660 if (meta.getStageLabelZ(r) != null)
4661 res.StageSizeZ = meta.getStageLabelZ(r).value().doubleValue();
4662 else
4663 res.StageSizeZ = 1;
4664 if (meta.getPixelsPhysicalSizeZ(r) != null)
4665 {
4666 res.PhysicalSizeZ = meta.getPixelsPhysicalSizeZ(r).value().doubleValue();
4667 }
4668 else
4669 {
4670 res.PhysicalSizeZ = 1;
4671 }
4672 }
4673 catch (Exception e)
4674 {
4675 Console.WriteLine("No Stage Coordinates. PhysicalSize:(" + res.PhysicalSizeX + "," + res.PhysicalSizeY + "," + res.PhysicalSizeZ + ")");
4676 }
4677 rss.Add(res);
4678 }
4679 }
4680 return rss;
4681 }
4682 private static int GetPyramidCount()
4683 {
4684 List<Resolution> rss = GetResolutions();
4685 //We need to determine if this image is pyramidal or not.
4686 //We do this by seeing if the resolutions are downsampled or not.
4687 //We also need to determine number of pyramids in this image and which belong to the series we are opening.
4688 List<Tuple<int, int>> prs = new List<Tuple<int, int>>();
4689 int? sr = null;
4690 for (int r = 0; r < rss.Count - 1; r++)
4691 {
4692 if (rss[r].SizeX > rss[r + 1].SizeX && rss[r].PixelFormat == rss[r + 1].PixelFormat)
4693 {
4694 if (sr == null)
4695 {
4696 sr = r;
4697 prs.Add(new Tuple<int, int>(r, 0));
4698 }
4699 }
4700 else
4701 {
4702 if (rss[prs[prs.Count - 1].Item1].PixelFormat == rss[r].PixelFormat)
4703 prs[prs.Count - 1] = new Tuple<int, int>(prs[prs.Count - 1].Item1, r);
4704 sr = null;
4705 }
4706 }
4707 return prs.Count;
4708 }
4709 public static int GetSeriesCount(string file)
4710 {
4711 reader.setId(file);
4712 int i = reader.getSeriesCount();
4713 int prs = GetPyramidCount();
4714 reader.close();
4715 if (prs > 0)
4716 return prs;
4717 else
4718 return i;
4719 }
4725 public static void SaveFile(string file, string ID)
4726 {
4727 string[] sts = new string[1];
4728 sts[0] = ID;
4729 SaveSeries(sts, file);
4730 }
4735 public static void SaveSeries(string[] IDs, string file)
4736 {
4737 string desc = "";
4738 int stride = 0;
4739 ImageJDesc j = new ImageJDesc();
4740 BioImage bi = Images.GetImage(IDs[0]);
4741 j.FromImage(bi);
4742 desc = j.GetString();
4743 for (int fi = 0; fi < IDs.Length; fi++)
4744 {
4745 string id = IDs[fi];
4746 BioImage b = Images.GetImage(id);
4747 string fn = Path.GetFileNameWithoutExtension(id);
4748 string dir = Path.GetDirectoryName(file);
4749 stride = b.Buffers[0].Stride;
4750
4751 //Save ROIs to CSV file.
4752 if (b.Annotations.Count > 0)
4753 {
4754 string f = dir + "//" + fn + ".csv";
4755 ExportROIsCSV(f, b.Annotations);
4756 }
4757
4758 //Embed ROI's to image description.
4759 for (int i = 0; i < b.Annotations.Count; i++)
4760 {
4761 desc += "-ROI:" + b.series + ":" + ROIToString(b.Annotations[i]) + NewLine;
4762 }
4763 foreach (Channel c in b.Channels)
4764 {
4765 string cj = JsonConvert.SerializeObject(c.info, Formatting.None);
4766 desc += "-Channel:" + fi + ":" + cj + NewLine;
4767 }
4768 string json = JsonConvert.SerializeObject(b.imageInfo, Formatting.None);
4769 desc += "-ImageInfo:" + fi + ":" + json + NewLine;
4770 }
4771
4772 Tiff image = Tiff.Open(file, "w");
4773 for (int fi = 0; fi < IDs.Length; fi++)
4774 {
4775 int im = 0;
4776 string id = IDs[fi];
4777 Progress pr = Progress.Create(file, "Saving TIFF", "Writing");
4778 pr.Show();
4779 BioImage b = Images.GetImage(id);
4780 int sizec = 1;
4781 if (!b.isRGB)
4782 {
4783 sizec = b.SizeC;
4784 }
4785 byte[] buffer;
4786 for (int c = 0; c < sizec; c++)
4787 {
4788 for (int z = 0; z < b.SizeZ; z++)
4789 {
4790 for (int t = 0; t < b.SizeT; t++)
4791 {
4792 image.SetDirectory((short)(im + (b.Buffers.Count * fi)));
4793 image.SetField(TiffTag.IMAGEWIDTH, b.SizeX);
4794 image.SetField(TiffTag.IMAGEDESCRIPTION, desc);
4795 image.SetField(TiffTag.IMAGELENGTH, b.SizeY);
4796 image.SetField(TiffTag.BITSPERSAMPLE, b.bitsPerPixel);
4797 image.SetField(TiffTag.SAMPLESPERPIXEL, b.RGBChannelCount);
4798 image.SetField(TiffTag.ROWSPERSTRIP, b.SizeY);
4799 image.SetField(TiffTag.ORIENTATION, BitMiracle.LibTiff.Classic.Orientation.TOPLEFT);
4800 image.SetField(TiffTag.PLANARCONFIG, PlanarConfig.CONTIG);
4801 image.SetField(TiffTag.PHOTOMETRIC, Photometric.MINISBLACK);
4802 image.SetField(TiffTag.ROWSPERSTRIP, image.DefaultStripSize(0));
4803 if (b.PhysicalSizeX != -1 && b.PhysicalSizeY != -1)
4804 {
4805 image.SetField(TiffTag.XRESOLUTION, (b.PhysicalSizeX * b.SizeX) / ((b.PhysicalSizeX * b.SizeX) * b.PhysicalSizeX));
4806 image.SetField(TiffTag.YRESOLUTION, (b.PhysicalSizeY * b.SizeY) / ((b.PhysicalSizeY * b.SizeY) * b.PhysicalSizeY));
4807 image.SetField(TiffTag.RESOLUTIONUNIT, ResUnit.NONE);
4808 }
4809 else
4810 {
4811 image.SetField(TiffTag.XRESOLUTION, 100.0);
4812 image.SetField(TiffTag.YRESOLUTION, 100.0);
4813 image.SetField(TiffTag.RESOLUTIONUNIT, ResUnit.INCH);
4814 }
4815 // specify that it's a page within the multipage file
4816 image.SetField(TiffTag.SUBFILETYPE, FileType.PAGE);
4817 // specify the page number
4818 buffer = b.Buffers[im].GetSaveBytes(true);
4819 image.SetField(TiffTag.PAGENUMBER, im + (b.Buffers.Count * fi), b.Buffers.Count * IDs.Length);
4820 for (int i = 0, offset = 0; i < b.SizeY; i++)
4821 {
4822 image.WriteScanline(buffer, offset, i, 0);
4823 offset += stride;
4824 }
4825 image.WriteDirectory();
4826 pr.ProgressValue = (float)im / (float)b.ImageCount;
4827 im++;
4828 }
4829 }
4830 }
4831 pr.Hide();
4832 }
4833 image.Dispose();
4834
4835 }
4842 public static BioImage[] OpenSeries(string file, bool tab)
4843 {
4844 Tiff image = Tiff.Open(file, "r");
4845 int pages = image.NumberOfDirectories();
4846 FieldValue[] f = image.GetField(TiffTag.IMAGEDESCRIPTION);
4847 int sp = image.GetField(TiffTag.SAMPLESPERPIXEL)[0].ToInt();
4848 ImageJDesc imDesc = new ImageJDesc();
4849 int count = 1;
4850 if (f != null)
4851 {
4852 string desc = f[0].ToString();
4853 if (desc.StartsWith("ImageJ"))
4854 {
4855 imDesc.SetString(desc);
4856 if (imDesc.channels != 0)
4857 count = imDesc.channels;
4858 }
4859 }
4860 int scount = (pages * sp) / count;
4861 BioImage[] bs = new BioImage[pages];
4862 image.Close();
4863 for (int i = 0; i < pages; i++)
4864 {
4865 bs[i] = OpenFile(file, i, tab, true);
4866 }
4867 return bs;
4868 }
4874 public static BioImage OpenFile(string file)
4875 {
4876 Recorder.AddLine("BioGTK.BioImage.OpenFile(\"" + file + "\");");
4877 return OpenFile(file, 0, true, true);
4878 }
4879 public static BioImage OpenFile(string file, bool tab)
4880 {
4881 Recorder.AddLine("BioGTK.BioImage.OpenFile(\"" + file + "\"," + tab.ToString() + ");");
4882 return OpenFile(file, 0, tab, true);
4883 }
4890 public static BioImage OpenFile(string file, int series, bool tab, bool addToImages)
4891 {
4892 return OpenFile(file, series, tab, addToImages, false, 0, 0, 0, 0);
4893 }
4894 static bool IsTiffTiled(string imagePath)
4895 {
4896 if (imagePath.EndsWith(".tif") || imagePath.EndsWith(".tiff"))
4897 {
4898 using (Tiff tiff = Tiff.Open(imagePath, "r"))
4899 {
4900 if (tiff == null)
4901 {
4902 throw new Exception("Failed to open TIFF image.");
4903 }
4904 bool t = tiff.IsTiled();
4905 tiff.Close();
4906 return t;
4907 }
4908 }
4909 else return false;
4910 }
4920 static void InitDirectoryResolution(BioImage b, Tiff image, ImageJDesc jdesc = null)
4921 {
4922 Resolution res = new Resolution();
4923 FieldValue[] rs = image.GetField(TiffTag.RESOLUTIONUNIT);
4924 string unit = "NONE";
4925 if (rs != null)
4926 unit = rs[0].ToString();
4927 if (jdesc != null)
4928 res.PhysicalSizeZ = jdesc.finterval;
4929 else
4930 res.PhysicalSizeZ = 2.54 / 96;
4931 if (unit == "CENTIMETER")
4932 {
4933 if (image.GetField(TiffTag.XRESOLUTION) != null)
4934 {
4935 double x = image.GetField(TiffTag.XRESOLUTION)[0].ToDouble();
4936 res.PhysicalSizeX = (1000 / x);
4937 }
4938 if (image.GetField(TiffTag.YRESOLUTION) != null)
4939 {
4940 double y = image.GetField(TiffTag.YRESOLUTION)[0].ToDouble();
4941 res.PhysicalSizeY = (1000 / y);
4942 }
4943 }
4944 else
4945 if (unit == "INCH")
4946 {
4947 if (image.GetField(TiffTag.XRESOLUTION) != null)
4948 {
4949 double x = image.GetField(TiffTag.XRESOLUTION)[0].ToDouble();
4950 res.PhysicalSizeX = (2.54 / x) / 2.54;
4951 }
4952 if (image.GetField(TiffTag.YRESOLUTION) != null)
4953 {
4954 double y = image.GetField(TiffTag.YRESOLUTION)[0].ToDouble();
4955 res.PhysicalSizeY = (2.54 / y) / 2.54;
4956 }
4957 }
4958 else
4959 if (unit == "NONE")
4960 {
4961 if (jdesc != null)
4962 {
4963 if (jdesc.unit == "micron")
4964 {
4965 if (image.GetField(TiffTag.XRESOLUTION) != null)
4966 {
4967 double x = image.GetField(TiffTag.XRESOLUTION)[0].ToDouble();
4968 res.PhysicalSizeX = (2.54 / x) / 2.54;
4969 }
4970 if (image.GetField(TiffTag.YRESOLUTION) != null)
4971 {
4972 double y = image.GetField(TiffTag.YRESOLUTION)[0].ToDouble();
4973 res.PhysicalSizeY = (2.54 / y) / 2.54;
4974 }
4975 }
4976 }
4977 else
4978 {
4979 res.PhysicalSizeX = 2.54 / 96;
4980 res.PhysicalSizeY = 2.54 / 96;
4981 res.PhysicalSizeZ = 2.54 / 96;
4982 }
4983 }
4984 res.SizeX = image.GetField(TiffTag.IMAGEWIDTH)[0].ToInt();
4985 res.SizeY = image.GetField(TiffTag.IMAGELENGTH)[0].ToInt();
4986 int bitsPerPixel = image.GetField(TiffTag.BITSPERSAMPLE)[0].ToInt();
4987 int RGBChannelCount = image.GetField(TiffTag.SAMPLESPERPIXEL)[0].ToInt();
4988 res.PixelFormat = GetPixelFormat(RGBChannelCount, bitsPerPixel);
4989 b.Resolutions.Add(res);
4990 }
4991
5017 public static BioImage OpenFile(string file, int series, bool tab, bool addToImages, bool tile, int tileX, int tileY, int tileSizeX, int tileSizeY)
5018 {
5019 string fs = file.Replace("\\", "/");
5020 vips = VipsSupport(file);
5021 Console.WriteLine("Opening BioImage: " + file);
5022 bool ome = isOME(file);
5023 if (ome) return OpenOME(file, series, tab, addToImages, tile, tileX, tileY, tileSizeX, tileSizeY);
5024 bool tiled = IsTiffTiled(file);
5025 Console.WriteLine("IsTiled=" + tiled.ToString());
5026 tile = tiled;
5027
5028 Stopwatch st = new Stopwatch();
5029 st.Start();
5030 status = "Opening Image";
5031 progFile = file;
5032 progressValue = 0;
5033 BioImage b = new BioImage(file);
5034 if(tiled && file.EndsWith(".tif") && !file.EndsWith(".ome.tif"))
5035 {
5036 //To open this we need libvips
5037 vips = VipsSupport(b.file);
5038 }
5039 b.series = series;
5040 b.file = file;
5041 if (tiled)
5042 b.Type = ImageType.pyramidal;
5043 string fn = Path.GetFileNameWithoutExtension(file);
5044 string dir = Path.GetDirectoryName(file);
5045 if (File.Exists(fn + ".csv"))
5046 {
5047 string f = dir + "//" + fn + ".csv";
5048 b.Annotations = BioImage.ImportROIsCSV(f);
5049 }
5050 if (file.EndsWith("tif") || file.EndsWith("tiff") || file.EndsWith("TIF") || file.EndsWith("TIFF"))
5051 {
5052 Tiff image = Tiff.Open(file, "r");
5053 b.tifRead = image;
5054 int SizeX = image.GetField(TiffTag.IMAGEWIDTH)[0].ToInt();
5055 int SizeY = image.GetField(TiffTag.IMAGELENGTH)[0].ToInt();
5056 b.bitsPerPixel = image.GetField(TiffTag.BITSPERSAMPLE)[0].ToInt();
5057 b.littleEndian = image.IsBigEndian();
5058 int RGBChannelCount = image.GetField(TiffTag.SAMPLESPERPIXEL)[0].ToInt();
5059 string desc = "";
5060
5061 FieldValue[] f = image.GetField(TiffTag.IMAGEDESCRIPTION);
5062 desc = f[0].ToString();
5063 ImageJDesc imDesc = null;
5064 b.sizeC = 1;
5065 b.sizeT = 1;
5066 b.sizeZ = 1;
5067 if (f != null && !tile)
5068 {
5069 imDesc = new ImageJDesc();
5070 desc = f[0].ToString();
5071 if (desc.StartsWith("ImageJ"))
5072 {
5073 imDesc.SetString(desc);
5074 if (imDesc.channels != 0)
5075 b.sizeC = imDesc.channels;
5076 else
5077 b.sizeC = 1;
5078 if (imDesc.slices != 0)
5079 b.sizeZ = imDesc.slices;
5080 else
5081 b.sizeZ = 1;
5082 if (imDesc.frames != 0)
5083 b.sizeT = imDesc.frames;
5084 else
5085 b.sizeT = 1;
5086 if (imDesc.finterval != 0)
5087 b.frameInterval = imDesc.finterval;
5088 else
5089 b.frameInterval = 1;
5090 if (imDesc.spacing != 0)
5091 b.imageInfo.PhysicalSizeZ = imDesc.spacing;
5092 else
5093 b.imageInfo.PhysicalSizeZ = 1;
5094 }
5095 }
5096 int stride = 0;
5097 PixelFormat PixelFormat;
5098 if (RGBChannelCount == 1)
5099 {
5100 if (b.bitsPerPixel > 8)
5101 {
5102 PixelFormat = PixelFormat.Format16bppGrayScale;
5103 stride = SizeX * 2;
5104 }
5105 else
5106 {
5107 PixelFormat = PixelFormat.Format8bppIndexed;
5108 stride = SizeX;
5109 }
5110 }
5111 else
5112 if (RGBChannelCount == 3)
5113 {
5114 b.sizeC = 1;
5115 if (b.bitsPerPixel > 8)
5116 {
5117 PixelFormat = PixelFormat.Format48bppRgb;
5118 stride = SizeX * 2 * 3;
5119 }
5120 else
5121 {
5122 PixelFormat = PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb;
5123 stride = SizeX * 3;
5124 }
5125 }
5126 else
5127 {
5128 PixelFormat = PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb;
5129 stride = SizeX * 4;
5130 }
5131
5132 string[] sts = desc.Split('\n');
5133 int index = 0;
5134 for (int i = 0; i < sts.Length; i++)
5135 {
5136 if (sts[i].StartsWith("-Channel"))
5137 {
5138 string val = sts[i].Substring(9);
5139 val = val.Substring(0, val.IndexOf(':'));
5140 int serie = int.Parse(val);
5141 if (serie == series && sts[i].Length > 7)
5142 {
5143 string cht = sts[i].Substring(sts[i].IndexOf('{'), sts[i].Length - sts[i].IndexOf('{'));
5144 Channel.ChannelInfo info = JsonConvert.DeserializeObject<Channel.ChannelInfo>(cht);
5145 Channel ch = new Channel(index, b.bitsPerPixel, info.SamplesPerPixel);
5146 ch.info = info;
5147 b.Channels.Add(ch);
5148 if (index == 0)
5149 {
5150 b.rgbChannels[0] = 0;
5151 }
5152 else
5153 if (index == 1)
5154 {
5155 b.rgbChannels[1] = 1;
5156 }
5157 else
5158 if (index == 2)
5159 {
5160 b.rgbChannels[2] = 2;
5161 }
5162 index++;
5163 }
5164 }
5165 else
5166 if (sts[i].StartsWith("-ROI"))
5167 {
5168 string val = sts[i].Substring(5);
5169 val = val.Substring(0, val.IndexOf(':'));
5170 int serie = int.Parse(val);
5171 if (serie == series && sts[i].Length > 7)
5172 {
5173 string s = sts[i].Substring(sts[i].IndexOf("ROI:") + 4, sts[i].Length - (sts[i].IndexOf("ROI:") + 4));
5174 string ro = s.Substring(s.IndexOf(":") + 1, s.Length - (s.IndexOf(':') + 1));
5175 ROI roi = StringToROI(ro);
5176 b.Annotations.Add(roi);
5177 }
5178 }
5179 else
5180 if (sts[i].StartsWith("-ImageInfo"))
5181 {
5182 string val = sts[i].Substring(11);
5183 val = val.Substring(0, val.IndexOf(':'));
5184 int serie = int.Parse(val);
5185 if (serie == series && sts[i].Length > 10)
5186 {
5187 string cht = sts[i].Substring(sts[i].IndexOf('{'), sts[i].Length - sts[i].IndexOf('{'));
5188 b.imageInfo = JsonConvert.DeserializeObject<ImageInfo>(cht);
5189 }
5190 }
5191 }
5192 b.Coords = new int[b.SizeZ, b.SizeC, b.SizeT];
5193 if (tiled && tileSizeX == 0 && tileSizeY == 0)
5194 {
5195 tileSizeX = 1920;
5196 tileSizeY = 1080;
5197 }
5198
5199 //If this is a tiff file not made by Bio we init channels based on RGBChannels.
5200 if (b.Channels.Count == 0)
5201 b.Channels.Add(new Channel(0, b.bitsPerPixel, RGBChannelCount));
5202
5203 //Lets check to see the channels are correctly defined in this file
5204 for (int ch = 0; ch < b.Channels.Count; ch++)
5205 {
5206 if (b.Channels[ch].SamplesPerPixel != RGBChannelCount)
5207 {
5208 b.Channels[ch].SamplesPerPixel = RGBChannelCount;
5209 }
5210 }
5211
5212 b.Buffers = new List<Bitmap>();
5213 int pages = image.NumberOfDirectories() / b.seriesCount;
5214 int str = image.ScanlineSize();
5215 bool inter = true;
5216 if (stride != str)
5217 inter = false;
5218 InitDirectoryResolution(b, image, imDesc);
5219 if (tiled)
5220 {
5221 Console.WriteLine("Opening tiles.");
5222 if (vips)
5223 OpenVips(b, b.Resolutions.Count);
5224 for (int t = 0; t < b.SizeT; t++)
5225 {
5226 for (int c = 0; c < b.SizeC; c++)
5227 {
5228 for (int z = 0; z < b.SizeZ; z++)
5229 {
5230 Bitmap bmp = GetTile(b, new ZCT(z, c, t), series, tileX, tileY, tileSizeX, tileSizeY);
5231 b.Buffers.Add(bmp);
5232 Statistics.CalcStatistics(bmp);
5233 }
5234 }
5235 }
5236 Console.WriteLine("Calculating statisitics.");
5237 }
5238 else
5239 {
5240 for (int p = series * pages; p < (series + 1) * pages; p++)
5241 {
5242 image.SetDirectory((short)p);
5243
5244 byte[] bytes = new byte[stride * SizeY];
5245 for (int im = 0, offset = 0; im < SizeY; im++)
5246 {
5247 image.ReadScanline(bytes, offset, im, 0);
5248 offset += stride;
5249 }
5250 Bitmap inf = new Bitmap(file, SizeX, SizeY, b.Resolutions[series].PixelFormat, bytes, new ZCT(0, 0, 0), p, null, b.littleEndian, inter);
5251 b.Buffers.Add(inf);
5252 Statistics.CalcStatistics(inf);
5253 progressValue = (float)p / (float)(series + 1) * pages;
5254 }
5255 }
5256 image.Close();
5257 b.UpdateCoords();
5258 }
5259 else
5260 {
5261 Gdk.Pixbuf pf = new Gdk.Pixbuf(file);
5262 b.littleEndian = BitConverter.IsLittleEndian;
5263 PixelFormat px = GetPixelFormat(pf.NChannels, pf.BitsPerSample);
5264 b.Resolutions.Add(new Resolution(pf.Width, pf.Height,px,96 * (1/2.54) / 1000, 96 * (1 / 2.54) / 1000, 96 * (1 / 2.54) / 1000,0,0,0));
5265 b.bitsPerPixel = pf.BitsPerSample;
5266 b.Buffers.Add(new Bitmap(pf.Width, pf.Height, pf.Width * pf.NChannels, px, pf.Pixels));
5267 b.Buffers.Last().ID = Bitmap.CreateID(file, 0);
5268 Statistics.CalcStatistics(b.Buffers.Last());
5269 b.Channels.Add(new Channel(0, b.bitsPerPixel, b.RGBChannelCount));
5270 b.Coords = new int[1, 1, 1];
5271 b.sizeC = 1;
5272 b.sizeT = 1;
5273 b.sizeZ = 1;
5274 }
5275 if (b.StageSizeX == -1)
5276 {
5277 b.imageInfo.Series = 0;
5278 b.StageSizeX = 0;
5279 b.StageSizeY = 0;
5280 b.StageSizeZ = 0;
5281 }
5282 b.Volume = new VolumeD(new Point3D(b.StageSizeX, b.StageSizeY, b.StageSizeZ), new Point3D(b.PhysicalSizeX * b.SizeX, b.PhysicalSizeY * b.SizeY, b.PhysicalSizeZ * b.SizeZ));
5283
5284 //If file is ome and we have OME support then check for annotation in metadata.
5285 if (ome)
5286 {
5287 b.Annotations.AddRange(OpenOMEROIs(file, series));
5288 }
5289
5290 //We wait for histogram image statistics calculation
5291 do
5292 {
5293 Thread.Sleep(50);
5294 } while (b.Buffers[b.Buffers.Count - 1].Stats == null);
5295 Statistics.ClearCalcBuffer();
5296 AutoThreshold(b, false);
5297 if (b.bitsPerPixel > 8)
5298 b.StackThreshold(true);
5299 else
5300 b.StackThreshold(false);
5301 Recorder.AddLine("BioGTK.BioImage.OpenFile(" + '"' + file + '"' + ");");
5302 if (addToImages)
5303 Images.AddImage(b, tab);
5304 //pr.Close();
5305 //pr.Dispose();
5306 st.Stop();
5307 b.loadTimeMS = st.ElapsedMilliseconds;
5308 Console.WriteLine("BioImage loaded " + b.ToString());
5309 return b;
5310 }
5317 public static bool isTiffSeries(string file)
5318 {
5319 Tiff image = Tiff.Open(file, "r");
5320 string desc = "";
5321 FieldValue[] f = image.GetField(TiffTag.IMAGEDESCRIPTION);
5322 image.Close();
5323 string[] sts = desc.Split('\n');
5324 int index = 0;
5325 for (int i = 0; i < sts.Length; i++)
5326 {
5327 if (sts[i].StartsWith("-ImageInfo"))
5328 {
5329 string val = sts[i].Substring(11);
5330 val = val.Substring(0, val.IndexOf(':'));
5331 int serie = int.Parse(val);
5332 if (sts[i].Length > 10)
5333 {
5334 string cht = sts[i].Substring(sts[i].IndexOf('{'), sts[i].Length - sts[i].IndexOf('{'));
5335 ImageInfo info = JsonConvert.DeserializeObject<ImageInfo>(cht);
5336 if (info.Series > 1)
5337 return true;
5338 else
5339 return false;
5340 }
5341 }
5342 }
5343 return false;
5344 }
5352 public static bool isOME(string file)
5353 {
5354 if (file.EndsWith("ome.tif") || file.EndsWith("ome.tiff"))
5355 {
5356 return true;
5357 }
5358 if (file.EndsWith(".tif") || file.EndsWith(".TIF") || file.EndsWith("tiff") || file.EndsWith("TIFF"))
5359 {
5360 Tiff image = Tiff.Open(file, "r");
5361 string desc = "";
5362 FieldValue[] f = image.GetField(TiffTag.IMAGEDESCRIPTION);
5363 desc = f[0].ToString();
5364 image.Close();
5365 if (desc.Contains("OME-XML"))
5366 return true;
5367 else
5368 return false;
5369 }
5370 if ((file.EndsWith("png") || file.EndsWith("PNG") || file.EndsWith("jpg") || file.EndsWith("JPG") ||
5371 file.EndsWith("jpeg") || file.EndsWith("JPEG") || file.EndsWith("bmp") || file.EndsWith("BMP")))
5372 {
5373 return false;
5374 }
5375 else return true;
5376 }
5382 public static bool isOMESeries(string file)
5383 {
5384 if (!isOME(file))
5385 return false;
5386 ImageReader reader = new ImageReader();
5387 var meta = (IMetadata)((OMEXMLService)new ServiceFactory().getInstance(typeof(OMEXMLService))).createOMEXMLMetadata();
5388 reader.setMetadataStore((MetadataStore)meta);
5389 file = file.Replace("\\", "/");
5390 reader.setId(file);
5391 bool ser = false;
5392 if (reader.getSeriesCount() > 1)
5393 ser = true;
5394 reader.close();
5395 reader = null;
5396 return ser;
5397 }
5398 public static void SaveOME(string file, string ID)
5399 {
5400 BioImage[] sts = new BioImage[1];
5401 sts[0] = Images.GetImage(ID);
5402 SaveOMESeries(sts, file, BioImage.Planes);
5403 }
5404
5405 public static void SaveOME(BioImage image, string file)
5406 {
5407 BioImage[] sts = new BioImage[1];
5408 sts[0] = image;
5409 SaveOMESeries(sts, file, BioImage.Planes);
5410 }
5416 public static void SaveOMESeries(BioImage[] files, string f, bool planes)
5417 {
5418 if (File.Exists(f))
5419 File.Delete(f);
5420 loci.formats.meta.IMetadata omexml = service.createOMEXMLMetadata();
5421 progressValue = 0;
5422 status = "Saving OME Image Metadata.";
5423 for (int fi = 0; fi < files.Length; fi++)
5424 {
5425 int serie = fi;
5426 BioImage b = files[fi];
5427 if (b.isPyramidal)
5428 {
5429 b = OpenOME(b.file, b.Level, false, false, true, (int)App.viewer.PyramidalOrigin.X, (int)App.viewer.PyramidalOrigin.Y, App.viewer.AllocatedWidth, App.viewer.AllocatedHeight);
5430 }
5431 // create OME-XML metadata store
5432
5433 omexml.setImageID("Image:" + serie, serie);
5434 omexml.setPixelsID("Pixels:" + serie, serie);
5435 omexml.setPixelsInterleaved(java.lang.Boolean.TRUE, serie);
5436 omexml.setPixelsDimensionOrder(ome.xml.model.enums.DimensionOrder.XYCZT, serie);
5437 if (b.bitsPerPixel > 8)
5438 omexml.setPixelsType(ome.xml.model.enums.PixelType.UINT16, serie);
5439 else
5440 omexml.setPixelsType(ome.xml.model.enums.PixelType.UINT8, serie);
5441 omexml.setPixelsSizeX(new PositiveInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(b.SizeX)), serie);
5442 omexml.setPixelsSizeY(new PositiveInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(b.SizeY)), serie);
5443 omexml.setPixelsSizeZ(new PositiveInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(b.SizeZ)), serie);
5444 omexml.setPixelsSizeC(new PositiveInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(b.SizeC)), serie);
5445 omexml.setPixelsSizeT(new PositiveInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(b.SizeT)), serie);
5446 if (BitConverter.IsLittleEndian)
5447 omexml.setPixelsBigEndian(java.lang.Boolean.FALSE, serie);
5448 else
5449 omexml.setPixelsBigEndian(java.lang.Boolean.TRUE, serie);
5450 ome.units.quantity.Length p1 = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.PhysicalSizeX), ome.units.UNITS.MICROMETER);
5451 omexml.setPixelsPhysicalSizeX(p1, serie);
5452 ome.units.quantity.Length p2 = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.PhysicalSizeY), ome.units.UNITS.MICROMETER);
5453 omexml.setPixelsPhysicalSizeY(p2, serie);
5454 ome.units.quantity.Length p3 = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.PhysicalSizeZ), ome.units.UNITS.MICROMETER);
5455 omexml.setPixelsPhysicalSizeZ(p3, serie);
5456 ome.units.quantity.Length s1 = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.Volume.Location.X), ome.units.UNITS.MICROMETER);
5457 omexml.setStageLabelX(s1, serie);
5458 ome.units.quantity.Length s2 = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.Volume.Location.Y), ome.units.UNITS.MICROMETER);
5459 omexml.setStageLabelY(s2, serie);
5460 ome.units.quantity.Length s3 = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.Volume.Location.Z), ome.units.UNITS.MICROMETER);
5461 omexml.setStageLabelZ(s3, serie);
5462 omexml.setStageLabelName("StageLabel:" + serie, serie);
5463
5464 for (int channel = 0; channel < b.Channels.Count; channel++)
5465 {
5466 Channel c = b.Channels[channel];
5467 for (int r = 0; r < c.range.Length; r++)
5468 {
5469 omexml.setChannelID("Channel:" + channel + ":" + serie, serie, channel + r);
5470 omexml.setChannelSamplesPerPixel(new PositiveInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(1)), serie, channel + r);
5471 if (c.LightSourceWavelength != 0)
5472 {
5473 omexml.setChannelLightSourceSettingsID("LightSourceSettings:" + channel, serie, channel + r);
5474 ome.units.quantity.Length lw = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(c.LightSourceWavelength), ome.units.UNITS.NANOMETER);
5475 omexml.setChannelLightSourceSettingsWavelength(lw, serie, channel + r);
5476 omexml.setChannelLightSourceSettingsAttenuation(PercentFraction.valueOf(c.LightSourceAttenuation), serie, channel + r);
5477 }
5478 omexml.setChannelName(c.Name, serie, channel + r);
5479 if (c.Color != null)
5480 {
5481 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color col = new ome.xml.model.primitives.Color(c.Color.Value.R, c.Color.Value.G, c.Color.Value.B, c.Color.Value.A);
5482 omexml.setChannelColor(col, serie, channel + r);
5483 }
5484 if (c.Emission != 0)
5485 {
5486 ome.units.quantity.Length em = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(c.Emission), ome.units.UNITS.NANOMETER);
5487 omexml.setChannelEmissionWavelength(em, serie, channel + r);
5488 ome.units.quantity.Length ex = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(c.Excitation), ome.units.UNITS.NANOMETER);
5489 omexml.setChannelExcitationWavelength(ex, serie, channel + r);
5490 }
5491 /*
5492 if (c.ContrastMethod != null)
5493 {
5494 ome.xml.model.enums.ContrastMethod cm = (ome.xml.model.enums.ContrastMethod)Enum.Parse(typeof(ome.xml.model.enums.ContrastMethod), c.ContrastMethod);
5495 omexml.setChannelContrastMethod(cm, serie, channel + r);
5496 }
5497 if (c.IlluminationType != null)
5498 {
5499 ome.xml.model.enums.IlluminationType il = (ome.xml.model.enums.IlluminationType)Enum.Parse(typeof(ome.xml.model.enums.IlluminationType), c.IlluminationType.ToUpper());
5500 omexml.setChannelIlluminationType(il, serie, channel + r);
5501 }
5502 if (c.AcquisitionMode != null)
5503 {
5504 ome.xml.model.enums.AcquisitionMode am = (ome.xml.model.enums.AcquisitionMode)Enum.Parse(typeof(ome.xml.model.enums.AcquisitionMode), c.AcquisitionMode.ToUpper());
5505 omexml.setChannelAcquisitionMode(am, serie, channel + r);
5506 }
5507 */
5508 omexml.setChannelFluor(c.Fluor, serie, channel + r);
5509 if (c.LightSourceIntensity != 0)
5510 {
5511 ome.units.quantity.Power pw = new ome.units.quantity.Power(java.lang.Double.valueOf(c.LightSourceIntensity), ome.units.UNITS.VOLT);
5512 omexml.setLightEmittingDiodePower(pw, serie, channel + r);
5513 omexml.setLightEmittingDiodeID(c.DiodeName, serie, channel + r);
5514 }
5515 }
5516 }
5517
5518 int i = 0;
5519 foreach (ROI an in b.Annotations)
5520 {
5521 if (an.roiID == "")
5522 omexml.setROIID("ROI:" + i.ToString() + ":" + serie, i);
5523 else
5524 omexml.setROIID(an.roiID, i);
5525 omexml.setROIName(an.roiName, i);
5526 if (an.type == ROI.Type.Point)
5527 {
5528 if (an.id != "")
5529 omexml.setPointID(an.id, i, serie);
5530 else
5531 omexml.setPointID("Shape:" + i + ":" + serie, i, serie);
5532 omexml.setPointX(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.ToImageSpaceX(an.X)), i, serie);
5533 omexml.setPointY(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.ToImageSpaceY(an.Y)), i, serie);
5534 omexml.setPointTheZ(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(an.coord.Z)), i, serie);
5535 omexml.setPointTheC(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(an.coord.C)), i, serie);
5536 omexml.setPointTheT(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(an.coord.T)), i, serie);
5537 if (an.Text != "")
5538 omexml.setPointText(an.Text, i, serie);
5539 else
5540 omexml.setPointText(i.ToString(), i, serie);
5541 ome.units.quantity.Length fl = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(an.fontSize), ome.units.UNITS.PIXEL);
5542 omexml.setPointFontSize(fl, i, serie);
5543 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color col = new ome.xml.model.primitives.Color(an.strokeColor.R, an.strokeColor.G, an.strokeColor.B, an.strokeColor.A);
5544 omexml.setPointStrokeColor(col, i, serie);
5545 ome.units.quantity.Length sw = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(an.strokeWidth), ome.units.UNITS.PIXEL);
5546 omexml.setPointStrokeWidth(sw, i, serie);
5547 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color colf = new ome.xml.model.primitives.Color(an.fillColor.R, an.fillColor.G, an.fillColor.B, an.fillColor.A);
5548 omexml.setPointFillColor(colf, i, serie);
5549 }
5550 else
5551 if (an.type == ROI.Type.Polygon || an.type == ROI.Type.Freeform)
5552 {
5553 if (an.id != "")
5554 omexml.setPolygonID(an.id, i, serie);
5555 else
5556 omexml.setPolygonID("Shape:" + i + ":" + serie, i, serie);
5557 omexml.setPolygonPoints(an.PointsToString(b), i, serie);
5558 omexml.setPolygonTheZ(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(an.coord.Z)), i, serie);
5559 omexml.setPolygonTheC(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(an.coord.C)), i, serie);
5560 omexml.setPolygonTheT(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(an.coord.T)), i, serie);
5561 if (an.Text != "")
5562 omexml.setPolygonText(an.Text, i, serie);
5563 else
5564 omexml.setPolygonText(i.ToString(), i, serie);
5565 ome.units.quantity.Length fl = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(an.fontSize), ome.units.UNITS.PIXEL);
5566 omexml.setPolygonFontSize(fl, i, serie);
5567 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color col = new ome.xml.model.primitives.Color(an.strokeColor.R, an.strokeColor.G, an.strokeColor.B, an.strokeColor.A);
5568 omexml.setPolygonStrokeColor(col, i, serie);
5569 ome.units.quantity.Length sw = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(an.strokeWidth), ome.units.UNITS.PIXEL);
5570 omexml.setPolygonStrokeWidth(sw, i, serie);
5571 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color colf = new ome.xml.model.primitives.Color(an.fillColor.R, an.fillColor.G, an.fillColor.B, an.fillColor.A);
5572 omexml.setPolygonFillColor(colf, i, serie);
5573 }
5574 else
5575 if (an.type == ROI.Type.Rectangle)
5576 {
5577 if (an.id != "")
5578 omexml.setRectangleID(an.id, i, serie);
5579 else
5580 omexml.setRectangleID("Shape:" + i + ":" + serie, i, serie);
5581 omexml.setRectangleWidth(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.ToImageSizeX(an.W)), i, serie);
5582 omexml.setRectangleHeight(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.ToImageSizeY(an.H)), i, serie);
5583 omexml.setRectangleX(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.ToImageSpaceX(an.Rect.X)), i, serie);
5584 omexml.setRectangleY(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.ToImageSpaceY(an.Rect.Y)), i, serie);
5585 omexml.setRectangleTheZ(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(an.coord.Z)), i, serie);
5586 omexml.setRectangleTheC(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(an.coord.C)), i, serie);
5587 omexml.setRectangleTheT(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(an.coord.T)), i, serie);
5588 omexml.setRectangleText(i.ToString(), i, serie);
5589 if (an.Text != "")
5590 omexml.setRectangleText(an.Text, i, serie);
5591 else
5592 omexml.setRectangleText(i.ToString(), i, serie);
5593 ome.units.quantity.Length fl = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(an.fontSize), ome.units.UNITS.PIXEL);
5594 omexml.setRectangleFontSize(fl, i, serie);
5595 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color col = new ome.xml.model.primitives.Color(an.strokeColor.R, an.strokeColor.G, an.strokeColor.B, an.strokeColor.A);
5596 omexml.setRectangleStrokeColor(col, i, serie);
5597 ome.units.quantity.Length sw = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(an.strokeWidth), ome.units.UNITS.PIXEL);
5598 omexml.setRectangleStrokeWidth(sw, i, serie);
5599 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color colf = new ome.xml.model.primitives.Color(an.fillColor.R, an.fillColor.G, an.fillColor.B, an.fillColor.A);
5600 omexml.setRectangleFillColor(colf, i, serie);
5601 }
5602 else
5603 if (an.type == ROI.Type.Line)
5604 {
5605 if (an.id != "")
5606 omexml.setLineID(an.id, i, serie);
5607 else
5608 omexml.setLineID("Shape:" + i + ":" + serie, i, serie);
5609 omexml.setLineX1(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.ToImageSpaceX(an.GetPoint(0).X)), i, serie);
5610 omexml.setLineY1(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.ToImageSpaceY(an.GetPoint(0).Y)), i, serie);
5611 omexml.setLineX2(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.ToImageSpaceX(an.GetPoint(1).X)), i, serie);
5612 omexml.setLineY2(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.ToImageSpaceY(an.GetPoint(1).Y)), i, serie);
5613 omexml.setLineTheZ(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(an.coord.Z)), i, serie);
5614 omexml.setLineTheC(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(an.coord.C)), i, serie);
5615 omexml.setLineTheT(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(an.coord.T)), i, serie);
5616 if (an.Text != "")
5617 omexml.setLineText(an.Text, i, serie);
5618 else
5619 omexml.setLineText(i.ToString(), i, serie);
5620 ome.units.quantity.Length fl = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(an.fontSize), ome.units.UNITS.PIXEL);
5621 omexml.setLineFontSize(fl, i, serie);
5622 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color col = new ome.xml.model.primitives.Color(an.strokeColor.R, an.strokeColor.G, an.strokeColor.B, an.strokeColor.A);
5623 omexml.setLineStrokeColor(col, i, serie);
5624 ome.units.quantity.Length sw = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(an.strokeWidth), ome.units.UNITS.PIXEL);
5625 omexml.setLineStrokeWidth(sw, i, serie);
5626 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color colf = new ome.xml.model.primitives.Color(an.fillColor.R, an.fillColor.G, an.fillColor.B, an.fillColor.A);
5627 omexml.setLineFillColor(colf, i, serie);
5628 }
5629 else
5630 if (an.type == ROI.Type.Ellipse)
5631 {
5632
5633 if (an.id != "")
5634 omexml.setEllipseID(an.id, i, serie);
5635 else
5636 omexml.setEllipseID("Shape:" + i + ":" + serie, i, serie);
5637 //We need to change System.Drawing.Rectangle to ellipse radius;
5638 double w = (double)an.W / 2;
5639 double h = (double)an.H / 2;
5640 omexml.setEllipseRadiusX(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.ToImageSizeX(w)), i, serie);
5641 omexml.setEllipseRadiusY(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.ToImageSizeY(h)), i, serie);
5642
5643 double x = an.Point.X + w;
5644 double y = an.Point.Y + h;
5645 omexml.setEllipseX(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.ToImageSpaceX(x)), i, serie);
5646 omexml.setEllipseY(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.ToImageSpaceX(y)), i, serie);
5647 omexml.setEllipseTheZ(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(an.coord.Z)), i, serie);
5648 omexml.setEllipseTheC(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(an.coord.C)), i, serie);
5649 omexml.setEllipseTheT(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(an.coord.T)), i, serie);
5650 if (an.Text != "")
5651 omexml.setEllipseText(an.Text, i, serie);
5652 else
5653 omexml.setEllipseText(i.ToString(), i, serie);
5654 ome.units.quantity.Length fl = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(an.fontSize), ome.units.UNITS.PIXEL);
5655 omexml.setEllipseFontSize(fl, i, serie);
5656 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color col = new ome.xml.model.primitives.Color(an.strokeColor.R, an.strokeColor.G, an.strokeColor.B, an.strokeColor.A);
5657 omexml.setEllipseStrokeColor(col, i, serie);
5658 ome.units.quantity.Length sw = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(an.strokeWidth), ome.units.UNITS.PIXEL);
5659 omexml.setEllipseStrokeWidth(sw, i, serie);
5660 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color colf = new ome.xml.model.primitives.Color(an.fillColor.R, an.fillColor.G, an.fillColor.B, an.fillColor.A);
5661 omexml.setEllipseFillColor(colf, i, serie);
5662 }
5663 else
5664 if (an.type == ROI.Type.Label)
5665 {
5666 if (an.id != "")
5667 omexml.setLabelID(an.id, i, serie);
5668 else
5669 omexml.setLabelID("Shape:" + i + ":" + serie, i, serie);
5670 omexml.setLabelX(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.ToImageSpaceX(an.Rect.X)), i, serie);
5671 omexml.setLabelY(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.ToImageSpaceY(an.Rect.Y)), i, serie);
5672 omexml.setLabelTheZ(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(an.coord.Z)), i, serie);
5673 omexml.setLabelTheC(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(an.coord.C)), i, serie);
5674 omexml.setLabelTheT(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(an.coord.T)), i, serie);
5675 omexml.setLabelText(i.ToString(), i, serie);
5676 if (an.Text != "")
5677 omexml.setLabelText(an.Text, i, serie);
5678 else
5679 omexml.setLabelText(i.ToString(), i, serie);
5680 ome.units.quantity.Length fl = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(an.fontSize), ome.units.UNITS.PIXEL);
5681 omexml.setLabelFontSize(fl, i, serie);
5682 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color col = new ome.xml.model.primitives.Color(an.strokeColor.R, an.strokeColor.G, an.strokeColor.B, an.strokeColor.A);
5683 omexml.setLabelStrokeColor(col, i, serie);
5684 ome.units.quantity.Length sw = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(an.strokeWidth), ome.units.UNITS.PIXEL);
5685 omexml.setLabelStrokeWidth(sw, i, serie);
5686 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color colf = new ome.xml.model.primitives.Color(an.fillColor.R, an.fillColor.G, an.fillColor.B, an.fillColor.A);
5687 omexml.setLabelFillColor(colf, i, serie);
5688 }
5689 else
5690 if (an.type == ROI.Type.Mask || an.roiMask != null)
5691 {
5692 if (an.id != "")
5693 omexml.setMaskID(an.id, i, serie);
5694 else
5695 omexml.setMaskID("Shape:" + i + ":" + serie, i, serie);
5696 omexml.setMaskX(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.ToImageSpaceX(an.Rect.X)), i, serie);
5697 omexml.setMaskY(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.ToImageSpaceY(an.Rect.Y)), i, serie);
5698 omexml.setMaskTheZ(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(an.coord.Z)), i, serie);
5699 omexml.setMaskTheC(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(an.coord.C)), i, serie);
5700 omexml.setMaskTheT(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(an.coord.T)), i, serie);
5701 omexml.setMaskWidth(new java.lang.Double(an.W), i, serie);
5702 omexml.setMaskHeight(new java.lang.Double(an.H), i, serie);
5703 if (an.Text != "")
5704 omexml.setMaskText(an.Text, i, serie);
5705 else
5706 omexml.setMaskText(i.ToString(), i, serie);
5707 ome.units.quantity.Length fl = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(an.fontSize), ome.units.UNITS.PIXEL);
5708 omexml.setMaskFontSize(fl, i, serie);
5709 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color col = new ome.xml.model.primitives.Color(an.strokeColor.R, an.strokeColor.G, an.strokeColor.B, an.strokeColor.A);
5710 omexml.setMaskStrokeColor(col, i, serie);
5711 ome.units.quantity.Length sw = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(an.strokeWidth), ome.units.UNITS.PIXEL);
5712 omexml.setMaskStrokeWidth(sw, i, serie);
5713 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color colf = new ome.xml.model.primitives.Color(an.fillColor.R, an.fillColor.G, an.fillColor.B, an.fillColor.A);
5714 omexml.setMaskFillColor(colf, i, serie);
5715 byte[] bts = an.roiMask.GetBytes();
5716 omexml.setMaskBinData(bts, i, serie);
5717 omexml.setMaskBinDataBigEndian(new java.lang.Boolean(!BitConverter.IsLittleEndian), i, serie);
5718 omexml.setMaskBinDataLength(new NonNegativeLong(new java.lang.Long(bts.Length)), i, serie);
5719 omexml.setMaskBinDataCompression(ome.xml.model.enums.Compression.ZLIB, i, serie);
5720 }
5721
5722 i++;
5723 }
5724
5725 if (b.Buffers[0].Plane != null && planes)
5726 for (int bu = 0; bu < b.Buffers.Count; bu++)
5727 {
5728 //Correct order of parameters.
5729 if (b.Buffers[bu].Plane.Delta != 0)
5730 {
5731 ome.units.quantity.Time t = new ome.units.quantity.Time(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.Buffers[bu].Plane.Delta), ome.units.UNITS.MILLISECOND);
5732 omexml.setPlaneDeltaT(t, serie, bu);
5733 }
5734 if (b.Buffers[bu].Plane.Exposure != 0)
5735 {
5736 ome.units.quantity.Time et = new ome.units.quantity.Time(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.Buffers[bu].Plane.Exposure), ome.units.UNITS.MILLISECOND);
5737 omexml.setPlaneExposureTime(et, serie, bu);
5738 }
5739 ome.units.quantity.Length lx = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.Buffers[bu].Plane.Location.X), ome.units.UNITS.MICROMETER);
5740 ome.units.quantity.Length ly = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.Buffers[bu].Plane.Location.Y), ome.units.UNITS.MICROMETER);
5741 ome.units.quantity.Length lz = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.Buffers[bu].Plane.Location.Z), ome.units.UNITS.MICROMETER);
5742 omexml.setPlanePositionX(lx, serie, bu);
5743 omexml.setPlanePositionY(ly, serie, bu);
5744 omexml.setPlanePositionZ(lz, serie, bu);
5745 omexml.setPlaneTheC(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(b.Buffers[bu].Plane.Coordinate.C)), serie, bu);
5746 omexml.setPlaneTheZ(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(b.Buffers[bu].Plane.Coordinate.Z)), serie, bu);
5747 omexml.setPlaneTheT(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(b.Buffers[bu].Plane.Coordinate.T)), serie, bu);
5748
5749 omexml.setTiffDataPlaneCount(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(1)), serie, bu);
5750 omexml.setTiffDataIFD(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(bu)), serie, bu);
5751 omexml.setTiffDataFirstC(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(b.Buffers[bu].Plane.Coordinate.C)), serie, bu);
5752 omexml.setTiffDataFirstZ(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(b.Buffers[bu].Plane.Coordinate.Z)), serie, bu);
5753 omexml.setTiffDataFirstT(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(b.Buffers[bu].Plane.Coordinate.T)), serie, bu);
5754
5755 }
5756
5757 }
5758 writer.setMetadataRetrieve(omexml);
5759 f = f.Replace("\\", "/");
5760 writer.setId(f);
5761 status = "Saving OME Image Planes.";
5762 for (int i = 0; i < files.Length; i++)
5763 {
5764 BioImage b = files[i];
5765 writer.setSeries(i);
5766 for (int bu = 0; bu < b.Buffers.Count; bu++)
5767 {
5768 progressValue = (float)bu / (float)b.Buffers.Count;
5769 byte[] bts = b.Buffers[bu].GetSaveBytes(BitConverter.IsLittleEndian);
5770 writer.saveBytes(bu, bts);
5771 }
5772 }
5773 bool stop = false;
5774 do
5775 {
5776 try
5777 {
5778 writer.close();
5779 stop = true;
5780 }
5781 catch (Exception e)
5782 {
5783 //Scripting.LogLine(e.Message);
5784 }
5785
5786 } while (!stop);
5787 }
5799 private static int GetBands(PixelFormat format)
5800 {
5801 switch (format)
5802 {
5803 case AForge.PixelFormat.Format8bppIndexed: return 1;
5804 case AForge.PixelFormat.Format16bppGrayScale: return 1;
5805 case AForge.PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb: return 3;
5806 case AForge.PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb:
5807 case AForge.PixelFormat.Format32bppPArgb:
5808 case AForge.PixelFormat.Format32bppRgb:
5809 return 4;
5810 case AForge.PixelFormat.Format48bppRgb:
5811 return 3;
5812 default:
5813 throw new NotSupportedException($"Unsupported pixel format: {format}");
5814 }
5815 }
5826 public static void SaveOMEPyramidal(BioImage[] bms, string file, Enums.ForeignTiffCompression compression, int compressionLevel)
5827 {
5828 if (File.Exists(file))
5829 File.Delete(file);
5830 //We need to go through the images and find the ones belonging to each resolution.
5831 //As well we need to determine the dimensions of the tiles.
5832 Dictionary<double, List<BioImage>> bis = new Dictionary<double, List<BioImage>>();
5833 Dictionary<double, Point3D> min = new Dictionary<double, Point3D>();
5834 Dictionary<double, Point3D> max = new Dictionary<double, Point3D>();
5835 for (int i = 0; i < bms.Length; i++)
5836 {
5837 Resolution res = bms[i].Resolutions[bms[i].Level];
5838 if (bis.ContainsKey(res.PhysicalSizeX))
5839 {
5840 bis[res.PhysicalSizeX].Add(bms[i]);
5841 if (bms[i].StageSizeX < min[res.PhysicalSizeX].X || bms[i].StageSizeY < min[res.PhysicalSizeX].Y)
5842 {
5843 min[res.PhysicalSizeX] = bms[i].Volume.Location;
5844 }
5845 if (bms[i].StageSizeX > max[res.PhysicalSizeX].X || bms[i].StageSizeY > max[res.PhysicalSizeX].Y)
5846 {
5847 max[res.PhysicalSizeX] = bms[i].Volume.Location;
5848 }
5849 }
5850 else
5851 {
5852 bis.Add(res.PhysicalSizeX, new List<BioImage>());
5853 min.Add(res.PhysicalSizeX, new Point3D(double.MaxValue, double.MaxValue, double.MaxValue));
5854 max.Add(res.PhysicalSizeX, new Point3D(double.MinValue, double.MinValue, double.MinValue));
5855 if (bms[i].StageSizeX < min[res.PhysicalSizeX].X || bms[i].StageSizeY < min[res.PhysicalSizeX].Y)
5856 {
5857 min[res.PhysicalSizeX] = bms[i].Volume.Location;
5858 }
5859 if (bms[i].StageSizeX > max[res.PhysicalSizeX].X || bms[i].StageSizeY > max[res.PhysicalSizeX].Y)
5860 {
5861 max[res.PhysicalSizeX] = bms[i].Volume.Location;
5862 }
5863 bis[res.PhysicalSizeX].Add(bms[i]);
5864 }
5865 }
5866 int s = 0;
5867 //We determine the sizes of each resolution.
5868 Dictionary<double, AForge.Size> ss = new Dictionary<double, AForge.Size>();
5869 int minx = int.MaxValue;
5870 int miny = int.MaxValue;
5871 double last = 0;
5872 foreach (double px in bis.Keys)
5873 {
5874 int xs = (1 + (int)Math.Ceiling((max[px].X - min[px].X) / bis[px][0].Resolutions[0].VolumeWidth)) * bis[px][0].SizeX;
5875 int ys = (1 + (int)Math.Ceiling((max[px].Y - min[px].Y) / bis[px][0].Resolutions[0].VolumeHeight)) * bis[px][0].SizeY;
5876 if (minx > xs)
5877 minx = xs;
5878 if (miny > ys)
5879 miny = ys;
5880 ss.Add(px, new AForge.Size(xs, ys));
5881 last = px;
5882 }
5883 s = 0;
5884 string met = "<?xml version=\"1.0\" encoding=\"UTF-8\" standalone=\"no\"?>" +
5885 "<OME xmlns=\"http://www.openmicroscopy.org/Schemas/OME/2016-06\" " +
5886 "xmlns:xsi=\"http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance\" " +
5887 "xsi:schemaLocation=\"http://www.openmicroscopy.org/Schemas/OME/2016-06 http://www.openmicroscopy.org/Schemas/OME/2016-06/ome.xsd\">";
5888 NetVips.Image img = null;
5889 int ib = 0;
5890
5891 foreach (double px in bis.Keys)
5892 {
5893 int c = bis[px][s].SizeC;
5894 if (bis[px][s].Buffers[0].isRGB)
5895 c = 3;
5896 string endian = (bis[px][s].Buffers[0].LittleEndian).ToString().ToLower();
5897 met +=
5898 "<Image ID=\"Image:" + ib + "\">" +
5899 "<Pixels BigEndian=\"" + endian + "\" DimensionOrder= \"XYCZT\" ID= \"Pixels:0\" Interleaved=\"true\" " +
5900 "PhysicalSizeX=\"" + bis[px][s].PhysicalSizeX + "\" PhysicalSizeXUnit=\"µm\" PhysicalSizeY=\"" + bis[px][s].PhysicalSizeY + "\" PhysicalSizeYUnit=\"µm\" SignificantBits=\"" + bis[px][s].bitsPerPixel + "\" " +
5901 "SizeC = \"" + c + "\" SizeT = \"" + bis[px][s].SizeT + "\" SizeX =\"" + ss[px].Width +
5902 "\" SizeY= \"" + ss[px].Height + "\" SizeZ=\"" + bis[px][s].SizeZ;
5903 if (bis[px][s].bitsPerPixel > 8) met += "\" Type= \"uint16\">";
5904 else met += "\" Type= \"uint8\">";
5905 int i = 0;
5906 foreach (Channel ch in bis[px][s].Channels)
5907 {
5908 met += "<Channel ID=\"Channel:" + ib + ":" + i + "\" SamplesPerPixel=\"1\"></Channel>";
5909 i++;
5910 }
5911 met += "</Pixels></Image>";
5912 ib++;
5913 }
5914 met += "</OME>";
5915 foreach (double px in bis.Keys)
5916 {
5917 PixelFormat pf = bis[px][0].Buffers[0].PixelFormat;
5918 Bitmap level = new Bitmap(ss[px].Width, ss[px].Height, pf);
5919 int bands = GetBands(pf);
5920 if (bis[px][0].bitsPerPixel > 8)
5921 img = NetVips.Image.NewFromMemory(level.Data, (ulong)level.Length, level.Width, level.Height, bands, Enums.BandFormat.Ushort);
5922 else
5923 img = NetVips.Image.NewFromMemory(level.Data, (ulong)level.Length, level.Width, level.Height, bands, Enums.BandFormat.Uchar);
5924 int i = 0;
5925 foreach (BioImage b in bis[px])
5926 {
5927 AForge.Size si = ss[px];
5928 double xs = (-(min[px].X - bis[px][i].Volume.Location.X) / bis[px][i].Resolutions[0].VolumeWidth) * bis[px][i].SizeX;
5929 double ys = (-(min[px].Y - bis[px][i].Volume.Location.Y) / bis[px][i].Resolutions[0].VolumeHeight) * bis[px][i].SizeY;
5930 NetVips.Image tile;
5931 if (b.bitsPerPixel > 8)
5932 tile = NetVips.Image.NewFromMemory(bis[px][i].Buffers[0].Data, (ulong)bis[px][i].Buffers[0].Length, bis[px][i].Buffers[0].Width, bis[px][i].Buffers[0].Height, bands, Enums.BandFormat.Ushort);
5933 else
5934 tile = NetVips.Image.NewFromMemory(bis[px][i].Buffers[0].Data, (ulong)bis[px][i].Buffers[0].Length, bis[px][i].Buffers[0].Width, bis[px][i].Buffers[0].Height, bands, Enums.BandFormat.Uchar);
5935 img = img.Insert(tile, (int)xs, (int)ys);
5936 i++;
5937 };
5938 using var mutated = img.Mutate(mutable =>
5939 {
5940 // Set the ImageDescription tag
5941 mutable.Set(GValue.GStrType, "image-description", met);
5942 mutable.Set(GValue.GIntType, "page-height", ss[last].Height);
5943 });
5944 if (bis[px][0].bitsPerPixel > 8)
5945 mutated.Tiffsave(file, compression, 1, Enums.ForeignTiffPredictor.None, true, ss[px].Width, ss[px].Height, true, false, 16,
5946 Enums.ForeignTiffResunit.Cm, 1000 * bis[px][0].PhysicalSizeX, 1000 * bis[px][0].PhysicalSizeY, true, null, Enums.RegionShrink.Nearest,
5947 compressionLevel, true, Enums.ForeignDzDepth.One, true, false, null, null, ss[px].Height);
5948 else
5949 mutated.Tiffsave(file, compression, 1, Enums.ForeignTiffPredictor.None, true, ss[px].Width, ss[px].Height, true, false, 8,
5950 Enums.ForeignTiffResunit.Cm, 1000 * bis[px][0].PhysicalSizeX, 1000 * bis[px][0].PhysicalSizeY, true, null, Enums.RegionShrink.Nearest,
5951 compressionLevel, true, Enums.ForeignDzDepth.One, true, false, null, null, ss[px].Height);
5952 s++;
5953 }
5954
5955 }
5956
5965 public static BioImage OpenOME(string file, bool tab)
5966 {
5967 return OpenOMESeries(file, tab, true)[0];
5968 }
5977 public static BioImage OpenOME(string file, int serie)
5978 {
5979 Recorder.AddLine("BioGTK.BioImage.OpenOME(\"" + file + "\"," + serie + ");");
5980 return OpenOME(file, serie, true, false, false, 0, 0, 0, 0);
5981 }
5993 public static BioImage FilesToStack(string[] files, int sizeZ, int sizeC, int sizeT)
5994 {
5995 BioImage b = new BioImage(files[0]);
5996 for (int i = 0; i < files.Length; i++)
5997 {
5998 BioImage bb = OpenFile(files[i], false);
5999 b.Buffers.AddRange(bb.Buffers);
6000 }
6001 b.UpdateCoords(sizeZ, sizeC, sizeT);
6002 Images.AddImage(b, true);
6003 return b;
6004 }
6010 public static BioImage FolderToStack(string path, bool tab)
6011 {
6012 string[] files = Directory.GetFiles(path);
6013 BioImage b = new BioImage(files[0]);
6014 int z = 0;
6015 int c = 0;
6016 int t = 0;
6017 BioImage bb = null;
6018 for (int i = 0; i < files.Length; i++)
6019 {
6020 string[] st = files[i].Split('_');
6021 if (st.Length > 3)
6022 {
6023 z = int.Parse(st[1].Replace("Z", ""));
6024 c = int.Parse(st[2].Replace("C", ""));
6025 t = int.Parse(st[3].Replace("T", ""));
6026 }
6027 bb = OpenFile(files[i], tab);
6028 b.Buffers.AddRange(bb.Buffers);
6029 }
6030 if (z == 0)
6031 {
6032 /*TO DO
6033 ImagesToStack im = new ImagesToStack();
6034 if (im.ShowDialog() != DialogResult.OK)
6035 return null;
6036 b.UpdateCoords(im.SizeZ, im.SizeC, im.SizeT);
6037 */
6038 }
6039 else
6040 b.UpdateCoords(z + 1, c + 1, t + 1);
6041 Images.AddImage(b, tab);
6042 Recorder.AddLine("BioImage.FolderToStack(\"" + path + "\");");
6043 return b;
6044 }
6045 static bool vips = false;
6054 public static void OpenVips(BioImage b, int pagecount)
6055 {
6056 try
6057 {
6058 for (int i = 0; i < pagecount; i++)
6059 {
6060 b.vipPages.Add(NetVips.Image.Tiffload(b.file, i));
6061 }
6062 }
6063 catch (Exception e)
6064 {
6065 Console.WriteLine(e.Message);
6066 }
6067
6068 }
6088 public static Bitmap ExtractRegionFromTiledTiff(BioImage b, int x, int y, int width, int height, int res)
6089 {
6090 try
6091 {
6092 NetVips.Image subImage = b.vipPages[res].Crop(x, y, width, height);
6093 if (b.vipPages[res].Format == Enums.BandFormat.Uchar)
6094 {
6095 Bitmap bm;
6096 byte[] imageData = subImage.WriteToMemory();
6097 if (b.Resolutions[res].RGBChannelsCount == 3)
6098 bm = new Bitmap(width, height, PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb, imageData, new ZCT(), b.file);
