6099 else
6100 bm = new Bitmap(width, height, PixelFormat.Format8bppIndexed, imageData, new ZCT(), b.file);
6101 return bm;
6102
6103 }
6104 else if (b.vipPages[res].Format == Enums.BandFormat.Ushort)
6105 {
6106 Bitmap bm;
6107 byte[] imageData = subImage.WriteToMemory();
6108 if (b.Resolutions[res].RGBChannelsCount == 3)
6109 bm = new Bitmap(width, height, PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb, imageData, new ZCT(), b.file);
6110 else
6111 bm = new Bitmap(width, height, PixelFormat.Format8bppIndexed, imageData, new ZCT(), b.file);
6112 return bm;
6113 }
6114 }
6115 catch (Exception ex)
6116 {
6117 Console.WriteLine($"Error: {ex.Message}");
6118 return null;
6119 }
6120 return null;
6121 }
6148 public static BioImage OpenOME(string file, int serie, bool tab, bool addToImages, bool tile, int tilex, int tiley, int tileSizeX, int tileSizeY, bool useOpenSlide = true)
6149 {
6150 if (file == null || file == "")
6151 throw new InvalidDataException("File is empty or null");
6152 //We wait incase OME has not initialized.
6153 do
6154 {
6155 Thread.Sleep(10);
6156 } while (!initialized);
6157 Console.WriteLine("OpenOME " + file);
6158 reader = new ImageReader();
6159 Progress pr = Progress.Create(file, "Opening OME", "Opening OME file.");
6160 // update ui on main UI thread
6161 Application.Invoke(delegate
6162 {
6163 pr.Show();
6164 pr.Present();
6165 });
6166 if (tileSizeX == 0)
6167 tileSizeX = 1920;
6168 if (tileSizeY == 0)
6169 tileSizeY = 1080;
6170 progressValue = 0;
6171 progFile = file;
6172 BioImage b = new BioImage(file);
6173 b.Type = ImageType.stack;
6174 b.Loading = true;
6175 if (b.meta == null)
6176 b.meta = service.createOMEXMLMetadata();
6177 string f = file.Replace("\\", "/");
6178 string cf = reader.getCurrentFile();
6179 if (cf != null)
6180 cf = cf.Replace("\\", "/");
6181 if (cf != f)
6182 {
6183 reader.close();
6184 reader.setMetadataStore(b.meta);
6185 try
6186 {
6187 reader.setId(f);
6188 }
6189 catch (Exception e)
6190 {
6191 Console.WriteLine(e.Message);
6192 return null;
6193 }
6194
6195 pr.Status = "Reading Metadata";
6196 }
6197
6198 //status = "Reading OME Metadata.";
6199 reader.setSeries(serie);
6200 int RGBChannelCount = reader.getRGBChannelCount();
6201 //OME reader.getBitsPerPixel(); sometimes returns incorrect bits per pixel, like when opening ImageJ images.
6202 //So we check the pixel type from xml metadata and if it fails we use the readers value.
6203 PixelFormat PixelFormat;
6204 try
6205 {
6206 PixelFormat = GetPixelFormat(RGBChannelCount, b.meta.getPixelsType(serie));
6207 }
6208 catch (Exception)
6209 {
6210 PixelFormat = GetPixelFormat(RGBChannelCount, reader.getBitsPerPixel());
6211 }
6212
6213 b.id = file;
6214 b.file = file;
6215 int SizeX, SizeY;
6216 SizeX = reader.getSizeX();
6217 SizeY = reader.getSizeY();
6218 int SizeZ = reader.getSizeZ();
6219 b.sizeC = reader.getSizeC();
6220 b.sizeZ = reader.getSizeZ();
6221 b.sizeT = reader.getSizeT();
6222 b.littleEndian = reader.isLittleEndian();
6223 b.seriesCount = reader.getSeriesCount();
6224 b.imagesPerSeries = reader.getImageCount();
6225 b.bitsPerPixel = reader.getBitsPerPixel();
6226 b.series = serie;
6227 string order = reader.getDimensionOrder();
6228
6229 //Lets get the channels and initialize them
6230 int i = 0;
6231 pr.Status = "Reading Channels";
6232 int sumSamples = 0;
6233 while (true)
6234 {
6235 Channel ch = new Channel(i, b.bitsPerPixel, 1);
6236 bool def = false;
6237 try
6238 {
6239 if (b.meta.getChannelSamplesPerPixel(serie, i) != null)
6240 {
6241 int s = b.meta.getChannelSamplesPerPixel(serie, i).getNumberValue().intValue();
6242 ch.SamplesPerPixel = s;
6243 sumSamples += s;
6244 def = true;
6245 }
6246 if (b.meta.getChannelName(serie, i) != null)
6247 ch.Name = b.meta.getChannelName(serie, i);
6248 if (b.meta.getChannelAcquisitionMode(serie, i) != null)
6249 ch.AcquisitionMode = b.meta.getChannelAcquisitionMode(serie, i).ToString();
6250 if (b.meta.getChannelID(serie, i) != null)
6251 ch.info.ID = b.meta.getChannelID(serie, i);
6252 if (b.meta.getChannelFluor(serie, i) != null)
6253 ch.Fluor = b.meta.getChannelFluor(serie, i);
6254 if (b.meta.getChannelColor(serie, i) != null)
6255 {
6256 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color cc = b.meta.getChannelColor(serie, i);
6257 ch.Color = Color.FromArgb(cc.getRed(), cc.getGreen(), cc.getBlue());
6258 }
6259 if (b.meta.getChannelIlluminationType(serie, i) != null)
6260 ch.IlluminationType = b.meta.getChannelIlluminationType(serie, i).ToString();
6261 if (b.meta.getChannelContrastMethod(serie, i) != null)
6262 ch.ContrastMethod = b.meta.getChannelContrastMethod(serie, i).ToString();
6263 if (b.meta.getChannelEmissionWavelength(serie, i) != null)
6264 ch.Emission = b.meta.getChannelEmissionWavelength(serie, i).value().intValue();
6265 if (b.meta.getChannelExcitationWavelength(serie, i) != null)
6266 ch.Excitation = b.meta.getChannelExcitationWavelength(serie, i).value().intValue();
6267 if (b.meta.getLightEmittingDiodePower(serie, i) != null)
6268 ch.LightSourceIntensity = b.meta.getLightEmittingDiodePower(serie, i).value().doubleValue();
6269 if (b.meta.getLightEmittingDiodeID(serie, i) != null)
6270 ch.DiodeName = b.meta.getLightEmittingDiodeID(serie, i);
6271 if (b.meta.getChannelLightSourceSettingsAttenuation(serie, i) != null)
6272 ch.LightSourceAttenuation = b.meta.getChannelLightSourceSettingsAttenuation(serie, i).toString();
6273
6274 }
6275 catch (Exception e)
6276 {
6277 Console.WriteLine(e.Message);
6278 }
6279 //If this channel is not defined we have loaded all the channels in the file.
6280 if (!def)
6281 break;
6282 else
6283 b.Channels.Add(ch);
6284 if (i == 0)
6285 {
6286 b.rgbChannels[0] = 0;
6287 }
6288 else
6289 if (i == 1)
6290 {
6291 b.rgbChannels[1] = 1;
6292 }
6293 else
6294 if (i == 2)
6295 {
6296 b.rgbChannels[2] = 2;
6297 }
6298 i++;
6299 }
6300 //If the file doens't have channels we initialize them.
6301 if (b.Channels.Count == 0)
6302 {
6303 b.Channels.Add(new Channel(0, b.bitsPerPixel, RGBChannelCount));
6304 }
6305
6306 //Bioformats gives a size of 3 for C when saved in ImageJ as RGB. We need to correct for this as C should be 1 for RGB.
6307 if (RGBChannelCount >= 3)
6308 {
6309 b.sizeC = sumSamples / b.Channels[0].SamplesPerPixel;
6310 }
6311 b.Coords = new int[b.SizeZ, b.SizeC, b.SizeT];
6312
6313 int resc = reader.getResolutionCount();
6314
6315 try
6316 {
6317 int wells = b.meta.getWellCount(0);
6318 if(wells>0)
6319 {
6320 b.Type = ImageType.well;
6321 b.Plate = new WellPlate(b);
6322 tile = false;
6323 }
6324 }
6325 catch (Exception)
6326 {
6327
6328 }
6329 List<Resolution> rss = new List<Resolution>();
6330 for (int s = 0; s < b.seriesCount; s++)
6331 {
6332 reader.setSeries(s);
6333 for (int r = 0; r < reader.getResolutionCount(); r++)
6334 {
6335 Resolution res = new Resolution();
6336 try
6337 {
6338 int rgbc = reader.getRGBChannelCount();
6339 int bps = reader.getBitsPerPixel();
6340 PixelFormat px;
6341 try
6342 {
6343 px = GetPixelFormat(rgbc, b.meta.getPixelsType(r));
6344 }
6345 catch (Exception)
6346 {
6347 px = GetPixelFormat(rgbc, bps);
6348 }
6349 res.PixelFormat = px;
6350 res.SizeX = reader.getSizeX();
6351 res.SizeY = reader.getSizeY();
6352 if (b.meta.getPixelsPhysicalSizeX(r) != null)
6353 {
6354 res.PhysicalSizeX = b.meta.getPixelsPhysicalSizeX(r).value().doubleValue();
6355 }
6356 else
6357 res.PhysicalSizeX = (96 / 2.54) / 1000;
6358 if (b.meta.getPixelsPhysicalSizeY(r) != null)
6359 {
6360 res.PhysicalSizeY = b.meta.getPixelsPhysicalSizeY(r).value().doubleValue();
6361 }
6362 else
6363 res.PhysicalSizeY = (96 / 2.54) / 1000;
6364
6365 if (b.meta.getStageLabelX(r) != null)
6366 res.StageSizeX = b.meta.getStageLabelX(r).value().doubleValue();
6367 if (b.meta.getStageLabelY(r) != null)
6368 res.StageSizeY = b.meta.getStageLabelY(r).value().doubleValue();
6369 if (b.meta.getStageLabelZ(r) != null)
6370 res.StageSizeZ = b.meta.getStageLabelZ(r).value().doubleValue();
6371 else
6372 res.StageSizeZ = 1;
6373 if (b.meta.getPixelsPhysicalSizeZ(r) != null)
6374 {
6375 res.PhysicalSizeZ = b.meta.getPixelsPhysicalSizeZ(r).value().doubleValue();
6376 }
6377 else
6378 {
6379 res.PhysicalSizeZ = 1;
6380 }
6381 }
6382 catch (Exception e)
6383 {
6384 Console.WriteLine("No Stage Coordinates. PhysicalSize:(" + res.PhysicalSizeX + "," + res.PhysicalSizeY + "," + res.PhysicalSizeZ + ")");
6385 }
6386 rss.Add(res);
6387 }
6388 }
6389 reader.setSeries(serie);
6390
6391 int pyramidCount = 0;
6392 int pyramidResolutions = 0;
6393 List<Tuple<int, int>> prs = new List<Tuple<int, int>>();
6394 //We need to determine if this image is pyramidal or not.
6395 //We do this by seeing if the resolutions are downsampled or not.
6396 if (rss.Count > 1 && b.Type != ImageType.well)
6397 {
6398 if (rss[0].SizeX > rss[1].SizeX)
6399 {
6400 b.Type = ImageType.pyramidal;
6401 tile = true;
6402 //We need to determine number of pyramids in this image and which belong to the series we are opening.
6403 int? sr = null;
6404 for (int r = 0; r < rss.Count - 1; r++)
6405 {
6406 if (rss[r].SizeX > rss[r + 1].SizeX && rss[r].PixelFormat == rss[r + 1].PixelFormat)
6407 {
6408 if (sr == null)
6409 {
6410 sr = r;
6411 prs.Add(new Tuple<int, int>(r, 0));
6412 }
6413 }
6414 else
6415 {
6416 if(rss[prs[prs.Count - 1].Item1].PixelFormat == rss[r].PixelFormat)
6417 prs[prs.Count - 1] = new Tuple<int, int>(prs[prs.Count - 1].Item1, r);
6418 sr = null;
6419 }
6420 }
6421 pyramidCount = prs.Count;
6422 for (int p = 0; p < prs.Count; p++)
6423 {
6424 pyramidResolutions += (prs[p].Item2 - prs[p].Item1)+1;
6425 }
6426
6427 if (prs[serie].Item2 == 0)
6428 {
6429 prs[serie] = new Tuple<int, int>(prs[serie].Item1, rss.Count);
6430 }
6431 for (int r = prs[serie].Item1; r < prs[serie].Item2; r++)
6432 {
6433 b.Resolutions.Add(rss[r]);
6434 }
6435 }
6436 else
6437 {
6438 b.Resolutions.AddRange(rss);
6439 }
6440 }
6441 else
6442 b.Resolutions.AddRange(rss);
6443
6444 //If we have 2 resolutions that we're not added they are the label & macro resolutions so we add them to the image.
6445 if(rss.Count - pyramidResolutions == 2)
6446 {
6447 b.Resolutions.Add(rss[rss.Count - 2]);
6448 b.Resolutions.Add(rss[rss.Count - 1]);
6449 }
6450
6451 b.Volume = new VolumeD(new Point3D(b.StageSizeX, b.StageSizeY, b.StageSizeZ), new Point3D(b.PhysicalSizeX * SizeX, b.PhysicalSizeY * SizeY, b.PhysicalSizeZ * SizeZ));
6452 pr.Status = "Reading ROIs";
6453 int rc = b.meta.getROICount();
6454 for (int im = 0; im < rc; im++)
6455 {
6456 string roiID = b.meta.getROIID(im);
6457 string roiName = b.meta.getROIName(im);
6458 ZCT co = new ZCT(0, 0, 0);
6459 int scount = 1;
6460 try
6461 {
6462 scount = b.meta.getShapeCount(im);
6463 }
6464 catch (Exception e)
6465 {
6466 Console.WriteLine(e.Message.ToString());
6467 }
6468 for (int sc = 0; sc < scount; sc++)
6469 {
6470 string type = b.meta.getShapeType(im, sc);
6471 ROI an = new ROI();
6472 an.roiID = roiID;
6473 an.roiName = roiName;
6474 an.shapeIndex = sc;
6475 if (type == "Point")
6476 {
6477 an.type = ROI.Type.Point;
6478 an.id = b.meta.getPointID(im, sc);
6479 double dx = b.meta.getPointX(im, sc).doubleValue();
6480 double dy = b.meta.getPointY(im, sc).doubleValue();
6481 an.AddPoint(b.ToStageSpace(new PointD(dx, dy)));
6482 an.coord = new ZCT();
6483 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nz = b.meta.getPointTheZ(im, sc);
6484 if (nz != null)
6485 an.coord.Z = nz.getNumberValue().intValue();
6486 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nc = b.meta.getPointTheC(im, sc);
6487 if (nc != null)
6488 an.coord.C = nc.getNumberValue().intValue();
6489 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nt = b.meta.getPointTheT(im, sc);
6490 if (nt != null)
6491 an.coord.T = nt.getNumberValue().intValue();
6492 an.Text = b.meta.getPointText(im, sc);
6493 ome.units.quantity.Length fl = b.meta.getPointFontSize(im, sc);
6494 if (fl != null)
6495 an.fontSize = fl.value().intValue();
6496 ome.xml.model.enums.FontFamily ff = b.meta.getPointFontFamily(im, sc);
6497 if (ff != null)
6498 an.family = ff.name();
6499 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color col = b.meta.getPointStrokeColor(im, sc);
6500 if (col != null)
6501 an.strokeColor = Color.FromArgb(col.getAlpha(), col.getRed(), col.getGreen(), col.getBlue());
6502 ome.units.quantity.Length fw = b.meta.getPointStrokeWidth(im, sc);
6503 if (fw != null)
6504 an.strokeWidth = (float)fw.value().floatValue();
6505 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color colf = b.meta.getPointStrokeColor(im, sc);
6506 if (colf != null)
6507 an.fillColor = Color.FromArgb(colf.getAlpha(), colf.getRed(), colf.getGreen(), colf.getBlue());
6508 }
6509 else
6510 if (type == "Line")
6511 {
6512 an.type = ROI.Type.Line;
6513 an.id = b.meta.getLineID(im, sc);
6514 double px1 = b.meta.getLineX1(im, sc).doubleValue();
6515 double py1 = b.meta.getLineY1(im, sc).doubleValue();
6516 double px2 = b.meta.getLineX2(im, sc).doubleValue();
6517 double py2 = b.meta.getLineY2(im, sc).doubleValue();
6518 an.AddPoint(b.ToStageSpace(new PointD(px1, py1)));
6519 an.AddPoint(b.ToStageSpace(new PointD(px2, py2)));
6520 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nz = b.meta.getLineTheZ(im, sc);
6521 if (nz != null)
6522 co.Z = nz.getNumberValue().intValue();
6523 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nc = b.meta.getLineTheC(im, sc);
6524 if (nc != null)
6525 co.C = nc.getNumberValue().intValue();
6526 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nt = b.meta.getLineTheT(im, sc);
6527 if (nt != null)
6528 co.T = nt.getNumberValue().intValue();
6529 an.coord = co;
6530 an.Text = b.meta.getLineText(im, sc);
6531 ome.units.quantity.Length fl = b.meta.getLineFontSize(im, sc);
6532 if (fl != null)
6533 an.fontSize = fl.value().intValue();
6534 ome.xml.model.enums.FontFamily ff = b.meta.getLineFontFamily(im, sc);
6535 if (ff != null)
6536 an.family = ff.name();
6537 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color col = b.meta.getLineStrokeColor(im, sc);
6538 if (col != null)
6539 an.strokeColor = Color.FromArgb(col.getAlpha(), col.getRed(), col.getGreen(), col.getBlue());
6540 ome.units.quantity.Length fw = b.meta.getLineStrokeWidth(im, sc);
6541 if (fw != null)
6542 an.strokeWidth = (float)fw.value().floatValue();
6543 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color colf = b.meta.getLineFillColor(im, sc);
6544 if (colf != null)
6545 an.fillColor = Color.FromArgb(colf.getAlpha(), colf.getRed(), colf.getGreen(), colf.getBlue());
6546 }
6547 else
6548 if (type == "Rectangle")
6549 {
6550 an.type = ROI.Type.Rectangle;
6551 an.id = b.meta.getRectangleID(im, sc);
6552 double px = b.meta.getRectangleX(im, sc).doubleValue();
6553 double py = b.meta.getRectangleY(im, sc).doubleValue();
6554 double pw = b.meta.getRectangleWidth(im, sc).doubleValue();
6555 double ph = b.meta.getRectangleHeight(im, sc).doubleValue();
6556 an.Rect = b.ToStageSpace(new RectangleD(px, py, pw, ph));
6557 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nz = b.meta.getRectangleTheZ(im, sc);
6558 if (nz != null)
6559 co.Z = nz.getNumberValue().intValue();
6560 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nc = b.meta.getRectangleTheC(im, sc);
6561 if (nc != null)
6562 co.C = nc.getNumberValue().intValue();
6563 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nt = b.meta.getRectangleTheT(im, sc);
6564 if (nt != null)
6565 co.T = nt.getNumberValue().intValue();
6566 an.coord = co;
6567
6568 an.Text = b.meta.getRectangleText(im, sc);
6569 ome.units.quantity.Length fl = b.meta.getRectangleFontSize(im, sc);
6570 if (fl != null)
6571 an.fontSize = fl.value().intValue();
6572 ome.xml.model.enums.FontFamily ff = b.meta.getRectangleFontFamily(im, sc);
6573 if (ff != null)
6574 an.family = ff.name();
6575 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color col = b.meta.getRectangleStrokeColor(im, sc);
6576 if (col != null)
6577 an.strokeColor = Color.FromArgb(col.getAlpha(), col.getRed(), col.getGreen(), col.getBlue());
6578 ome.units.quantity.Length fw = b.meta.getRectangleStrokeWidth(im, sc);
6579 if (fw != null)
6580 an.strokeWidth = (float)fw.value().floatValue();
6581 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color colf = b.meta.getRectangleFillColor(im, sc);
6582 if (colf != null)
6583 an.fillColor = Color.FromArgb(colf.getAlpha(), colf.getRed(), colf.getGreen(), colf.getBlue());
6584 ome.xml.model.enums.FillRule fr = b.meta.getRectangleFillRule(im, sc);
6585 }
6586 else
6587 if (type == "Ellipse")
6588 {
6589 an.type = ROI.Type.Ellipse;
6590 an.id = b.meta.getEllipseID(im, sc);
6591 double px = b.meta.getEllipseX(im, sc).doubleValue();
6592 double py = b.meta.getEllipseY(im, sc).doubleValue();
6593 double ew = b.meta.getEllipseRadiusX(im, sc).doubleValue();
6594 double eh = b.meta.getEllipseRadiusY(im, sc).doubleValue();
6595 //We convert the ellipse radius to Rectangle
6596 double w = ew * 2;
6597 double h = eh * 2;
6598 double x = px - ew;
6599 double y = py - eh;
6600 an.Rect = b.ToStageSpace(new RectangleD(x, y, w, h));
6601 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nz = b.meta.getEllipseTheZ(im, sc);
6602 if (nz != null)
6603 co.Z = nz.getNumberValue().intValue();
6604 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nc = b.meta.getEllipseTheC(im, sc);
6605 if (nc != null)
6606 co.C = nc.getNumberValue().intValue();
6607 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nt = b.meta.getEllipseTheT(im, sc);
6608 if (nt != null)
6609 co.T = nt.getNumberValue().intValue();
6610 an.coord = co;
6611 an.Text = b.meta.getEllipseText(im, sc);
6612 ome.units.quantity.Length fl = b.meta.getEllipseFontSize(im, sc);
6613 if (fl != null)
6614 an.fontSize = fl.value().intValue();
6615 ome.xml.model.enums.FontFamily ff = b.meta.getEllipseFontFamily(im, sc);
6616 if (ff != null)
6617 an.family = ff.name();
6618 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color col = b.meta.getEllipseStrokeColor(im, sc);
6619 if (col != null)
6620 an.strokeColor = Color.FromArgb(col.getAlpha(), col.getRed(), col.getGreen(), col.getBlue());
6621 ome.units.quantity.Length fw = b.meta.getEllipseStrokeWidth(im, sc);
6622 if (fw != null)
6623 an.strokeWidth = (float)fw.value().floatValue();
6624 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color colf = b.meta.getEllipseFillColor(im, sc);
6625 if (colf != null)
6626 an.fillColor = Color.FromArgb(colf.getAlpha(), colf.getRed(), colf.getGreen(), colf.getBlue());
6627 }
6628 else
6629 if (type == "Polygon")
6630 {
6631 an.type = ROI.Type.Polygon;
6632 an.id = b.meta.getPolygonID(im, sc);
6633 an.closed = true;
6634 string pxs = b.meta.getPolygonPoints(im, sc);
6635 PointD[] pts = an.stringToPoints(pxs);
6636 pts = b.ToStageSpace(pts);
6637 if (pts.Length > 100)
6638 {
6639 an.type = ROI.Type.Freeform;
6640 }
6641 an.AddPoints(pts);
6642 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nz = b.meta.getPolygonTheZ(im, sc);
6643 if (nz != null)
6644 co.Z = nz.getNumberValue().intValue();
6645 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nc = b.meta.getPolygonTheC(im, sc);
6646 if (nc != null)
6647 co.C = nc.getNumberValue().intValue();
6648 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nt = b.meta.getPolygonTheT(im, sc);
6649 if (nt != null)
6650 co.T = nt.getNumberValue().intValue();
6651 an.coord = co;
6652 an.Text = b.meta.getPolygonText(im, sc);
6653 ome.units.quantity.Length fl = b.meta.getPolygonFontSize(im, sc);
6654 if (fl != null)
6655 an.fontSize = fl.value().intValue();
6656 ome.xml.model.enums.FontFamily ff = b.meta.getPolygonFontFamily(im, sc);
6657 if (ff != null)
6658 an.family = ff.name();
6659 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color col = b.meta.getPolygonStrokeColor(im, sc);
6660 if (col != null)
6661 an.strokeColor = Color.FromArgb(col.getAlpha(), col.getRed(), col.getGreen(), col.getBlue());
6662 ome.units.quantity.Length fw = b.meta.getPolygonStrokeWidth(im, sc);
6663 if (fw != null)
6664 an.strokeWidth = (float)fw.value().floatValue();
6665 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color colf = b.meta.getPolygonFillColor(im, sc);
6666 if (colf != null)
6667 an.fillColor = Color.FromArgb(colf.getAlpha(), colf.getRed(), colf.getGreen(), colf.getBlue());
6668 }
6669 else
6670 if (type == "Polyline")
6671 {
6672 an.type = ROI.Type.Polyline;
6673 an.id = b.meta.getPolylineID(im, sc);
6674 string pxs = b.meta.getPolylinePoints(im, sc);
6675 PointD[] pts = an.stringToPoints(pxs);
6676 for (int pi = 0; pi < pts.Length; pi++)
6677 {
6678 pts[pi] = b.ToStageSpace(pts[pi]);
6679 }
6680 an.AddPoints(an.stringToPoints(pxs));
6681 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nz = b.meta.getPolylineTheZ(im, sc);
6682 if (nz != null)
6683 co.Z = nz.getNumberValue().intValue();
6684 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nc = b.meta.getPolylineTheC(im, sc);
6685 if (nc != null)
6686 co.C = nc.getNumberValue().intValue();
6687 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nt = b.meta.getPolylineTheT(im, sc);
6688 if (nt != null)
6689 co.T = nt.getNumberValue().intValue();
6690 an.coord = co;
6691 an.Text = b.meta.getPolylineText(im, sc);
6692 ome.units.quantity.Length fl = b.meta.getPolylineFontSize(im, sc);
6693 if (fl != null)
6694 an.fontSize = fl.value().intValue();
6695 ome.xml.model.enums.FontFamily ff = b.meta.getPolylineFontFamily(im, sc);
6696 if (ff != null)
6697 an.family = ff.name();
6698 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color col = b.meta.getPolylineStrokeColor(im, sc);
6699 if (col != null)
6700 an.strokeColor = Color.FromArgb(col.getAlpha(), col.getRed(), col.getGreen(), col.getBlue());
6701 ome.units.quantity.Length fw = b.meta.getPolylineStrokeWidth(im, sc);
6702 if (fw != null)
6703 an.strokeWidth = (float)fw.value().floatValue();
6704 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color colf = b.meta.getPolylineFillColor(im, sc);
6705 if (colf != null)
6706 an.fillColor = Color.FromArgb(colf.getAlpha(), colf.getRed(), colf.getGreen(), colf.getBlue());
6707 }
6708 else
6709 if (type == "Label")
6710 {
6711 an.type = ROI.Type.Label;
6712 an.id = b.meta.getLabelID(im, sc);
6713
6714 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nz = b.meta.getLabelTheZ(im, sc);
6715 if (nz != null)
6716 co.Z = nz.getNumberValue().intValue();
6717 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nc = b.meta.getLabelTheC(im, sc);
6718 if (nc != null)
6719 co.C = nc.getNumberValue().intValue();
6720 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nt = b.meta.getLabelTheT(im, sc);
6721 if (nt != null)
6722 co.T = nt.getNumberValue().intValue();
6723 an.coord = co;
6724
6725 ome.units.quantity.Length fl = b.meta.getLabelFontSize(im, sc);
6726 if (fl != null)
6727 an.fontSize = fl.value().intValue();
6728 ome.xml.model.enums.FontFamily ff = b.meta.getLabelFontFamily(im, sc);
6729 if (ff != null)
6730 an.family = ff.name();
6731 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color col = b.meta.getLabelStrokeColor(im, sc);
6732 if (col != null)
6733 an.strokeColor = Color.FromArgb(col.getAlpha(), col.getRed(), col.getGreen(), col.getBlue());
6734 ome.units.quantity.Length fw = b.meta.getLabelStrokeWidth(im, sc);
6735 if (fw != null)
6736 an.strokeWidth = (float)fw.value().floatValue();
6737 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color colf = b.meta.getLabelFillColor(im, sc);
6738 if (colf != null)
6739 an.fillColor = Color.FromArgb(colf.getAlpha(), colf.getRed(), colf.getGreen(), colf.getBlue());
6740 PointD p = new PointD(b.meta.getLabelX(im, sc).doubleValue(), b.meta.getLabelY(im, sc).doubleValue());
6741 an.AddPoint(b.ToStageSpace(p));
6742 an.Text = b.meta.getLabelText(im, sc);
6743 }
6744 else
6745 if (type == "Mask")
6746 {
6747 byte[] bts = b.meta.getMaskBinData(im, sc);
6748 bool end = b.meta.getMaskBinDataBigEndian(im, sc).booleanValue();
6749 an = ROI.CreateMask(co, bts, b.Resolutions[0].SizeX, b.Resolutions[0].SizeY,new PointD(b.StageSizeX,b.StageSizeY),b.PhysicalSizeX,b.PhysicalSizeY);
6750 an.Text = b.meta.getMaskText(im, sc);
6751 an.id = b.meta.getMaskID(im, sc);
6752 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nz = b.meta.getMaskTheZ(im, sc);
6753 if (nz != null)
6754 co.Z = nz.getNumberValue().intValue();
6755 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nc = b.meta.getMaskTheC(im, sc);
6756 if (nc != null)
6757 co.C = nc.getNumberValue().intValue();
6758 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nt = b.meta.getMaskTheT(im, sc);
6759 if (nt != null)
6760 co.T = nt.getNumberValue().intValue();
6761 an.coord = co;
6762
6763 ome.units.quantity.Length fl = b.meta.getMaskFontSize(im, sc);
6764 if (fl != null)
6765 an.fontSize = fl.value().intValue();
6766 ome.xml.model.enums.FontFamily ff = b.meta.getMaskFontFamily(im, sc);
6767 if (ff != null)
6768 an.family = ff.name();
6769 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color col = b.meta.getMaskStrokeColor(im, sc);
6770 if (col != null)
6771 an.strokeColor = Color.FromArgb(col.getAlpha(), col.getRed(), col.getGreen(), col.getBlue());
6772 ome.units.quantity.Length fw = b.meta.getMaskStrokeWidth(im, sc);
6773 if (fw != null)
6774 an.strokeWidth = (float)fw.value().floatValue();
6775 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color colf = b.meta.getMaskFillColor(im, sc);
6776 if (colf != null)
6777 an.fillColor = Color.FromArgb(colf.getAlpha(), colf.getRed(), colf.getGreen(), colf.getBlue());
6778 }
6779 b.Annotations.Add(an);
6780 }
6781 }
6782
6783 List<string> serFiles = new List<string>();
6784 serFiles.AddRange(reader.getSeriesUsedFiles());
6785
6786 b.Buffers = new List<Bitmap>();
6787 if(b.Type == ImageType.pyramidal)
6788 try
6789 {
6790 string st = OpenSlideImage.DetectVendor(file);
6791 if (st != null && !file.EndsWith("ome.tif") && useOpenSlide)
6792 {
6793 b.openSlideImage = OpenSlideImage.Open(file);
6794 b.openslideBase = (OpenSlideBase)OpenSlideGTK.SlideSourceBase.Create(file);
6795 }
6796 else
6797 {
6798 b.slideBase = new SlideBase(b,SlideImage.Open(b));
6799 }
6800 }
6801 catch (Exception e)
6802 {
6803 Console.WriteLine(e.Message.ToString());
6804 b.slideBase = new SlideBase(b, SlideImage.Open(b));
6805 }
6806
6807 // read the image data bytes
6808 int pages = reader.getImageCount();
6809 bool inter = reader.isInterleaved();
6810 int z = 0;
6811 int c = 0;
6812 int t = 0;
6813 pr.Status = "Reading Image Data";
6814 if (!tile)
6815 {
6816 try
6817 {
6818 for (int p = 0; p < pages; p++)
6819 {
6820 Bitmap bf;
6821 pr.ProgressValue = (float)p / (float)pages;
6822 byte[] bytes = reader.openBytes(p);
6823 bf = new Bitmap(file, SizeX, SizeY, PixelFormat, bytes, new ZCT(z, c, t), p, null, b.littleEndian, inter);
6824 b.Buffers.Add(bf);
6825 }
6826 }
6827 catch (Exception)
6828 {
6829 //If we failed to read an entire plane it is likely too large so we open as pyramidal.
6830 b.Type = ImageType.pyramidal;
6831 try
6832 {
6833 string st = OpenSlideImage.DetectVendor(file);
6834 if (st != null && !file.EndsWith("ome.tif") && useOpenSlide)
6835 {
6836 b.openSlideImage = OpenSlideImage.Open(file);
6837 b.openslideBase = (OpenSlideBase)OpenSlideGTK.SlideSourceBase.Create(file);
6838 }
6839 else
6840 {
6841 b.slideBase = new SlideBase(b, SlideImage.Open(b));
6842 }
6843 }
6844 catch (Exception e)
6845 {
6846 Console.WriteLine(e.Message.ToString());
6847 b.slideBase = new SlideBase(b, SlideImage.Open(b));
6848 }
6849 b.imRead = reader;
6850 for (int p = 0; p < pages; p++)
6851 {
6852 b.Buffers.Add(GetTile(b, p, serie, tilex, tiley, tileSizeX, tileSizeY));
6853 Statistics.CalcStatistics(b.Buffers.Last());
6854 }
6855 }
6856
6857 }
6858 else
6859 {
6860 b.imRead = reader;
6861 for (int p = 0; p < pages; p++)
6862 {
6863 b.Buffers.Add(GetTile(b, p, serie, tilex, tiley, tileSizeX, tileSizeY));
6864 Statistics.CalcStatistics(b.Buffers.Last());
6865 }
6866 }
6867 int pls;
6868 try
6869 {
6870 pls = b.meta.getPlaneCount(serie);
6871 }
6872 catch (Exception)
6873 {
6874 pls = 0;
6875 }
6876 pr.Status = "Reading Plane Data";
6877 if (pls == b.Buffers.Count)
6878 for (int bi = 0; bi < b.Buffers.Count; bi++)
6879 {
6880 Plane pl = new Plane();
6881 pl.Coordinate = new ZCT();
6882 double px = 0; double py = 0; double pz = 0;
6883 if (b.meta.getPlanePositionX(serie, bi) != null)
6884 px = b.meta.getPlanePositionX(serie, bi).value().doubleValue();
6885 if (b.meta.getPlanePositionY(serie, bi) != null)
6886 py = b.meta.getPlanePositionY(serie, bi).value().doubleValue();
6887 if (b.meta.getPlanePositionZ(serie, bi) != null)
6888 pz = b.meta.getPlanePositionZ(serie, bi).value().doubleValue();
6889 pl.Location = new AForge.Point3D(px, py, pz);
6890 int cc = 0; int zc = 0; int tc = 0;
6891 if (b.meta.getPlaneTheC(serie, bi) != null)
6892 cc = b.meta.getPlaneTheC(serie, bi).getNumberValue().intValue();
6893 if (b.meta.getPlaneTheZ(serie, bi) != null)
6894 zc = b.meta.getPlaneTheZ(serie, bi).getNumberValue().intValue();
6895 if (b.meta.getPlaneTheT(serie, bi) != null)
6896 tc = b.meta.getPlaneTheT(serie, bi).getNumberValue().intValue();
6897 pl.Coordinate = new ZCT(zc, cc, tc);
6898 if (b.meta.getPlaneDeltaT(serie, bi) != null)
6899 pl.Delta = b.meta.getPlaneDeltaT(serie, bi).value().doubleValue();
6900 if (b.meta.getPlaneExposureTime(serie, bi) != null)
6901 pl.Exposure = b.meta.getPlaneExposureTime(serie, bi).value().doubleValue();
6902 b.Buffers[bi].Plane = pl;
6903 }
6904
6905 b.UpdateCoords(b.SizeZ, b.SizeC, b.SizeT, order);
6906 //We wait for histogram image statistics calculation
6907 do
6908 {
6909 Thread.Sleep(50);
6910 } while (b.Buffers[b.Buffers.Count - 1].Stats == null);
6911 b.SetLabelMacroResolutions();
6912 Statistics.ClearCalcBuffer();
6913 AutoThreshold(b, true);
6914 if (b.bitsPerPixel > 8)
6915 b.StackThreshold(true);
6916 else
6917 b.StackThreshold(false);
6918 if (!tile)
6919 {
6920 //We use a try block to close the reader as sometimes this will cause an error.
6921 bool stop = false;
6922 do
6923 {
6924 try
6925 {
6926 reader.close();
6927 stop = true;
6928 }
6929 catch (Exception e)
6930 {
6931 Console.WriteLine(e.Message);
6932 }
6933 } while (!stop);
6934 }
6935 if (addToImages)
6936 Images.AddImage(b, tab);
6937 b.Loading = false;
6938 // update ui on main UI thread
6939 Application.Invoke(delegate
6940 {
6941 pr.Hide();
6942 });
6943 Console.WriteLine("Opening complete " + file);
6944 return b;
6945 }
6946 public ImageReader imRead;
6947 public Tiff tifRead;
6948 public OpenSlideImage openSlideImage;
6949 static Bitmap bm;
6962 public static Bitmap GetTile(BioImage b, ZCT coord, int serie, int tilex, int tiley, int tileSizeX, int tileSizeY)
6963 {
6964 if ((b.file.EndsWith("ome.tif") && vips) || (b.file.EndsWith(".tif") && vips))
6965 {
6966 //We can get a tile faster with libvips rather than bioformats.
6967 return ExtractRegionFromTiledTiff(b, tilex, tiley, tileSizeX, tileSizeY, serie);
6968 }
6969 //We check if we can open this with OpenSlide as this is faster than Bioformats with IKVM.
6970 if (b.openSlideImage != null && !b.file.EndsWith("ome.tif"))
6971 {
6972 return new Bitmap(tileSizeX, tileSizeY, AForge.PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb, b.openSlideImage.ReadRegion(serie, tilex, tiley, tileSizeX, tileSizeY), new ZCT(), "");
6973 }
6974
6975 string curfile = b.imRead.getCurrentFile();
6976 if (curfile == null)
6977 {
6978 b.meta = (IMetadata)((OMEXMLService)factory.getInstance(typeof(OMEXMLService))).createOMEXMLMetadata();
6979 b.imRead.close();
6980 b.imRead.setMetadataStore(b.meta);
6981 Console.WriteLine(b.file);
6982 b.imRead.setId(b.file);
6983 }
6984 else
6985 {
6986 string fi = b.file.Replace("\\", "/");
6987 string cf = curfile.Replace("\\", "/");
6988 if (cf != fi)
6989 {
6990 b.imRead.close();
6991 b.meta = (IMetadata)((OMEXMLService)factory.getInstance(typeof(OMEXMLService))).createOMEXMLMetadata();
6992 b.imRead.setMetadataStore(b.meta);
6993 b.imRead.setId(b.file);
6994 }
6995 }
6996 if (b.imRead.getSeries() != serie)
6997 b.imRead.setSeries(serie);
6998 int SizeX = b.imRead.getSizeX();
6999 int SizeY = b.imRead.getSizeY();
7000 bool flat = b.imRead.hasFlattenedResolutions();
7001 int p = b.Coords[coord.Z, coord.C, coord.T];
7002 bool littleEndian = b.imRead.isLittleEndian();
7003 PixelFormat PixelFormat = b.Resolutions[serie].PixelFormat;
7004 bool interleaved = b.imRead.isInterleaved();
7005 if (tilex < 0)
7006 tilex = 0;
7007 if (tiley < 0)
7008 tiley = 0;
7009 if (tilex >= SizeX)
7010 tilex = SizeX;
7011 if (tiley >= SizeY)
7012 tiley = SizeY;
7013 int sx = tileSizeX;
7014 if (tilex + tileSizeX > SizeX)
7015 sx -= (tilex + tileSizeX) - (SizeX);
7016 int sy = tileSizeY;
7017 if (tiley + tileSizeY > SizeY)
7018 sy -= (tiley + tileSizeY) - (SizeY);
7019 //For some reason calling openBytes with 1x1px area causes an exception.
7020 if (sx <= 1)
7021 return null;
7022 if (sy <= 1)
7023 return null;
7024 try
7025 {
7026 byte[] bytesr = b.imRead.openBytes(b.Coords[coord.Z, coord.C, coord.T], tilex, tiley, sx, sy);
7027 return new Bitmap(b.file, sx, sy, PixelFormat, bytesr, coord, p, null, littleEndian, interleaved);
7028 }
7029 catch (Exception e)
7030 {
7031 Console.WriteLine(e.Message);
7032 return null;
7033 }
7034 }
7035 public static Bitmap GetTile(BioImage b, int index, int serie, int tilex, int tiley, int tileSizeX, int tileSizeY)
7036 {
7037 if ((b.file.EndsWith("ome.tif") && vips) || (b.file.EndsWith(".tif") && vips))
7038 {
7039 //We can get a tile faster with libvips rather than bioformats.
7040 return ExtractRegionFromTiledTiff(b, tilex, tiley, tileSizeX, tileSizeY, serie);
7041 }
7042 //We check if we can open this with OpenSlide as this is faster than Bioformats with IKVM.
7043 if (b.openSlideImage != null && !b.file.EndsWith("ome.tif"))
7044 {
7045 return new Bitmap(tileSizeX, tileSizeY, AForge.PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb, b.openSlideImage.ReadRegion(serie, tilex, tiley, tileSizeX, tileSizeY), new ZCT(), "");
7046 }
7047
7048 string curfile = b.imRead.getCurrentFile();
7049 if (curfile == null)
7050 {
7051 b.meta = (IMetadata)((OMEXMLService)factory.getInstance(typeof(OMEXMLService))).createOMEXMLMetadata();
7052 b.imRead.close();
7053 b.imRead.setMetadataStore(b.meta);
7054 Console.WriteLine(b.file);
7055 b.imRead.setId(b.file);
7056 }
7057 else
7058 {
7059 string fi = b.file.Replace("\\", "/");
7060 string cf = curfile.Replace("\\", "/");
7061 if (cf != fi)
7062 {
7063 b.imRead.close();
7064 b.meta = (IMetadata)((OMEXMLService)factory.getInstance(typeof(OMEXMLService))).createOMEXMLMetadata();
7065 b.imRead.setMetadataStore(b.meta);
7066 b.imRead.setId(b.file);
7067 }
7068 }
7069 if (b.imRead.getSeries() != serie)
7070 b.imRead.setSeries(serie);
7071 int SizeX = b.imRead.getSizeX();
7072 int SizeY = b.imRead.getSizeY();
7073 bool flat = b.imRead.hasFlattenedResolutions();
7074 bool littleEndian = b.imRead.isLittleEndian();
7075 bool interleaved = b.imRead.isInterleaved();
7076 PixelFormat PixelFormat = b.Resolutions[serie].PixelFormat;
7077 if (tilex < 0)
7078 tilex = 0;
7079 if (tiley < 0)
7080 tiley = 0;
7081 if (tilex >= SizeX)
7082 tilex = SizeX;
7083 if (tiley >= SizeY)
7084 tiley = SizeY;
7085 int sx = tileSizeX;
7086 if (tilex + tileSizeX > SizeX)
7087 sx -= (tilex + tileSizeX) - (SizeX);
7088 int sy = tileSizeY;
7089 if (tiley + tileSizeY > SizeY)
7090 sy -= (tiley + tileSizeY) - (SizeY);
7091 //For some reason calling openBytes with 1x1px area causes an exception.
7092 if (sx <= 1)
7093 return null;
7094 if (sy <= 1)
7095 return null;
7096 try
7097 {
7098 byte[] bytesr = b.imRead.openBytes(index, tilex, tiley, sx, sy);
7099 return new Bitmap(b.file, sx, sy, PixelFormat, bytesr, new ZCT(), index, null, littleEndian, interleaved);
7100 }
7101 catch (Exception e)
7102 {
7103 Console.WriteLine(e.Message);
7104 return null;
7105 }
7106 }
7111 public void StackThreshold(bool bit16)
7112 {
7113 if (bit16)
7114 {
7115 for (int ch = 0; ch < Channels.Count; ch++)
7116 {
7117 for (int i = 0; i < Channels[ch].range.Length; i++)
7118 {
7119 Channels[ch].range[i].Min = (int)Channels[ch].stats[i].StackMin;
7120 Channels[ch].range[i].Max = (int)Channels[ch].stats[i].StackMax;
7121 }
7122 Channels[ch].BitsPerPixel = 16;
7123 }
7124 bitsPerPixel = 16;
7125 }
7126 else
7127 {
7128 for (int ch = 0; ch < Channels.Count; ch++)
7129 {
7130 for (int i = 0; i < Channels[ch].range.Length; i++)
7131 {
7132 Channels[ch].range[i].Min = (int)Channels[ch].stats[i].StackMin;
7133 Channels[ch].range[i].Max = (int)Channels[ch].stats[i].StackMax;
7134 }
7135 Channels[ch].BitsPerPixel = 8;
7136 }
7137 bitsPerPixel = 8;
7138 }
7139 }
7150 public static int GetBitsPerPixel(int bt)
7151 {
7152 if (bt <= 255)
7153 return 8;
7154 if (bt <= 512)
7155 return 9;
7156 else if (bt <= 1023)
7157 return 10;
7158 else if (bt <= 2047)
7159 return 11;
7160 else if (bt <= 4095)
7161 return 12;
7162 else if (bt <= 8191)
7163 return 13;
7164 else if (bt <= 16383)
7165 return 14;
7166 else if (bt <= 32767)
7167 return 15;
7168 else
7169 return 16;
7170 }
7176 public static int GetBitMaxValue(int bt)
7177 {
7178 if (bt == 8)
7179 return 255;
7180 if (bt == 9)
7181 return 512;
7182 else if (bt == 10)
7183 return 1023;
7184 else if (bt == 11)
7185 return 2047;
7186 else if (bt == 12)
7187 return 4095;
7188 else if (bt == 13)
7189 return 8191;
7190 else if (bt == 14)
7191 return 16383;
7192 else if (bt == 15)
7193 return 32767;
7194 else
7195 return 65535;
7196 }
7206 public static PixelFormat GetPixelFormat(int rgbChannelCount, int bitsPerPixel)
7207 {
7208 if (bitsPerPixel == 8)
7209 {
7210 if (rgbChannelCount == 1)
7211 return PixelFormat.Format8bppIndexed;
7212 else if (rgbChannelCount == 3)
7213 return PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb;
7214 else if (rgbChannelCount == 4)
7215 return PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb;
7216 }
7217 else
7218 {
7219 if (rgbChannelCount == 1)
7220 return PixelFormat.Format16bppGrayScale;
7221 if (rgbChannelCount == 3)
7222 return PixelFormat.Format48bppRgb;
7223 }
7224 throw new NotSupportedException("Not supported pixel format.");
7225 }
7236 public static PixelFormat GetPixelFormat(int rgbChannelCount, ome.xml.model.enums.PixelType px)
7237 {
7238 if (rgbChannelCount == 1)
7239 {
7240 if (px == ome.xml.model.enums.PixelType.INT8 || px == ome.xml.model.enums.PixelType.UINT8)
7241 return PixelFormat.Format8bppIndexed;
7242 else if (px == ome.xml.model.enums.PixelType.INT16 || px == ome.xml.model.enums.PixelType.UINT16)
7243 return PixelFormat.Format16bppGrayScale;
7244 }
7245 else if (rgbChannelCount == 3)
7246 {
7247 if (px == ome.xml.model.enums.PixelType.INT8 || px == ome.xml.model.enums.PixelType.UINT8)
7248 return PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb;
7249 else if (px == ome.xml.model.enums.PixelType.INT16 || px == ome.xml.model.enums.PixelType.UINT16)
7250 return PixelFormat.Format48bppRgb;
7251 }
7252 else
7253 return PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb;
7254 throw new InvalidDataException("RGBChannels Count of " + rgbChannelCount + " not supported.");
7255 }
7263 public static BioImage[] OpenOMESeries(string file, bool tab, bool addToImages)
7264 {
7265 //We wait incase OME has not initialized yet.
7266 if (!initialized)
7267 do
7268 {
7269 Thread.Sleep(100);
7270 //Application.DoEvents();
7271 } while (!Initialized);
7272 var meta = (IMetadata)((OMEXMLService)new ServiceFactory().getInstance(typeof(OMEXMLService))).createOMEXMLMetadata();
7273 reader.setMetadataStore((MetadataStore)meta);
7274 file = file.Replace("\\", "/");
7275 try
7276 {
7277 if (reader.getCurrentFile() != file)
7278 {
7279 status = "Opening OME Image.";
7280 file = file.Replace("\\", "/");
7281 reader.setId(file);
7282 }
7283 }
7284 catch (Exception e)
7285 {
7286 Scripting.LogLine(e.Message);
7287 return null;
7288 }
7289 int count = reader.getSeriesCount();
7290 BioImage[] bs = new BioImage[count];
7291 for (int i = 0; i < count; i++)
7292 {
7293 bs[i] = OpenOME(file, i, tab, addToImages, false, 0, 0, 0, 0);
7294 if (bs[i] == null)
7295 return null;
7296 }
7297 return bs;
7298 }
7302 public static async Task OpenAsync(string file, bool OME, bool newtab, bool images, int series)
7303 {
7304 openfile = file;
7305 omes = OME;
7306 tab = newtab;
7307 add = images;
7308 serie = series;
7309 await Task.Run(OpenThread);
7310 }
7314 public static async Task OpenAsync(string[] files, bool OME, bool tab, bool images)
7315 {
7316 foreach (string file in files)
7317 {
7318 await OpenAsync(file, OME, tab, images,0);
7319 }
7320 }
7324 public static void Open(string file)
7325 {
7326 OpenFile(file);
7327 }
7331 public static void Open(string[] files)
7332 {
7333 foreach (string file in files)
7334 {
7335 Open(file);
7336 }
7337 }
7343 public static BioImage ImagesToStack(string[] files, bool tab)
7344 {
7345 BioImage[] bs = new BioImage[files.Length];
7346 int z = 0;
7347 int c = 0;
7348 int t = 0;
7349 for (int i = 0; i < files.Length; i++)
7350 {
7351 string str = Path.GetFileNameWithoutExtension(files[i]);
7352 str = str.Replace(".ome", "");
7353 string[] st = str.Split('_');
7354 if (st.Length > 3)
7355 {
7356 z = int.Parse(st[1].Replace("Z", ""));
7357 c = int.Parse(st[2].Replace("C", ""));
7358 t = int.Parse(st[3].Replace("T", ""));
7359 }
7360 if (i == 0)
7361 bs[0] = OpenOME(files[i], tab);
7362 else
7363 {
7364 bs[i] = OpenFile(files[i], 0, tab, false);
7365 }
7366 }
7367 BioImage b = BioImage.CopyInfo(bs[0], true, true);
7368 for (int i = 0; i < files.Length; i++)
7369 {
7370 for (int bc = 0; bc < bs[i].Buffers.Count; bc++)
7371 {
7372 b.Buffers.Add(bs[i].Buffers[bc]);
7373 }
7374 }
7375 b.UpdateCoords(z + 1, c + 1, t + 1);
7376 b.Volume = new VolumeD(bs[0].Volume.Location, new Point3D(bs[0].SizeX * bs[0].PhysicalSizeX, bs[0].SizeY * bs[0].PhysicalSizeY, (z + 1) * bs[0].PhysicalSizeZ));
7377 return b;
7378 }
7382 public static void Update(BioImage b)
7383 {
7384 b = OpenFile(b.file);
7385 }
7389 public async void UpdateBuffersPyramidal()
7390 {
7391 for (int i = 0; i < Buffers.Count; i++)
7392 {
7393 Buffers[i].Dispose();
7394 }
7395 Buffers.Clear();
7396 for (int i = 0; i < imagesPerSeries; i++)
7397 {
7398 if (openSlideImage != null)
7399 {
7400 byte[] bts = openslideBase.GetSlice(new OpenSlideGTK.SliceInfo(PyramidalOrigin.X, PyramidalOrigin.Y, PyramidalSize.Width, PyramidalSize.Height, resolution));
7401 Buffers.Add(new Bitmap((int)Math.Round(OpenSlideBase.destExtent.Width), (int)Math.Round(OpenSlideBase.destExtent.Height), PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb, bts, new ZCT(), ""));
7402 }
7403 else
7404 {
7405 start:
7406 byte[] bts = await slideBase.GetSlice(new Bio.SliceInfo(PyramidalOrigin.X, PyramidalOrigin.Y, PyramidalSize.Width, PyramidalSize.Height, resolution,App.viewer.GetCoordinate()));
7407 if(bts == null)
7408 {
7409 if(PyramidalOrigin.X == 0 && PyramidalOrigin.Y == 0)
7410 {
7411 Resolution = 1;
7412 }
7413 pyramidalOrigin = new PointD(0, 0);
7414 goto start;
7415 }
7416 Buffers.Add(new Bitmap((int)Math.Round(SlideBase.destExtent.Width), (int)Math.Round(SlideBase.destExtent.Height), PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb, bts, new ZCT(), ""));
7417 }
7418 }
7419 BioImage.AutoThreshold(this, true);
7420 if (bitsPerPixel > 8)
7421 StackThreshold(true);
7422 else
7423 StackThreshold(false);
7424 }
7426 public void Update()
7427 {
7428 Update(this);
7429 }
7430
7431 static string openfile;
7432 static bool omes, tab, add;
7433 static int serie;
7434 static void OpenThread()
7435 {
7436 if(omes)
7437 OpenOME(openfile,serie,tab,add,false,0,0,0,0);
7438 else
7439 OpenFile(openfile, serie, tab, add);
7440 }
7441 static string savefile, saveid;
7442 static bool some;
7443 static int sserie;
7444 static void SaveThread()
7445 {
7446 if (some)
7447 SaveOME(savefile, saveid);
7448 else
7449 SaveFile(savefile, saveid);
7450 }
7463 public static async Task SaveAsync(string file, string id, int serie, bool ome)
7464 {
7465 savefile = file;
7466 saveid = id;
7467 some = ome;
7468 await Task.Run(SaveThread);
7469 }
7470
7471 static List<string> sts = new List<string>();
7472 static void SaveSeriesThread()
7473 {
7474 if (omes)
7475 {
7476 BioImage[] bms = new BioImage[sts.Count];
7477 int i = 0;
7478 foreach (string st in sts)
7479 {
7480 bms[i] = Images.GetImage(st);
7481 }
7482 SaveOMESeries(bms, savefile, Planes);
7483 }
7484 else
7485 SaveSeries(sts.ToArray(), savefile);
7486 }
7496 public static async Task SaveSeriesAsync(BioImage[] imgs, string file, bool ome)
7497 {
7498 sts.Clear();
7499 foreach (BioImage item in imgs)
7500 {
7501 sts.Add(item.ID);
7502 }
7503 savefile = file;
7504 some = ome;
7505 await Task.Run(SaveSeriesThread);
7506 }
7507 static Enums.ForeignTiffCompression comp;
7508 static int compLev= 0;
7509 static BioImage[] bms;
7510 static void SavePyramidalThread()
7511 {
7512 SaveOMEPyramidal(bms, savefile, comp, compLev);
7513 }
7527 public static async Task SavePyramidalAsync(BioImage[] imgs, string file, Enums.ForeignTiffCompression com, int compLevel)
7528 {
7529 bms = imgs;
7530 savefile = file;
7531 comp = com;
7532 compLev = compLevel;
7533 await Task.Run(SavePyramidalThread);
7534 }
7535 private static List<string> openOMEfile = new List<string>();
7537 private static void OpenOME()
7538 {
7539 foreach (string f in openOMEfile)
7540 {
7541 OpenOME(f, true);
7542 }
7543 openOMEfile.Clear();
7544 }
7545 private static string saveOMEfile;
7546 private static string saveOMEID;
7547 static NetVips.Image netim;
7556 public static bool VipsSupport(string file)
7557 {
7558 //Currently GTKSharp and LibVips causes an error so on windows no netvips support.
7559 if (OperatingSystem.IsWindows())
7560 return false;
7561 try
7562 {
7563 netim = NetVips.Image.Tiffload(file);
7564 Settings.AddSettings("VipsSupport", "true");
7565 }
7566 catch (Exception e)
7567 {
7568 Console.WriteLine(e.ToString());
7569 return false;
7570 }
7571 netim.Close();
7572 netim.Dispose();
7573 return true;
7574 }
7575 private static Stopwatch st = new Stopwatch();
7576 private static ServiceFactory factory;
7577 private static OMEXMLService service;
7578 private static ImageReader reader;
7579 private static ImageWriter writer;
7580 private loci.formats.meta.IMetadata meta;
7581
7582 //We use UNIX type line endings since they are supported by ImageJ & BioGTK.
7583 public const char NewLine = '\n';
7584 public const string columns = "ROIID,ROINAME,TYPE,ID,SHAPEINDEX,TEXT,S,C,Z,T,X,Y,W,H,POINTS,STROKECOLOR,STROKECOLORW,FILLCOLOR,FONTSIZE\n";
7585
7591 public static string OpenXML(string file)
7592 {
7593 if (!file.EndsWith(".tif"))
7594 return null;
7595 Tiff image = Tiff.Open(file, "r");
7596 FieldValue[] f = image.GetField(TiffTag.IMAGEDESCRIPTION);
7597 return f[0].ToString();
7598 }
7605 public static List<ROI> OpenOMEROIs(string file, int series)
7606 {
7607 List<ROI> Annotations = new List<ROI>();
7608 // create OME-XML metadata store
7609 ServiceFactory factory = new ServiceFactory();
7610 OMEXMLService service = (OMEXMLService)factory.getInstance(typeof(OMEXMLService));
7611 loci.formats.ome.OMEXMLMetadata meta = service.createOMEXMLMetadata();
7612 // create format reader
7613 ImageReader imageReader = new ImageReader();
7614 imageReader.setMetadataStore(meta);
7615 // initialize file
7616 file = file.Replace("\\", "/");
7617 imageReader.setId(file);
7618 int imageCount = imageReader.getImageCount();
7619 int seriesCount = imageReader.getSeriesCount();
7620 double physicalSizeX = 0;
7621 double physicalSizeY = 0;
7622 double physicalSizeZ = 0;
7623 double stageSizeX = 0;
7624 double stageSizeY = 0;
7625 double stageSizeZ = 0;
7626 int SizeX = imageReader.getSizeX();
7627 int SizeY = imageReader.getSizeY();
7628 int SizeZ = imageReader.getSizeY();
7629 try
7630 {
7631 bool hasPhysical = false;
7632 if (meta.getPixelsPhysicalSizeX(series) != null)
7633 {
7634 physicalSizeX = meta.getPixelsPhysicalSizeX(series).value().doubleValue();
7635 hasPhysical = true;
7636 }
7637 if (meta.getPixelsPhysicalSizeY(series) != null)
7638 {
7639 physicalSizeY = meta.getPixelsPhysicalSizeY(series).value().doubleValue();
7640 }
7641 if (meta.getPixelsPhysicalSizeZ(series) != null)
7642 {
7643 physicalSizeZ = meta.getPixelsPhysicalSizeZ(series).value().doubleValue();
7644 }
7645 else
7646 {
7647 physicalSizeZ = 1;
7648 }
7649 if (meta.getStageLabelX(series) != null)
7650 stageSizeX = meta.getStageLabelX(series).value().doubleValue();
7651 if (meta.getStageLabelY(series) != null)
7652 stageSizeY = meta.getStageLabelY(series).value().doubleValue();
7653 if (meta.getStageLabelZ(series) != null)
7654 stageSizeZ = meta.getStageLabelZ(series).value().doubleValue();
7655 else
7656 stageSizeZ = 1;
7657 }
7658 catch (Exception e)
7659 {
7660 stageSizeX = 0;
7661 stageSizeY = 0;
7662 stageSizeZ = 1;
7663 }
7664 VolumeD volume = new VolumeD(new Point3D(stageSizeX, stageSizeY, stageSizeZ), new Point3D(physicalSizeX * SizeX, physicalSizeY * SizeY, physicalSizeZ * SizeZ));
7665 int rc = meta.getROICount();
7666 for (int im = 0; im < rc; im++)
7667 {
7668 string roiID = meta.getROIID(im);
7669 string roiName = meta.getROIName(im);
7670 ZCT co = new ZCT(0, 0, 0);
7671 int scount = 1;
7672 try
7673 {
7674 scount = meta.getShapeCount(im);
7675 }
7676 catch (Exception e)
7677 {
7678 Console.WriteLine(e.Message.ToString());
7679 }
7680 for (int sc = 0; sc < scount; sc++)
7681 {
7682 string type = meta.getShapeType(im, sc);
7683 ROI an = new ROI();
7684 an.roiID = roiID;
7685 an.roiName = roiName;
7686 an.shapeIndex = sc;
7687 if (type == "Point")
7688 {
7689 an.type = ROI.Type.Point;
7690 an.id = meta.getPointID(im, sc);
7691 double dx = meta.getPointX(im, sc).doubleValue();
7692 double dy = meta.getPointY(im, sc).doubleValue();
7693 an.AddPoint(ToStageSpace(new PointD(dx, dy), physicalSizeX, physicalSizeY, volume.Location.X, volume.Location.Y));
7694 an.coord = new ZCT();
7695 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nz = meta.getPointTheZ(im, sc);
7696 if (nz != null)
7697 an.coord.Z = nz.getNumberValue().intValue();
7698 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nc = meta.getPointTheC(im, sc);
7699 if (nc != null)
7700 an.coord.C = nc.getNumberValue().intValue();
7701 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nt = meta.getPointTheT(im, sc);
7702 if (nt != null)
7703 an.coord.T = nt.getNumberValue().intValue();
7704 an.Text = meta.getPointText(im, sc);
7705 ome.units.quantity.Length fl = meta.getPointFontSize(im, sc);
7706 if (fl != null)
7707 an.fontSize = fl.value().intValue();
7708 an.family = meta.getPointFontFamily(im, sc).name();
7709 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color col = meta.getPointStrokeColor(im, sc);
7710 if (col != null)
7711 an.strokeColor = Color.FromArgb(col.getAlpha(), col.getRed(), col.getGreen(), col.getBlue());
7712 ome.units.quantity.Length fw = meta.getPointStrokeWidth(im, sc);
7713 if (fw != null)
7714 an.strokeWidth = (float)fw.value().floatValue();
7715 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color colf = meta.getPointStrokeColor(im, sc);
7716 if (colf != null)
7717 an.fillColor = Color.FromArgb(colf.getAlpha(), colf.getRed(), colf.getGreen(), colf.getBlue());
7718 }
7719 else
7720 if (type == "Line")
7721 {
7722 an.type = ROI.Type.Line;
7723 an.id = meta.getLineID(im, sc);
7724 double px1 = meta.getLineX1(im, sc).doubleValue();
7725 double py1 = meta.getLineY1(im, sc).doubleValue();
7726 double px2 = meta.getLineX2(im, sc).doubleValue();
7727 double py2 = meta.getLineY2(im, sc).doubleValue();
7728 an.AddPoint(ToStageSpace(new PointD(px1, py1), physicalSizeX, physicalSizeY, volume.Location.X, volume.Location.Y));
7729 an.AddPoint(ToStageSpace(new PointD(px2, py2), physicalSizeX, physicalSizeY, volume.Location.X, volume.Location.Y));
7730 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nz = meta.getLineTheZ(im, sc);
7731 if (nz != null)
7732 co.Z = nz.getNumberValue().intValue();
7733 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nc = meta.getLineTheC(im, sc);
7734 if (nc != null)
7735 co.C = nc.getNumberValue().intValue();
7736 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nt = meta.getLineTheT(im, sc);
7737 if (nt != null)
7738 co.T = nt.getNumberValue().intValue();
7739 an.coord = co;
7740 an.Text = meta.getLineText(im, sc);
7741 ome.units.quantity.Length fl = meta.getLineFontSize(im, sc);
7742 if (fl != null)
7743 an.fontSize = fl.value().intValue();
7744 an.family = meta.getPointFontFamily(im, sc).name();
7745 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color col = meta.getLineStrokeColor(im, sc);
7746 if (col != null)
7747 an.strokeColor = Color.FromArgb(col.getAlpha(), col.getRed(), col.getGreen(), col.getBlue());
7748 ome.units.quantity.Length fw = meta.getLineStrokeWidth(im, sc);
7749 if (fw != null)
7750 an.strokeWidth = (float)fw.value().floatValue();
7751 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color colf = meta.getLineFillColor(im, sc);
7752 if (colf != null)
7753 an.fillColor = Color.FromArgb(colf.getAlpha(), colf.getRed(), colf.getGreen(), colf.getBlue());
7754 }
7755 else
7756 if (type == "Rectangle")
7757 {
7758 an.type = ROI.Type.Rectangle;
7759 an.id = meta.getRectangleID(im, sc);
7760 double px = meta.getRectangleX(im, sc).doubleValue();
7761 double py = meta.getRectangleY(im, sc).doubleValue();
7762 double pw = meta.getRectangleWidth(im, sc).doubleValue();
7763 double ph = meta.getRectangleHeight(im, sc).doubleValue();
7764 an.Rect = ToStageSpace(new RectangleD(px, py, pw, ph), physicalSizeX, physicalSizeY, volume.Location.X, volume.Location.Y);
7765 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nz = meta.getRectangleTheZ(im, sc);
7766 if (nz != null)
7767 co.Z = nz.getNumberValue().intValue();
7768 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nc = meta.getRectangleTheC(im, sc);
7769 if (nc != null)
7770 co.C = nc.getNumberValue().intValue();
7771 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nt = meta.getRectangleTheT(im, sc);
7772 if (nt != null)
7773 co.T = nt.getNumberValue().intValue();
7774 an.coord = co;
7775
7776 an.Text = meta.getRectangleText(im, sc);
7777 ome.units.quantity.Length fl = meta.getRectangleFontSize(im, sc);
7778 if (fl != null)
7779 an.fontSize = fl.value().intValue();
7780 an.family = meta.getPointFontFamily(im, sc).name();
7781 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color col = meta.getRectangleStrokeColor(im, sc);
7782 if (col != null)
7783 an.strokeColor = Color.FromArgb(col.getAlpha(), col.getRed(), col.getGreen(), col.getBlue());
7784 ome.units.quantity.Length fw = meta.getRectangleStrokeWidth(im, sc);
7785 if (fw != null)
7786 an.strokeWidth = (float)fw.value().floatValue();
7787 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color colf = meta.getRectangleFillColor(im, sc);
7788 if (colf != null)
7789 an.fillColor = Color.FromArgb(colf.getAlpha(), colf.getRed(), colf.getGreen(), colf.getBlue());
7790 ome.xml.model.enums.FillRule fr = meta.getRectangleFillRule(im, sc);
7791 }
7792 else
7793 if (type == "Ellipse")
7794 {
7795 an.type = ROI.Type.Ellipse;
7796 an.id = meta.getEllipseID(im, sc);
7797 double px = meta.getEllipseX(im, sc).doubleValue();
7798 double py = meta.getEllipseY(im, sc).doubleValue();
7799 double ew = meta.getEllipseRadiusX(im, sc).doubleValue();
7800 double eh = meta.getEllipseRadiusY(im, sc).doubleValue();
7801 //We convert the ellipse radius to Rectangle
7802 double w = ew * 2;
7803 double h = eh * 2;
7804 double x = px - ew;
7805 double y = py - eh;
7806 an.Rect = ToStageSpace(new RectangleD(px, py, w, h), physicalSizeX, physicalSizeY, volume.Location.X, volume.Location.Y);
7807 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nz = meta.getEllipseTheZ(im, sc);
7808 if (nz != null)
7809 co.Z = nz.getNumberValue().intValue();
7810 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nc = meta.getEllipseTheC(im, sc);
7811 if (nc != null)
7812 co.C = nc.getNumberValue().intValue();
7813 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nt = meta.getEllipseTheT(im, sc);
7814 if (nt != null)
7815 co.T = nt.getNumberValue().intValue();
7816 an.coord = co;
7817 an.Text = meta.getEllipseText(im, sc);
7818 ome.units.quantity.Length fl = meta.getEllipseFontSize(im, sc);
7819 if (fl != null)
7820 an.fontSize = fl.value().intValue();
7821 an.family = meta.getPointFontFamily(im, sc).name();
7822 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color col = meta.getEllipseStrokeColor(im, sc);
7823 if (col != null)
7824 an.strokeColor = Color.FromArgb(col.getAlpha(), col.getRed(), col.getGreen(), col.getBlue());
7825 ome.units.quantity.Length fw = meta.getEllipseStrokeWidth(im, sc);
7826 if (fw != null)
7827 an.strokeWidth = (float)fw.value().floatValue();
7828 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color colf = meta.getEllipseFillColor(im, sc);
7829 if (colf != null)
7830 an.fillColor = Color.FromArgb(colf.getAlpha(), colf.getRed(), colf.getGreen(), colf.getBlue());
7831 }
7832 else
7833 if (type == "Polygon")
7834 {
7835 an.type = ROI.Type.Polygon;
7836 an.id = meta.getPolygonID(im, sc);
7837 an.closed = true;
7838 string pxs = meta.getPolygonPoints(im, sc);
7839 PointD[] pts = an.stringToPoints(pxs);
7840 pts = ToStageSpace(pts, physicalSizeX, physicalSizeY, volume.Location.X, volume.Location.Y);
7841 if (pts.Length > 100)
7842 {
7843 an.type = ROI.Type.Freeform;
7844 }
7845 an.AddPoints(pts);
7846 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nz = meta.getPolygonTheZ(im, sc);
7847 if (nz != null)
7848 co.Z = nz.getNumberValue().intValue();
7849 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nc = meta.getPolygonTheC(im, sc);
7850 if (nc != null)
7851 co.C = nc.getNumberValue().intValue();
7852 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nt = meta.getPolygonTheT(im, sc);
7853 if (nt != null)
7854 co.T = nt.getNumberValue().intValue();
7855 an.coord = co;
7856 an.Text = meta.getPolygonText(im, sc);
7857 ome.units.quantity.Length fl = meta.getPolygonFontSize(im, sc);
7858 if (fl != null)
7859 an.fontSize = fl.value().intValue();
7860 an.family = meta.getPointFontFamily(im, sc).name();
7861 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color col = meta.getPolygonStrokeColor(im, sc);
7862 if (col != null)
7863 an.strokeColor = Color.FromArgb(col.getAlpha(), col.getRed(), col.getGreen(), col.getBlue());
7864 ome.units.quantity.Length fw = meta.getPolygonStrokeWidth(im, sc);
7865 if (fw != null)
7866 an.strokeWidth = (float)fw.value().floatValue();
7867 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color colf = meta.getPolygonFillColor(im, sc);
7868 if (colf != null)
7869 an.fillColor = Color.FromArgb(colf.getAlpha(), colf.getRed(), colf.getGreen(), colf.getBlue());
7870 }
7871 else
7872 if (type == "Polyline")
7873 {
7874 an.type = ROI.Type.Polyline;
7875 an.id = meta.getPolylineID(im, sc);
7876 string pxs = meta.getPolylinePoints(im, sc);
7877 PointD[] pts = an.stringToPoints(pxs);
7878 for (int pi = 0; pi < pts.Length; pi++)
7879 {
7880 pts[pi] = ToStageSpace(pts[pi], physicalSizeX, physicalSizeY, volume.Location.X, volume.Location.Y);
7881 }
7882 an.AddPoints(an.stringToPoints(pxs));
7883 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nz = meta.getPolylineTheZ(im, sc);
7884 if (nz != null)
7885 co.Z = nz.getNumberValue().intValue();
7886 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nc = meta.getPolylineTheC(im, sc);
7887 if (nc != null)
7888 co.C = nc.getNumberValue().intValue();
7889 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nt = meta.getPolylineTheT(im, sc);
7890 if (nt != null)
7891 co.T = nt.getNumberValue().intValue();
7892 an.coord = co;
7893 an.Text = meta.getPolylineText(im, sc);
7894 ome.units.quantity.Length fl = meta.getPolylineFontSize(im, sc);
7895 if (fl != null)
7896 an.fontSize = fl.value().intValue();
7897 an.family = meta.getPointFontFamily(im, sc).name();
7898 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color col = meta.getPolylineStrokeColor(im, sc);
7899 if (col != null)
7900 an.strokeColor = Color.FromArgb(col.getAlpha(), col.getRed(), col.getGreen(), col.getBlue());
7901 ome.units.quantity.Length fw = meta.getPolylineStrokeWidth(im, sc);
7902 if (fw != null)
7903 an.strokeWidth = (float)fw.value().floatValue();
7904 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color colf = meta.getPolylineFillColor(im, sc);
7905 if (colf != null)
7906 an.fillColor = Color.FromArgb(colf.getAlpha(), colf.getRed(), colf.getGreen(), colf.getBlue());
7907 }
7908 else
7909 if (type == "Label")
7910 {
7911 an.type = ROI.Type.Label;
7912 an.id = meta.getLabelID(im, sc);
7913
7914 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nz = meta.getLabelTheZ(im, sc);
7915 if (nz != null)
7916 co.Z = nz.getNumberValue().intValue();
7917 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nc = meta.getLabelTheC(im, sc);
7918 if (nc != null)
7919 co.C = nc.getNumberValue().intValue();
7920 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nt = meta.getLabelTheT(im, sc);
7921 if (nt != null)
7922 co.T = nt.getNumberValue().intValue();
7923 an.coord = co;
7924
7925 ome.units.quantity.Length fl = meta.getLabelFontSize(im, sc);
7926 if (fl != null)
7927 an.fontSize = fl.value().intValue();
7928 an.family = meta.getPointFontFamily(im, sc).name();
7929 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color col = meta.getLabelStrokeColor(im, sc);
7930 if (col != null)
7931 an.strokeColor = Color.FromArgb(col.getAlpha(), col.getRed(), col.getGreen(), col.getBlue());
7932 ome.units.quantity.Length fw = meta.getLabelStrokeWidth(im, sc);
7933 if (fw != null)
7934 an.strokeWidth = (float)fw.value().floatValue();
7935 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color colf = meta.getLabelFillColor(im, sc);
7936 if (colf != null)
7937 an.fillColor = Color.FromArgb(colf.getAlpha(), colf.getRed(), colf.getGreen(), colf.getBlue());
7938 PointD p = new PointD(meta.getLabelX(im, sc).doubleValue(), meta.getLabelY(im, sc).doubleValue());
7939 an.AddPoint(ToStageSpace(p, physicalSizeX, physicalSizeY, volume.Location.X, volume.Location.Y));
7940 an.Text = meta.getLabelText(im, sc);
7941 }
7942 else
7943 if (type == "Mask")
7944 {
7945 byte[] bts = meta.getMaskBinData(im, sc);
7946 bool end = meta.getMaskBinDataBigEndian(im, sc).booleanValue();
7947 an = ROI.CreateMask(co, bts, SizeX, SizeY, new PointD(stageSizeX, stageSizeY),physicalSizeX,physicalSizeY);
7948 an.Text = meta.getMaskText(im, sc);
7949 an.id = meta.getMaskID(im, sc);
7950 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nz = meta.getMaskTheZ(im, sc);
7951 if (nz != null)
7952 co.Z = nz.getNumberValue().intValue();
7953 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nc = meta.getMaskTheC(im, sc);
7954 if (nc != null)
7955 co.C = nc.getNumberValue().intValue();
7956 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nt = meta.getMaskTheT(im, sc);
7957 if (nt != null)
7958 co.T = nt.getNumberValue().intValue();
7959 an.coord = co;
7960
7961 ome.units.quantity.Length fl = meta.getMaskFontSize(im, sc);
7962 if (fl != null)
7963 an.fontSize = fl.value().intValue();
7964 ome.xml.model.enums.FontFamily ff = meta.getMaskFontFamily(im, sc);
7965 if (ff != null)
7966 an.family = ff.name();
7967 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color col = meta.getMaskStrokeColor(im, sc);
7968 if (col != null)
7969 an.strokeColor = Color.FromArgb(col.getAlpha(), col.getRed(), col.getGreen(), col.getBlue());
7970 ome.units.quantity.Length fw = meta.getMaskStrokeWidth(im, sc);
7971 if (fw != null)
7972 an.strokeWidth = (float)fw.value().floatValue();
7973 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color colf = meta.getMaskFillColor(im, sc);
7974 if (colf != null)
7975 an.fillColor = Color.FromArgb(colf.getAlpha(), colf.getRed(), colf.getGreen(), colf.getBlue());
7976 }
7977 }
7978 }
7979
7980 imageReader.close();
7981 return Annotations;
7982 }
7988 public static string ROIsToString(List<ROI> Annotations)
7989 {
7990 string s = "";
7991 for (int i = 0; i < Annotations.Count; i++)
7992 {
7993 s += ROIToString(Annotations[i]);
7994 }
7995 return s;
7996 }
8003 public static string ROIToString(ROI an)
8004 {
8005 PointD[] points = an.GetPoints();
8006 string pts = "";
8007 for (int j = 0; j < points.Length; j++)
8008 {
8009 if (j == points.Length - 1)
8010 pts += points[j].X.ToString(CultureInfo.InvariantCulture) + "," + points[j].Y.ToString(CultureInfo.InvariantCulture);
8011 else
8012 pts += points[j].X.ToString(CultureInfo.InvariantCulture) + "," + points[j].Y.ToString(CultureInfo.InvariantCulture) + " ";
8013 }
8014 char sep = (char)34;
8015 string sColor = sep.ToString() + an.strokeColor.A.ToString() + ',' + an.strokeColor.R.ToString() + ',' + an.strokeColor.G.ToString() + ',' + an.strokeColor.B.ToString() + sep.ToString();
8016 string bColor = sep.ToString() + an.fillColor.A.ToString() + ',' + an.fillColor.R.ToString() + ',' + an.fillColor.G.ToString() + ',' + an.fillColor.B.ToString() + sep.ToString();
8017
8018 string line = an.roiID + ',' + an.roiName + ',' + an.type.ToString() + ',' + an.id + ',' + an.shapeIndex.ToString() + ',' +
8019 an.Text + ',' + an.serie + ',' + an.coord.Z.ToString() + ',' + an.coord.C.ToString() + ',' + an.coord.T.ToString() + ',' + an.X.ToString(CultureInfo.InvariantCulture) + ',' + an.Y.ToString(CultureInfo.InvariantCulture) + ',' +
8020 an.W.ToString(CultureInfo.InvariantCulture) + ',' + an.H.ToString(CultureInfo.InvariantCulture) + ',' + sep.ToString() + pts + sep.ToString() + ',' + sColor + ',' + an.strokeWidth.ToString(CultureInfo.InvariantCulture) + ',' + bColor + ',' + an.fontSize.ToString(CultureInfo.InvariantCulture) + ',' + NewLine;
8021 return line;
8022 }
8028 public static ROI StringToROI(string sts)
8029 {
8030 //Works with either comma or tab separated values.
8031 if (sts.StartsWith("<?xml") || sts.StartsWith("{"))
8032 return null;
8033 ROI an = new ROI();
8034 string val = "";
8035 bool inSep = false;
8036 int col = 0;
8037 double x = 0;
8038 double y = 0;
8039 double w = 0;
8040 double h = 0;
8041 string line = sts;
8042 bool points = false;
8043 char sep = '"';
8044 for (int i = 0; i < line.Length; i++)
8045 {
8046 char c = line[i];
8047 if (c == sep)
8048 {
8049 if (!inSep)
8050 {
8051 inSep = true;
8052 }
8053 else
8054 inSep = false;
8055 continue;
8056 }
8057
8058 if ((c == ',' || c == '\t') && (!inSep || points))
8059 {
8060 //ROIID,ROINAME,TYPE,ID,SHAPEINDEX,TEXT,C,Z,T,X,Y,W,H,POINTS,STROKECOLOR,STROKECOLORW,FILLCOLOR,FONTSIZE
8061 if (col == 0)
8062 {
8063 //ROIID
8064 an.roiID = val;
8065 }
8066 else
8067 if (col == 1)
8068 {
8069 //ROINAME
8070 an.roiName = val;
8071 }
8072 else
8073 if (col == 2)
8074 {
8075 //TYPE
8076 an.type = (ROI.Type)Enum.Parse(typeof(ROI.Type), val);
8077 if (an.type == ROI.Type.Freeform || an.type == ROI.Type.Polygon)
8078 an.closed = true;
8079 }
8080 else
8081 if (col == 3)
8082 {
8083 //ID
8084 an.id = val;
8085 }
8086 else
8087 if (col == 4)
8088 {
8089 //SHAPEINDEX/
8090 an.shapeIndex = int.Parse(val);
8091 }
8092 else
8093 if (col == 5)
8094 {
8095 //TEXT/
8096 an.Text = val;
8097 }
8098 else
8099 if (col == 6)
8100 {
8101 an.serie = int.Parse(val);
8102 }
8103 else
8104 if (col == 7)
8105 {
8106 an.coord.Z = int.Parse(val);
8107 }
8108 else
8109 if (col == 8)
8110 {
8111 an.coord.C = int.Parse(val);
8112 }
8113 else
8114 if (col == 9)
8115 {
8116 an.coord.T = int.Parse(val);
8117 }
8118 else
8119 if (col == 10)
8120 {
8121 x = double.Parse(val, CultureInfo.InvariantCulture);
8122 }
8123 else
8124 if (col == 11)
8125 {
8126 y = double.Parse(val, CultureInfo.InvariantCulture);
8127 }
8128 else
8129 if (col == 12)
8130 {
8131 w = double.Parse(val, CultureInfo.InvariantCulture);
8132 }
8133 else
8134 if (col == 13)
8135 {
8136 h = double.Parse(val, CultureInfo.InvariantCulture);
8137 }
8138 else
8139 if (col == 14)
8140 {
8141 //POINTS
8142 an.AddPoints(an.stringToPoints(val));
8143 points = false;
8144 an.Rect = new RectangleD(x, y, w, h);
8145 }
8146 else
8147 if (col == 15)
8148 {
8149 //STROKECOLOR
8150 string[] st = val.Split(',');
8151 an.strokeColor = Color.FromArgb(int.Parse(st[0]), int.Parse(st[1]), int.Parse(st[2]), int.Parse(st[3]));
8152 }
8153 else
8154 if (col == 16)
8155 {
8156 //STROKECOLORW
8157 an.strokeWidth = double.Parse(val, CultureInfo.InvariantCulture);
8158 }
8159 else
8160 if (col == 17)
8161 {
8162 //FILLCOLOR
8163 string[] st = val.Split(',');
8164 an.fillColor = Color.FromArgb(int.Parse(st[0]), int.Parse(st[1]), int.Parse(st[2]), int.Parse(st[3]));
8165 }
8166 else
8167 if (col == 18)
8168 {
8169 //FONTSIZE
8170 double s = double.Parse(val, CultureInfo.InvariantCulture);
8171 an.fontSize = (float)s;
8172 an.family = "Times New Roman";
8173 }
8174 col++;
8175 val = "";
8176 }
8177 else
8178 val += c;
8179 }
8180
8181 return an;
8182 }
8187 public static void ExportROIsCSV(string filename, List<ROI> Annotations)
8188 {
8189 string con = columns;
8190 con += ROIsToString(Annotations);
8191 File.WriteAllText(filename, con);
8192 }
8198 public static List<ROI> ImportROIsCSV(string filename)
8199 {
8200 List<ROI> list = new List<ROI>();
8201 if (!File.Exists(filename))
8202 return list;
8203 string[] sts = File.ReadAllLines(filename);
8204 //We start reading from line 1.
8205 for (int i = 1; i < sts.Length; i++)
8206 {
8207 list.Add(StringToROI(sts[i]));
8208 }
8209 return list;
8210 }
8218 public static void ExportROIFolder(string path, string filename)
8219 {
8220 string[] fs = Directory.GetFiles(path);
8221 int i = 0;
8222 foreach (string f in fs)
8223 {
8224 List<ROI> annotations = OpenOMEROIs(f, 0);
8225 string ff = Path.GetFileNameWithoutExtension(f);
8226 ExportROIsCSV(path + "//" + ff + "-" + i.ToString() + ".csv", annotations);
8227 i++;
8228 }
8229 }
8230
8231 private static BioImage bstats = null;
8232 private static bool update = false;
8258 public static void AutoThreshold(BioImage b, bool updateImageStats)
8259 {
8260 bstats = b;
8261 Statistics statistics = null;
8262 if (b.bitsPerPixel > 8)
8263 statistics = new Statistics(true);
8264 else
8265 statistics = new Statistics(false);
8266 for (int i = 0; i < b.Buffers.Count; i++)
8267 {
8268 if (b.Buffers[i].Stats == null || updateImageStats)
8269 b.Buffers[i].Stats = Statistics.FromBytes(b.Buffers[i]);
8270 if (b.Buffers[i].RGBChannelsCount == 1)
8271 statistics.AddStatistics(b.Buffers[i].Stats[0]);
8272 else
8273 {
8274 for (int r = 0; r < b.Buffers[i].RGBChannelsCount; r++)
8275 {
8276 statistics.AddStatistics(b.Buffers[i].Stats[r]);
8277 }
8278 }
8279 }
8280 for (int c = 0; c < b.Channels.Count; c++)
8281 {
8282 Statistics[] sts = new Statistics[b.Buffers[0].RGBChannelsCount];
8283 for (int i = 0; i < b.Buffers[0].RGBChannelsCount; i++)
8284 {
8285 if (b.bitsPerPixel > 8)
8286 {
8287 sts[i] = new Statistics(true);
8288 }
8289 else
8290 sts[i] = new Statistics(false);
8291 }
8292 for (int z = 0; z < b.SizeZ; z++)
8293 {
8294 for (int t = 0; t < b.SizeT; t++)
8295 {
8296 int ind;
8297 if(b.Channels.Count > b.SizeC)
8298 {
8299 ind = b.Coords[z, 0, t];
8300 }
8301 else
8302 ind = b.Coords[z, c, t];
8303 if (b.Buffers[ind].RGBChannelsCount == 1)
8304 sts[0].AddStatistics(b.Buffers[ind].Stats[0]);
8305 else
8306 {
8307 sts[0].AddStatistics(b.Buffers[ind].Stats[0]);
8308 sts[1].AddStatistics(b.Buffers[ind].Stats[1]);
8309 sts[2].AddStatistics(b.Buffers[ind].Stats[2]);
8310 if (b.Buffers[ind].RGBChannelsCount == 4)
8311 sts[3].AddStatistics(b.Buffers[ind].Stats[3]);
8312 }
8313 }
8314 }
8315 if (b.RGBChannelCount == 1)
8316 sts[0].MeanHistogram();
8317 else
8318 {
8319 sts[0].MeanHistogram();
8320 sts[1].MeanHistogram();
8321 sts[2].MeanHistogram();
8322 if (b.Buffers[0].RGBChannelsCount == 4)
8323 sts[3].MeanHistogram();
8324 }
8325 b.Channels[c].stats = sts;
8326 }
8327 statistics.MeanHistogram();
8328 b.statistics = statistics;
8329
8330 }
8332 public static void AutoThreshold()
8333 {
8334 AutoThreshold(bstats, update);
8335 }
8339 public static void AutoThresholdThread(BioImage b)
8340 {
8341 bstats = b;
8342 Thread th = new Thread(AutoThreshold);
8343 th.Start();
8344 }
8356 public static int FindFocus(BioImage im, int Channel, int Time)
8357 {
8358 long mf = 0;
8359 int fr = 0;
8360 List<double> dt = new List<double>();
8361 ZCT c = new ZCT(0, 0, 0);
8362 for (int i = 0; i < im.SizeZ; i++)
8363 {
8364 long f = CalculateFocusQuality(im.Buffers[im.Coords[i, Channel, Time]]);
8365 dt.Add(f);
8366 if (f > mf)
8367 {
8368 mf = f;
8369 fr = im.Coords[i, Channel, Time];
8370 }
8371 }
8372 Plot pl = Plot.Create(dt.ToArray(), "Focus");
8373 pl.Show();
8374 return fr;
8375 }
8383 static long CalculateFocusQuality(Bitmap b)
8384 {
8385 if (b.RGBChannelsCount == 1)
8386 {
8387 long sum = 0;
8388 long sumOfSquaresR = 0;
8389 for (int y = 0; y < b.SizeY; y++)
8390 for (int x = 0; x < b.SizeX; x++)
8391 {
8392 ColorS pixel = b.GetPixel(x, y);
8393 sum += pixel.R;
8394 sumOfSquaresR += pixel.R * pixel.R;
8395 }
8396 return sumOfSquaresR * b.SizeX * b.SizeY - sum * sum;
8397 }
8398 else
8399 {
8400 long sum = 0;
8401 long sumOfSquares = 0;
8402 for (int y = 0; y < b.SizeY; y++)
8403 for (int x = 0; x < b.SizeX; x++)
8404 {
8405 ColorS pixel = b.GetPixel(x, y);
8406 int p = (pixel.R + pixel.G + pixel.B) / 3;
8407 sum += p;
8408 sumOfSquares += p * p;
8409 }
8410 return sumOfSquares * b.SizeX * b.SizeY - sum * sum;
8411 }
8412 }
8415 public void Dispose()
8416 {
8417 for (int i = 0; i < Buffers.Count; i++)
8418 {
8419 Buffers[i].Dispose();
8420 }
8421 for (int i = 0; i < Channels.Count; i++)
8422 {
8423 Channels[i].Dispose();
8424 }
8425 for (int i = 0; i < Annotations.Count; i++)
8426 {
8427 Annotations[i].Dispose();
8428 }
8429 }
8434 public override string ToString()
8435 {
8436 return Filename.ToString() + ", (" + Volume.Location.X + ", " + Volume.Location.Y + ", " + Volume.Location.Z + ")";
8437 }
8438
8445 public static BioImage operator /(BioImage a, float b)
8446 {
8447 for (int i = 0; i < a.Buffers.Count; i++)
8448 {
8449 a.Buffers[i] = a.Buffers[i] / b;
8450 }
8451 return a;
8452 }
8453 public static BioImage operator *(BioImage a, float b)
8454 {
8455 for (int i = 0; i < a.Buffers.Count; i++)
8456 {
8457 a.Buffers[i] = a.Buffers[i] / b;
8458 }
8459 return a;
8460 }
8467 public static BioImage operator +(BioImage a, float b)
8468 {
8469 for (int i = 0; i < a.Buffers.Count; i++)
8470 {
8471 a.Buffers[i] = a.Buffers[i] + b;
8472 }
8473 return a;
8474 }
8481 public static BioImage operator -(BioImage a, float b)
8482 {
8483 for (int i = 0; i < a.Buffers.Count; i++)
8484 {
8485 a.Buffers[i] = a.Buffers[i] - b;
8486 }
8487 return a;
8488 }
8489
8490
8497 public static BioImage operator /(BioImage a, ColorS b)
8498 {
8499 for (int i = 0; i < a.Buffers.Count; i++)
8500 {
8501 a.Buffers[i] = a.Buffers[i] / b;
8502 }
8503 return a;
8504 }
8511 public static BioImage operator *(BioImage a, ColorS b)
8512 {
8513 for (int i = 0; i < a.Buffers.Count; i++)
8514 {
8515 a.Buffers[i] = a.Buffers[i] * b;
8516 }
8517 return a;
8518 }
8526 public static BioImage operator +(BioImage a, ColorS b)
8527 {
8528 for (int i = 0; i < a.Buffers.Count; i++)
8529 {
8530 a.Buffers[i] = a.Buffers[i] + b;
8531 }
8532 return a;
8533 }
8540 public static BioImage operator -(BioImage a, ColorS b)
8541 {
8542 for (int i = 0; i < a.Buffers.Count; i++)
8543 {
8544 a.Buffers[i] = a.Buffers[i] - b;
8545 }
8546 return a;
8547 }
8548 }
